name: bin
interpret: n.箱柜；vt.放入箱内；[计算机] DOS文件名:二进制目标文件
example: 单词 bin 的例句||||He emptied several bags of rice into a bin. 他把几袋米倒进大箱里。||||He threw the empty bottles in the bin. 他把空瓶子扔进垃圾箱。

name: aquarium
interpret: n.水族馆，养鱼池，玻璃缸
example: 单词 aquarium 的例句||||The first time I saw seals was in an aquarium. 我第一次看见海豹是在水族馆里。||||I'm going to the aquarium with my parents this Sunday. 这个星期天，我要和父母一起到水族馆去。

name: dinosaur
interpret: n.恐龙
example: 单词 dinosaur 的例句||||Are you trying to tell me that David was attacked by a dinosaur? 你是想要告诉我大卫被一只恐龙所攻击？||||He stared at the faithful miniature of the dinosaur. 他凝视著精确的恐龙缩小模型。

name: crab
interpret: n.螃蟹，偏航，脾气乖戾的人，酸苹果；vi.捕蟹，偏航，发牢骚；vt.使偏航，发脾气
example: 单词 crab 的例句||||I can't remember when I last had crab. 我不记得上次吃蟹是什么时候了。||||The skin on my face felt as hard as a crab's back. 我脸上的皮仿佛僵硬了，就象螃蟹的壳似的。

name: lettuce
interpret: n.莴苣；生菜
example: 单词 lettuce 的例句||||Get some lettuce and tomatoes so I can make a salad. 买些莴苣和西红柿，我好做色拉。||||The lettuce is crisp and cold. 莴苣松脆爽口。

name: wink
interpret: n.眨眼，使眼色，瞬间；vi.眨眼，使眼色，闪烁；vt.眨眼
example: 单词 wink 的例句||||He tipped me the wink not to buy at that price. 他眨眼暗示我按那个价格就不要买。||||The satellite disappeared in a wink. 瞬息之间，那颗卫星就消失了。

name: reptile
interpret: n.爬行动物；两栖动物
example: 单词 reptile 的例句||||The frog is not a true reptile. 青蛙并非真正的爬行动物。||||So you should not be surprised to see someone keep a reptile as a pet. 所以，你不必惊奇有人养了一只爬行动物作为宠物。

name: penguin
interpret: n.企鹅
example: 单词 penguin 的例句||||The penguin is a flightless bird. 企鹅是一种不会飞的鸟。||||He walked with an awkward gait like a penguin. 他走路的步子难看得就像企鹅。

name: shrimp
interpret: n.虾，小虾；矮小的人
example: 单词 shrimp 的例句||||When the shrimp farm is built it will block the stream. 一旦养虾场建起来，将会截断这条河流。||||When it comes to seafood, I like shrimp the best. 说到海鲜，我最喜欢虾。

name: ginger
interpret: n.姜，精力，淡赤黄色；adj.淡赤黄色的；vt.使活泼，使有生气
example: 单词 ginger 的例句||||Ginger shall be hot in the mouth. 生姜吃到嘴里总是辣的。||||There is no ginger in the young man. 这个年轻人没有精神。

name: jack
interpret: n.插座，千斤顶，男人；vt.抬起，提醒，扛举；n.（Jake）杰克
example: 单词 jack 的例句||||I am looking for the headphone jack. 我正在找寻头戴式耳机插孔。||||He lifted the car with a jack to change the flat tyre. 他用千斤顶把车顶起来换下瘪轮胎。

name: flute
interpret: n.长笛；vi.吹笛；vt.用长笛吹奏
example: 单词 flute 的例句||||He took out his flute, and blew at it. 他拿出笛子吹了起来。||||There is an extensive repertoire of music written for the flute. 有很多供长笛演奏的曲目。

name: jug
interpret: n.(有柄，小口，可盛水等的)大壶，罐，盂
example: 单词 jug 的例句||||He walked along with a jug poised on his head. 他头上顶着一个水罐，保持着平衡往前走。||||She filled the jug with fresh water. 她将水壶注满了清水。

name: trumpet
interpret: n.喇叭，喇叭声；vt.吹喇叭，吹嘘；vi.吹喇叭；发出喇叭般的声音
example: 单词 trumpet 的例句||||He plays the violin, but I play the trumpet. 他拉提琴，我吹喇叭。||||The trumpet sounded for battle. 战斗的号角吹响了。

name: hop
interpret: n.单脚跳，跳跃；vi.单脚跳，跳跃；着手做某事；vt.跳跃，跃过
example: 单词 hop 的例句||||The children had a competition to see who could hop the fastest. 孩子们举行比赛，看谁单足跳跃最快。||||How long can you hop on your right foot? 你用右脚能跳多远？

name: slipper
interpret: n.拖鞋
example: 单词 slipper 的例句||||I rescued the remains of my slipper from the dog. 我从那狗的口中夺回了我拖鞋的残留部分。||||The puppy chewed a hole in the slipper. 小狗在拖鞋上啃了一个洞。

name: riddle
interpret: n.谜；谜语；vt. 解谜；出谜题；充满；筛选；vi.出谜题
example: 单词 riddle 的例句||||The riddle couldn't be solved by the child. 这个谜语孩子猜不出来。||||Her disappearance is a complete riddle. 她的失踪完全是一个谜。

name: fable
interpret: n.寓言；童话；神话
example: 单词 fable 的例句||||The fable is given on the next page. 这篇寓言登在下一页上。||||He had some motive in telling this fable. 他讲这寓言故事是有用意的。

name: vendor
interpret: n.卖主；小贩
example: 单词 vendor 的例句||||She looked at the vendor who cheated her the other day with distaste. 她厌恶地望着那个前几天曾经欺骗过她的小贩。||||He must inform the vendor immediately. 他必须立即通知卖方。

name: trolley
interpret: n.手推车，台车；无轨电车；有轨电车
example: 单词 trolley 的例句||||The waiter had brought the sweet trolley. 侍者已经推来了甜食推车。||||In a library, books are moved on a trolley. 在图书馆，书籍是放在台车上搬动的。

name: frustrate
interpret: vt.使失望；使沮丧；使厌烦；vi.失败；受挫
example: 单词 frustrate 的例句||||But this didn't frustrate Einstein. He was content to go as far as he could. 但这并没有使爱因斯坦灰心，他对能够更深入地研究而感到满意。||||They made their preparations to frustrate the conspiracy. 他们作好准备挫败这个阴谋。

name: auditorium
interpret: n.观众席，听众席；会堂，礼堂
example: 单词 auditorium 的例句||||The teacher gathered all the pupils in the auditorium. 老师把全体同学集合在礼堂内。||||The stage is thrust forward into the auditorium. 舞台向前突出，伸入观众席。

name: athletic
interpret: adj.擅长运动的，强健的；活跃的，体格健壮的
example: 单词 athletic 的例句||||This area has been marked off for athletic practice. 这块地方被划出来供体育训练之用。||||He is an athletic star. 他是一个运动明星。

name: encyclopedia
interpret: n.百科全书
example: 单词 encyclopedia 的例句||||The encyclopedia fell to the floor with a thud. 那本百科全书砰的一声掉到地上。||||Geoff is a walking encyclopedia. He knows about everything. 杰夫是个活百科全书，他什么都懂。

name: makeup
interpret: n.组织；性格；化装品；补充；补考
example: 单词 makeup 的例句||||Those who failed the exam take a makeup exam. 这次考试不及格的人必须参加补考。||||Eyeliner: Makeup used to outline the eyes. 眼线笔：用来加强眼的轮廓的化妆品。

name: liking
interpret: n.爱好；嗜好；喜欢
example: 单词 liking 的例句||||The word palate also means taste or liking. Palate这个词也有“口味”或“嗜好”的意思。||||I must admit I have no liking for exaggeration. 我必须承认我不喜欢夸大其词。

name: overpass
interpret: n.天桥，立交桥
example: 单词 overpass 的例句||||I walked through an overpass over the road. 我步行穿过那条公路上面的立交桥。||||We should take the overpass when crossing the road. 我们过马路应走天桥。

name: vegetarian
interpret: n.素食者；adj.素食的
example: 单词 vegetarian 的例句||||She got used gradually to the vegetarian diet. 她逐渐习惯吃素食。||||I didn't realize you were a vegetarian. 我不知道你是个素食者。

name: sprout
interpret: n.芽，萌芽；vt.使发芽，摘去芽；vi.长芽，抽条
example: 单词 sprout 的例句||||When do deer first sprout horns? 鹿在多大的时候开始长出角？ ||||It takes about a week for the seeds to sprout. 这些种子大约要一周后才会发芽。

name: aerospace
interpret: adj.航空的，宇宙航行的
example: 单词 aerospace 的例句||||The world's entire aerospace industry is feeling the chill winds of recession. 全世界的航空航天工业都感受到了经济衰退的寒意。||||Edward Murphy was an aerospace engineer for the US Army. 爱德华·墨菲是一名美军的航宇工程师。

name: relish
interpret: n.滋味，享受，爱好，调味品；vt.加调味料，享受，品味；vi.有滋味
example: 单词 relish 的例句||||I have no relish for pop music. 我对流行音乐不感兴趣。||||I relish the challenge of doing jobs that others turn down. 我喜欢挑战别人拒绝做的工作。

name: yawn
interpret: n.呵欠；vi.打呵欠，vt.张开；打着呵欠说
example: 单词 yawn 的例句||||He got up with a stretch and a yawn. 他站起来伸伸懒腰，打个呵欠。||||Her yawn suggests that she is sleepy. 她打哈欠表示她很困了。

name: con
interpret: n.反对的观点，反对者，反对票，肺病；vt.精读，学习，默记；adv.反对地，从反面；adj.欺诈的
example: 单词 con 的例句||||We must be fair and consider the reason pro and con. 我们必须公平考虑赞成和反对的理由。||||The motion is adopted non con. 因无人投反对票，协议被通过。

name: suburb
interpret: n.郊区，郊外，近郊
example: 单词 suburb 的例句||||Toward the suburb the houses begin to thin out. 靠近市郊的地方房屋渐渐稀少。||||Disneyland is in Los Angeles suburb. 迪斯尼游乐场在洛杉矶的近郊。

name: lottery
interpret: n.抽彩；碰运气的事，难于算计的事
example: 单词 lottery 的例句||||He won no less than ￡5000 in the lottery. 他居然中了5000英镑的奖券。||||They thought themselves lucky in the lottery of life. 他们认为自己是变幻莫测的人生中的幸运者。

name: scoop
interpret: n.铲子，舀取，独家新闻；vt.汲取，舀取，抢先登出
example: 单词 scoop 的例句||||In the morning he must get his boy to scoop it out. 早上一定得叫佣人把它剜出来。||||Uh, one scoop of coffee and one scoop of chocolate for me. 我要一勺咖啡的和一勺巧克力的。

name: beverage
interpret: n.(水，酒等之外的)饮料
example: 单词 beverage 的例句||||The beverage is often colored with caramel. 这种饮料常用焦糖染色。||||Beer is a beverage of the remotest time. 啤酒是一种最古老的饮料。

name: intersection
interpret: n.交集，十字路口，交叉点；[计算机] 交集
example: 单词 intersection 的例句||||There is a stop sign at an intersection. 在交叉路口处有停车标志。||||Bridges are used to avoid the intersection of a railway and a highway. 桥用来避免铁路和公路直接交叉。

name: jealousy
interpret: n.妒忌，嫉妒，猜忌
example: 单词 jealousy 的例句||||Some women have a disposition to jealousy. 有些女人生性爱妒忌。||||I can't support your jealousy any longer. 我再也无法忍受你的嫉妒了。

name: relaxation
interpret: n.松弛，放松；休息；消遣；娱乐
example: 单词 relaxation 的例句||||The minister has consistently opposed any relaxation in the law. 部长一向反对法律上的任何放宽。||||She listens to classical music for relaxation. 她听古典音乐放松。

name: popcorn
interpret: n.爆米花
example: 单词 popcorn 的例句||||I like to eat popcorn when I am watching TV play at home. 当我在家观看电视剧时，喜欢吃爆米花。||||He still stood behind his cash register stuffing his mouth with popcorn. 他仍站在收银机后，里塞满了爆米花。

name: pumpkin
interpret: n.南瓜
example: 单词 pumpkin 的例句||||They ate turkey and pumpkin pie. 他们吃了火鸡和南瓜馅饼。||||It looks like there is a person looking out of the pumpkin! 看起来就像南瓜里有人在看着你！

name: zigzag
interpret: n.曲折，之字形；adj.曲折的，锯齿形的；adv.曲折地，成锯齿形地；vt.使曲折；vi.曲折前行
example: 单词 zigzag 的例句||||The lightning made a zigzag in the sky. 闪电在天空划出一道Z字形。||||The path runs zigzag up the hill. 小径向山顶蜿蜒盘旋。

name: plural
interpret: n.复数；复数形式；adj.复数的
example: 单词 plural 的例句||||Most plural nouns in English end in 's '. 英语的复数名词多以s结尾。||||Here you should use plural pronoun. 这里你应该用复数代词。

name: thriller
interpret: n.惊险片，恐怖片
example: 单词 thriller 的例句||||He began by writing a thriller. That book sold a million copies. 他是写惊险小说起家的。那本书卖了一百万册。||||I always take a thriller to read on the train. 我乘火车时，总带一本惊险小说看。

name: spacecraft
interpret: n.太空船，宇宙飞船
example: 单词 spacecraft 的例句||||There're three astronauts in the spacecraft. 在这艘宇宙飞船里有三名宇航员。||||The spacecraft rounded the moon. 宇宙飞船环绕月球飞行。

name: rape
interpret: n.抢夺，掠夺，强奸；vt.掠夺，抢夺，强奸
example: 单词 rape 的例句||||The rape of the countryside had a profound ravage on them. 对乡村的掠夺给他们造成严重创伤。||||He was brought to court and charged with rape. 他被带到法庭并被指控犯有强奸罪。

name: baker
interpret: n.面包师
example: 单词 baker 的例句||||The baker bakes his bread in the bakery. 面包师在面包房内烤面包。||||The baker frosted the cake with a mixture of sugar and whites of eggs. 面包师在蛋糕上撒了一层白糖和蛋清的混合料。

name: license
interpret: n.执照，许可证，特许；vt.许可，特许
example: 单词 license 的例句||||The foreign guest has a license on the person. 这个外国客人随身携带执照。||||The driver was arrested for having false license plates on his car. 司机由于使用假车牌而被捕。

name: stuffy
interpret: adj.不透气的，闷热的
example: 单词 stuffy 的例句||||It's really hot and stuffy in here. 这里实在太热太闷了。||||It was so stuffy in the tent that we could sense the air was heavy with moisture. 帐篷里很闷热，我们感到空气都是潮的。

name: estate
interpret: n.所有地，地产，庄园；住宅区；财产，资产
example: 单词 estate 的例句||||My estate lies within a mile. 我的地产离那有一英里。||||The great real estate brokers do far more than this. 而优秀的房地产经纪人做得可比这多得多。

name: caption
interpret: n.说明，字幕，标题；vt.加上标题，加上说明
example: 单词 caption 的例句||||I didn't understand the drawing until I read the caption. 直到我看到这幅画的说明才弄懂其意思。||||There is a caption under the picture. 图片下边附有说明。

name: axe
interpret: n.斧子；vt.用斧头砍，削减
example: 单词 axe 的例句||||Be careful with that sharp axe. 那把斧子很锋利，你要当心。||||The edge of this axe has turned. 这把斧子卷了刃了。

name: pier
interpret: n.码头；桥墩，桥柱；[建]窗间壁，支柱
example: 单词 pier 的例句||||The pier of the bridge has been so badly damaged that experts worry it is unable to bear weight. 这座桥的桥桩破损厉害，专家担心它已不能负重。||||The ship was making towards the pier. 船正驶向码头。

name: jade
interpret: n.玉石；碧玉；翡翠
example: 单词 jade 的例句||||The statue was carved out of jade. 这座塑像是玉雕的。||||He presented us with a couple of jade lions. 他送给我们一对玉狮子。

name: bead
interpret: n.念珠；(pl.)珠子项链；水珠
example: 单词 bead 的例句||||She accidentally swallowed a glass bead. 她不小心吞下了一颗玻璃珠。||||She has a beautiful glass bead and a bracelet in the box. 盒子里有一颗美丽的玻璃珠和手镯。

name: photocopy
interpret: n.影印本；vt.影印，vt.影印，复印
example: 单词 photocopy 的例句||||The original reproduces clearly in a photocopy. 原件复印得十分清晰。||||What's wrong with the photocopy machine? 复印机出了什么问题？

name: postal
interpret: adj.邮政的，邮局的
example: 单词 postal 的例句||||A postal network now covers the whole country. 邮路遍及全国。||||Remember to use postal code. 勿忘使用邮政编码。

name: vowel
interpret: n.元音；元音字母
example: 单词 vowel 的例句||||A long vowel is a long sound as in the word "shoe". 长元音即如“shoe” 一词中的长音。||||The vowel in words like "my" and "thigh" is not very difficult. 单词my和thigh中的元音并不难发。

name: nylon
interpret: n.尼龙；尼龙长袜
example: 单词 nylon 的例句||||He dresses a nylon shirt. 他穿着一件尼龙衬衫。||||How many products are made from nylon? 有多少种产品是由尼龙制造的？

name: outskirts
interpret: n.郊外，郊区
example: 单词 outskirts 的例句||||Our car broke down on the outskirts of the city. 我们的汽车在市郊出了故障。||||They mostly live on the outskirts of a town. 他们大多住在近郊。

name: pointed
interpret: adj.尖的，直截了当的
example: 单词 pointed 的例句||||He gave me a very sharp pointed pencil. 他给我一支削得非常尖的铅笔。||||A safety pin has a metal covering over the pointed end. 安全别针在尖端有一个金属套。

name: bowling
interpret: n.保龄球运动
example: 单词 bowling 的例句||||Bowling is a popular sport with young and old. 保龄球是老少都爱的运动。||||Which sport do you 1ike, golf or bowling? 你喜欢什么运动，高尔夫还是保龄球?

name: endeavour
interpret: n.尽力；努力；力图
example: 单词 endeavour 的例句||||We must always endeavour to improve our work. 我们总要努力改进自己的工作。||||I will endeavour to do everything well. 我要尽力做好每件事。

name: aspirin
interpret: n.阿司匹林
example: 单词 aspirin 的例句||||The aspirin seems to quiet the headache. 阿司匹林似乎使头痛减轻了。||||She went into a chemist's and bought some aspirin. 她进了一家药店，买了些阿司匹林。

name: stationery
interpret: n.文具；(配套的)信笺信封
example: 单词 stationery 的例句||||She works in the stationery department of a big store. 她在一家大商店的文具部工作。||||There was something very comfortable in having plenty of stationery. 文具一多，心里自会觉得踏实。

name: inspector
interpret: n.检查员，监察员，视察员
example: 单词 inspector 的例句||||The inspector was interested in everything pertaining to the school. 视察员对有关学校的一切都感兴趣。||||The inspector was shining a flashlight onto the tickets. 查票员打着手电筒查看车票。

name: compartment
interpret: n.卧车包房，隔间；分隔的空间
example: 单词 compartment 的例句||||We were glad to have the whole compartment to ourselves. 真高兴，整个客车隔间由我们独享。||||The batteries are safely enclosed in a watertight compartment. 电池被安全地置于一个防水的隔间里。

name: gunpowder
interpret: n.火药
example: 单词 gunpowder 的例句||||Gunpowder was introduced into Europe during the first half of the 14th century. 在14世纪上半叶，火药传入欧洲。||||This statement has a strong smell of gunpowder. 这是一篇充满火药味的声明。

name: owl
interpret: n.猫头鹰，枭
example: 单词 owl 的例句||||Her new glasses make her look like an owl. 她的新眼镜让她看上去像只猫头鹰。||||I'm a night owl and seldom go to bed until after midnight. 我睡得很晚，经常半夜后才睡觉。

name: capsule
interpret: n.太空舱；胶囊
example: 单词 capsule 的例句||||The astronauts work and live in the space capsule. 宇航员在航天舱里工作生活。||||The doctor advised me to take a capsule this morning. 医生建议我今天早晨服一粒胶囊。

name: serial
interpret: n.连本影片，连本电视节目；电视连续剧；adj.连续的
example: 单词 serial 的例句||||A new serial is starting on television tonight. 今晚电视开播一部新的电视连续剧。||||Can you account for the serial failures in our experiment? 你能解释我们实验屡屡失败的原因吗？

name: woolen
interpret: adj.羊毛(制)的；毛纺的
example: 单词 woolen 的例句||||She likes to wear woolen socks in winter. 冬天她喜欢穿羊毛袜。||||There is one bar of woolen blanket on that bed. 那张床上有一条毛毯。

name: cathedral
interpret: n.教区总教堂；大教堂
example: 单词 cathedral 的例句||||We visited the magnificent cathedral. 我们参观了宏伟的教堂。||||There's a cathedral in the town. 镇里有一座大教堂。

name: motorway
interpret: n.高速公路，快车道
example: 单词 motorway 的例句||||Our car had a breakdown on the motorway. 我们的汽车在高速公路上抛锚了。||||A maniac driver sped 35 miles along the wrong side of a motorway at 110 mph. 一个疯狂的司机以每小时110英里的速度在高速公路上逆行飙车35英里。

name: criticise
interpret: vt.&vi.批评，评论；非难
example: 单词 criticise 的例句||||Right and left have much cause to criticise government. 左翼和右翼有很多理由批评政府。||||It is not your place to criticise or suggest improvements! 提出批评或给予改进建议并不是你的责任！

name: pottery
interpret: n.陶器，陶器场
example: 单词 pottery 的例句||||My sister likes to learn art pottery in her spare time. 我妹妹喜欢在空余时间学习陶艺。||||The pottery was left to bake in the hot sun. 陶器放在外面让炎热的太阳烘晒焙干。

name: spicy
interpret: adj.加香料的；辛辣的，有风味的
example: 单词 spicy 的例句||||The soup tasted mildly spicy. 汤尝起来略有点辣。||||Very spicy food doesn't suit her stomach. 太辣的东西她吃了胃不舒服。

name: wagon
interpret: n.四轮马车，手推车，面包车；无盖运货列车
example: 单词 wagon 的例句||||We have to fork the hay into the wagon. 我们得把干草用叉子挑进马车里去。||||The muddy road bemired the wagon. 马车陷入了泥泞的道路。

name: parachute
interpret: n.降落伞；v.用降落伞投送/降落
example: 单词 parachute 的例句||||No way, I'm not jumping from high places without a parachute. 没可能的，没有降落伞我可不从高处往下跳。||||Please release the parachute when there is an emergency. 有紧急情况，请打开降落伞。

name: unfamiliar
interpret: adj.陌生的，不熟悉的
example: 单词 unfamiliar 的例句||||I am unfamiliar with the place and the people here. 我在这儿人地生疏。||||The man seemed unfamiliar to me. 这人很面生。

name: lighting
interpret: n.照明，光线的明暗，舞台灯光
example: 单词 lighting 的例句||||The gas lamp gradually lost ground to electric lighting. 煤气灯逐渐为电灯所代替。||||The lighting in that restaurant is soft and romantic. 那个餐馆照明柔和而且浪漫。

name: specially
interpret: adv.特定地；特殊地；明确地
example: 单词 specially 的例句||||They are specially packaged so that they stack easily. 它们经过特别包装以便于堆放。||||The machine was designed specially for demolishing old buildings. 这种机器是专为拆毁旧楼房而设计的。

name: buffalo
interpret: n.(北美)野牛；(亚洲)水牛
example: 单词 buffalo 的例句||||Asian buffalo isn't as wild as that of America's. 亚洲水牛比美洲水牛温顺些。||||The boots are made of buffalo hide. 这双靴子是由水牛皮制成的。

name: earring
interpret: n.耳环，耳饰
example: 单词 earring 的例句||||How long have you worn that earring? 你戴那个耳环多久了？||||I have an earring but can't find its companion. 我现在只有一只耳环，找不到另一只了。

name: etiquette
interpret: n.礼仪，礼节；规矩
example: 单词 etiquette 的例句||||The rules of etiquette are not so strict nowadays. 如今的礼仪规则已不那么严格了。||||According to etiquette, you should stand up to meet a guest. 按照礼节你应该站起来接待客人。

name: advertising
interpret: n.广告业；广告活动 adj.广告的；广告业务的
example: 单词 advertising 的例句||||Can you give me any advice on getting into advertising? 你能指点我如何涉足广告业吗？||||The advertising campaign is aimed primarily at young people. 这个广告宣传运动主要是针对年轻人的。

name: staple
interpret: n.主要产物，常用品，主要要素，原料，订书钉，钩环；adj.主要的，重要的；vt.分类
example: 单词 staple 的例句||||Tea is the staple crop here. 本地产品以茶叶为大宗。||||Potatoes are the staple of their diet. 土豆是他们的主要食品。

name: sleeper
interpret: n.睡眠者，卧车，卧铺
example: 单词 sleeper 的例句||||I usually go up to London on the sleeper. 我一般都乘卧车去伦敦。||||But first he explained that he was a very heavy sleeper. 但首先他解释说自己睡觉很沉。

name: laborer
interpret: n.劳动者，劳工
example: 单词 laborer 的例句||||Her husband had been a farm laborer. 她丈夫以前是个农场雇工。||||He worked as a casual laborer and did not earn much. 他当临时工， 没有赚多少钱。

name: friendliness
interpret: n.友谊，亲切，亲密
example: 单词 friendliness 的例句||||Behind the mask of friendliness, I know he really dislikes me. 在友善的面具后面，我知道他其实并不喜欢我。||||His manner was a blend of friendliness and respect. 他的态度友善且毕恭毕敬。

name: wireless
interpret: adj.无线的；n.无线电
example: 单词 wireless 的例句||||There are a lot of wireless links in a radio. 收音机里有许多无线电线路。||||Wireless messages tell us that the ship was sinking. 无线电报告知我们那艘船正在下沉。

name: erase
interpret: vt.擦掉；消除某事物的痕迹；vi.被擦去，被抹掉
example: 单词 erase 的例句||||He tried to erase the idea from his mind. 他试图从头脑中抹掉这个想法。||||Please erase my name from the list. 请把我的名字从名单上擦去。

name: gambling
interpret: n.赌博；投机
example: 单词 gambling 的例句||||They have won a lot of money through gambling. 他们赌博赢了很多钱。||||The men have been gambling away all night. 那些人赌了整整一夜。

name: porcelain
interpret: n.瓷；adj.瓷的，瓷制的
example: 单词 porcelain 的例句||||These porcelain plates have rather original designs on them. 这些瓷盘的花纹很别致。||||The porcelain vase is enveloped in cotton. 瓷花瓶用棉花裹着。

name: Portuguese
interpret: n.葡萄牙人；葡萄牙语；adj.葡萄牙的；葡萄牙人的；葡萄牙语的
example: 单词 Portuguese 的例句||||They styled their house in the Portuguese manner. 他们仿照葡萄牙的风格设计自己的房子。||||Her family is Portuguese in origin. 她的家族是葡萄牙血统。

name: assessment
interpret: n.评价；评估；对财产的估价，被估定的金额
example: 单词 assessment 的例句||||This is a very perceptive assessment of the situation. 这是一个对该情况的极富洞察力的评价。||||What is your assessment of the situation? 你对时局的看法如何?

name: sleepless
interpret: adj.不睡眠的，睡不著的，不休息的
example: 单词 sleepless 的例句||||The situation gave her many sleepless nights. 这种情况害她一连好多天睡不好觉。||||One evening I heard a tale that rendered me sleepless for nights. 一天晚上，我听说了一个传闻，把我搞得一连几夜都不能入睡。

name: conversational
interpret: adj.对话的，会话的
example: 单词 conversational 的例句||||The article is written in a conversational style. 该文是以对话的形式写成的。||||She values herself on her conversational powers. 她常夸耀自己的能言善辩。

name: knowledgeable
interpret: adj.知识渊博的；有见识的
example: 单词 knowledgeable 的例句||||He's quite knowledgeable about the theatre. 他对戏剧很有心得。||||He made some knowledgeable remarks at the meeting. 他在会上的发言颇有见地。

name: dressing
interpret: n.(食物)调料；包扎伤口的用品，敷料
example: 单词 dressing 的例句||||Don't spend such a lot of time in dressing yourself. 别花那么多时间来打扮自己。||||The children enjoy dressing up in mother's old clothes. 孩子们喜欢穿上妈妈旧时的衣服玩。

name: high-tech
interpret: adj.高科技的
example: 单词 high-tech 的例句||||The economy is in the upswing which makes high-tech services in more demand too. 经济在蓬勃发展，这就使对高科技服务的需求量也在加大。||||The quest of a cure for disease with high-tech has never ceased. 人们希望运用高科技治疗疾病的追求从未停止过。

name: blindfold
interpret: vt.蒙住…的眼睛；adj.盲目的；adv.盲目地；n.蒙眼的绷带[布等]； 障眼物，蒙蔽人的事物
example: 单词 blindfold 的例句||||They put a blindfold on a horse. 他们给马蒙上遮眼布。||||I can do it blindfold. 我闭着眼睛都能做。

name: decided
interpret: adj.决定了的，坚决的；明显的，明确的
example: 单词 decided 的例句||||This gave them a decided advantage over their opponents. 这使他们比对手具有明显的优势。||||There is a decided difference between British and Chinese way of greeting. 英国人和中国人打招呼的方式有很明显的区别。

name: helping
interpret: n.食物的一份&adj.帮助人的，辅助的
example: 单词 helping 的例句||||The poor children regularly pony up for a second helping of my hamburger. 那些可怜的孩子们总是要求我把我的汉堡包再给他们一份。|||| By doing this, they may at times be helping to restore competition. 这样一来，他们在某些时候，有助于竞争的加强。

name: schooling
interpret: n.教育；正规学校教育
example: 单词 schooling 的例句||||A child's access to schooling varies greatly from area to area. 孩子获得学校教育的机会因地区不同而大相径庭。||||Backward children need a special kind of schooling. 天赋差的孩子需要特殊的教育。

name: diplomat
interpret: n.外交官，外交家；能交际的人，圆滑的人
example: 单词 diplomat 的例句||||The diplomat threw in a joke, and the tension was instantly relieved. 那位外交官插进一个笑话，紧张的气氛顿时缓和下来。||||He served as a diplomat in Russia before the war. 战前他在俄罗斯当外交官。

name: geographical
interpret: adj.地理的；地区(性)的
example: 单词 geographical 的例句||||The current survey will have a wider geographical spread. 当前的调查将在更广泛的地域范围內进行。|||| These birds have a wide geographical distribution. 这些鸟的地理分布很广。

name: abdomen
interpret: n.腹，下腹(胸部到腿部的部分)
example: 单词 abdomen 的例句||||How to know to there is ascarid inside abdomen? 怎样知道肚子里面有蛔虫？||||He was anxious about an off-and-on pain the abdomen. 他因时隐时现的腹痛而焦虑。

name: calcium
interpret: n.钙(化学符号Ca)
example: 单词 calcium 的例句||||We need calcium to make bones. 我们需要钙来壮骨。||||Calcium is found most abundantly in milk. 奶含钙最丰富。

name: zoom
interpret: n.急速上升；嗡嗡声；vi.突然扩大，急速上升；vt.使摄象机移动
example: 单词 zoom 的例句||||The airplane's zoom carried it above the clouds. 飞机的陡直上升使它飞到云层之上。||||I live near an airport and the zoom of passing planes can be heard night and day. 我住在一个飞机场附近，昼夜都能听到飞机飞过的嗡嗡声。

name: acting
interpret: n.演戏，行为，假装；adj.代理的，临时的，演出用的
example: 单词 acting 的例句||||Ignore her, she's just acting. 别理她，她只是假装的。||||During the seventies, her acting career was in eclipse. 在七十年代，她的表演生涯黯然失色。

name: astronomer
interpret: n.天文学家
example: 单词 astronomer 的例句||||A new star attracted the notice of the astronomer. 新发现的一颗星引起了那位天文学家的注意。||||He is reputed to have been a good astronomer. 他以一个优秀的天文学者闻名于世。

name: blueprint
interpret: n.蓝图，设计图，计划；vt.制成蓝图，计划
example: 单词 blueprint 的例句||||All the machine parts on a blueprint must answer each other. 设计图上所有的机器部件都应互相配合。||||The documents contain a blueprint for a nuclear device. 文件内附有一张核装置的设计蓝图。

name: giggle
interpret: n.痴笑，咯咯地笑；vt.咯咯地笑着说；vi.傻笑；咯咯地笑
example: 单词 giggle 的例句||||Both girls began to giggle. 两个女孩都咯咯地笑了起来。||||All that giggle and whisper is too much for me. 我受不了那些咯咯的笑声和交头接耳的样子。

name: memo
interpret: n.照会，备忘录；便笺；通知书；规章
example: 单词 memo 的例句||||Do you want me to send the memo out? 您要我把这份备忘录分发出去吗？||||Can you type a memo for me? 您能帮我打一份备忘录吗？

name: anecdote
interpret: n.轶事，趣闻，短故事
example: 单词 anecdote 的例句||||He departed from the text to tell an anecdote. 他偏离课文讲起了一则轶事。||||It had never been more than a family anecdote. 那不过是个家庭趣谈罢了。

name: oar
interpret: n.桨，橹，划手；vi.划行；vt.划（船）
example: 单词 oar 的例句||||The sailors oar slowly across the river. 水手们慢慢地划过河去。||||The blade of the oar was bitten off by a shark. 浆叶被一条鲨鱼咬掉了。

name: impair
interpret: vt.损害，损伤；削弱，减少
example: 单词 impair 的例句||||Loud noise can impair your hearing. 巨大的噪音有损听觉。||||It can not impair the intellectual vigor of the young. 这不能磨灭青年人思想活力。

name: leftover
interpret: n.剩货，残留物，剩饭；adj.残余的
example: 单词 leftover 的例句||||These narrow roads are a leftover from the days of horse-drawn carriages. 这些小道是从马车时代沿用下来的。||||Wonder if that bakery lets us take leftover home. 不知道那家糕饼店会不会让我们把卖剩的带回家。

name: subscribe
interpret: vi.(to)订阅，订购；同意；vt.捐助，赞助
example: 单词 subscribe 的例句||||I heartily subscribe to that sentiment. 我十分赞同那个观点。||||The magazine is trying to get more readers to subscribe. 该杂志正大力发展新订户。

name: withdrawal
interpret: n.取回，提款；撤退，撤军；收回，撤销
example: 单词 withdrawal 的例句||||The police were forced to make a tactical withdrawal. 警方被迫进行战术撤退。||||They insisted upon a withdrawal of the statement and a public apology. 他们坚持要收回那些话并公开道歉。

name: unbearable
interpret: adj.不能容忍的；忍受不住的
example: 单词 unbearable 的例句||||It is unbearable to be always on thorns. 老是处于焦虑不安的情况中是受不了的。||||The more he thought of it the more unbearable it became. 他越想越觉得无法忍受。

name: deliberately
interpret: adv.审慎地；蓄意地；故意地
example: 单词 deliberately 的例句||||The girl gave the show away deliberately. 女孩故意泄露秘密。||||They deliberately shifted off the argument. 他们故意回避这个论点。

name: bruise
interpret: n.青肿，挫伤；伤痕；vt.打青；挫伤
example: 单词 bruise 的例句||||The bruise was caused by a kick. 这伤痕是脚踢的。||||Jack fell down yesterday and got a big bruise on his face. 杰克昨天摔了一跤，脸上摔出老大一块淤斑。

name: dilemma
interpret: n.困境，进退两难的局面
example: 单词 dilemma 的例句||||I am on the horns of a dilemma about the matter. 这件事使我进退两难。||||He was thrown into a dilemma. 他陷入困境。

name: concise
interpret: adj.简洁的，简明的
example: 单词 concise 的例句||||The explanation in this dictionary is concise and to the point. 这部词典里的释义简明扼要。||||I gave a concise answer about this. 我对于此事给了一个简要的答复。

name: expertise
interpret: n.专门知识(或技能等)，专长
example: 单词 expertise 的例句||||We were amazed at his expertise on the ski slopes. 他斜坡滑雪的技能使我们赞叹不已。||||You really have the technical expertise in a new breakthrough. 你真正在专业技术上有了一个全新的突破。

name: hover
interpret: vi.翱翔，盘旋；徘徊；彷徨，犹豫；n.徘徊；盘旋；犹豫；vt.孵；徘徊在…近旁
example: 单词 hover 的例句||||You don't hover round the table. 你不要围着桌子走来走去。||||A plane is hovering on our house. 有一架飞机在我们的房子上盘旋。

name: investigation
interpret: n.调查，调查研究
example: 单词 investigation 的例句||||In an investigation, a new fact became known, which told against him. 在调查中新发现了一件对他不利的事实。||||He drew the conclusion by building on his own investigation. 他根据自己的调查研究作出结论。

name: longitude
interpret: n.经线，经度
example: 单词 longitude 的例句||||The city is at longitude 21° east. 这个城市位于东经21度。||||He noted the latitude and longitude, then made a mark on the admiralty chart. 他记下纬度和经度，然后在航海图上做了个标记。

name: steward
interpret: n.乘务员，服务员；看管人；膳食管理员
example: 单词 steward 的例句||||He's the steward of the club. 他是这家俱乐部的管理员。||||He went around the world as a ship's steward. 他当客船服务员，到过世界各地。

name: stewardess
interpret: n.空中小姐，女乘务员
example: 单词 stewardess 的例句||||Please show your ticket to the stewardess when you board the plane. 登机时请向空中小姐出示机票。||||The stewardess hurried the passengers onto the plane. 空中小姐催乘客赶快登机。

name: unwilling
interpret: adj.不情愿的
example: 单词 unwilling 的例句||||The natives were unwilling to be bent by colonial power. 土著居民不愿受殖民势力的摆布。||||His tightfisted employer was unwilling to give him a raise. 他那吝啬的雇主不肯给他加薪。

name: swell
interpret: vi.膨胀，肿胀；增长，增强
example: 单词 swell 的例句||||The waves had taken on a deep swell. 海浪汹涌。||||His injured wrist began to swell. 他那受伤的手腕开始肿了。

name: knight
interpret: n.骑士，武士；爵士
example: 单词 knight 的例句||||He was made an honourary knight. 他被授予荣誉爵士称号。||||A knight rode on his richly caparisoned steed. 一个骑士骑在装饰华丽的马上。

name: posture
interpret: n.姿势，姿态，心态，态度；vt.作出某种姿势；vi.摆姿势
example: 单词 posture 的例句||||The government adopted an uncompromising posture on the issue of independence. 政府在独立这一问题上采取了毫不妥协的态度。||||He tore off his coat and assumed a fighting posture. 他脱掉上衣，摆出一副打架的架势。

name: subjective
interpret: a.主观(上)的，个人的
example: 单词 subjective 的例句||||The way they interpreted their past was highly subjective. 他们解释其过去的方式太主观。||||A literary critic should not be too subjective in his approach. 文学评论家的看法不应太主观。

name: buffet
interpret: n.自助餐；饮食柜台；餐台；adj.自助的；自助餐的；vt.与…搏斗；连续猛击；vi.斗争；奋勇前进
example: 单词 buffet 的例句||||Are you having a sit-down meal or a buffet at the wedding? 你想在婚礼中摆桌宴还是搞自助餐？||||Could you tell me what specialties you have for the buffet? 你能告诉我你们的自助餐有什么特色菜吗？

name: fiber
interpret: n.纤维，纤维质
example: 单词 fiber 的例句||||The basic structural unit of yarn is the fiber. 纤维是纱的基本结构单元。||||The material must be free of fiber clumps. 这种材料必须无纤维块。

name: mansion
interpret: n.大厦，大楼；宅第
example: 单词 mansion 的例句||||The old mansion was built in 1850. 这座古宅建于1850年。||||The mansion has extensive grounds. 这大厦四周的庭园广阔。

name: champagne
interpret: n.香槟酒；微黄色
example: 单词 champagne 的例句||||There were two glasses of champagne on the tray. 托盘里有两杯香槟酒。||||They sat there swilling champagne. 他们坐在那里大喝香槟酒。

name: sip
interpret: vt.&vi.小口地喝，抿，呷；n.一小口的量
example: 单词 sip 的例句||||She took a sip of the cocktail. 她啜饮一口鸡尾酒。||||Elizabeth took a sip of the hot coffee. 伊丽莎白呷了一口热咖啡。

name: weird
interpret: adj.古怪的，离奇的；怪诞的，神秘而可怕的
example: 单词 weird 的例句||||From his weird behaviour, he seems a bit of an oddity. 从他不寻常的行为看来，他好像有点怪。||||His weird clothes really gas me. 他的怪衣裳简直笑死人。

name: hint
interpret: n.暗示，示意；[pl]建议；线索，迹象；vi.暗示；vt.暗示；示意
example: 单词 hint 的例句||||He gave me a hint that I was being cheated. 他暗示我在受人欺骗。||||He quickly took the hint. 一点他就明白了。

name: eyebrow
interpret: n.眉毛，眉
example:
单词 eyebrow 的例句||||He doesn't like his eyebrows。他不喜欢他的眉毛。
||||With an eyebrow raised, he seemed divided between surprise and amusement. 他一只眉毛扬了扬，似乎既感到吃惊，又觉有趣。

name: unaware
interpret: adj.不知道的，未意识到的；adv.意外地；不知不觉地
example: 单词 unaware 的例句||||They were unaware that war was near. 他们不知道战争即将爆发。|||| I was unaware of the man's presence. 我没有察觉到那人在场。

name: cosmetic
interpret: n.化妆品；adj.化妆用的；装门面的；装饰性的
example: 单词 cosmetic 的例句||||These changes are purely cosmetic. 这些改变纯粹是装饰门面。||||Laughter is the best cosmetic, so grin and wear it! 微笑是最好的化妆品，所以请尽情微笑吧！

name: determined
interpret: adj.坚定的；有决心的；v.决定；断定（determine的过去分词）
example: 单词 determined 的例句||||I have determined on going to Tibet after graduation. 我已决定毕业后去西藏。||||He determined to view the rooms behind the office. 他决定查看一下办公室后面的房间。

name: countless
interpret: adj.无数的，多得不计其数的
example: 单词 countless 的例句||||In the war countless innocent people lost their lives. 在这场战争中无数无辜的人丧失了性命。||||I've told you countless times. 我已经告诉你无数遍了。

name: fume
interpret: n.(usu pl.)(浓烈或难闻的)烟，气，汽
example: 单词 fume 的例句||||The pressure of fume in chimney increases slowly from top to bottom. 烟道内压力自上而下逐渐增加。||||Your harsh words put her in a fume. 你那些难听的话使她生气了。

name: grumble
interpret: vi.抱怨；咕哝；n.抱怨，牢骚；咕哝，隆隆声
example: 单词 grumble 的例句||||I don't want to hear another grumble from you. 我不愿再听到你的抱怨。||||He could do nothing but grumble over the situation. 他除了埋怨局势之外别无他法。

name: ozone
interpret: n.臭氧，新鲜空气
example: 单词 ozone 的例句||||The ozone layer is a protective layer around the planet Earth. 臭氧层是地球的保护层。||||The capacity of ozone can adjust according of requirement. 臭氧的产量可根据需要调节。

name: cape
interpret: n.海角，岬；披肩，短披风
example: 单词 cape 的例句||||I long for a trip to the Cape of Good Hope. 我渴望到好望角去旅行。||||She was wearing a cape over her dress. 她在外套上披着一件披肩。

name: get-together
interpret: n.(使)聚集；(使)集合
example: 单词 get-together 的例句||||Well, Miss Huang, we are planning to have a casual get-together. 嗯，黄小姐，我们打算大家小聚一番。||||Will you help me prepare for the get-together of the old classmates? 你能否帮我为这次老同学聚会做好准备工作？

name: ragged
interpret: adj.衣衫褴褛的，粗糙的，刺耳的
example: 单词 ragged 的例句||||A ragged shout went up from the small crowd. 这一小群人发出了刺耳的喊叫。||||Ragged clothing infers poverty. 破衣烂衫意味着贫穷。

name: apron
interpret: n.围裙；工作裙
example: 单词 apron 的例句||||We were waited on by a pretty girl in a pink apron. 招待我们的是一位穿粉红色围裙的漂亮姑娘。||||She stitched a pocket on the new apron. 她在新围裙上缝上一只口袋。

name: shrub
interpret: n.灌木，灌木丛
example: 单词 shrub 的例句||||There is a small evergreen shrub on the hillside. 山腰上有一小块常绿灌木丛。||||Moving a shrub is best done in early spring. 移植灌木最好是在初春的时候。

name: huddle
interpret: vi.挤作一团；蜷缩；vt.聚集；n.挤在一起的人
example: 单词 huddle 的例句||||They like living in a huddle. 他们喜欢杂居在一起。||||The cold wind made the boy huddle inside his coat. 寒风使这个男孩卷缩在他的外衣里。

name: alley
interpret: n.小巷，胡同；小径，小路
example: 单词 alley 的例句||||We live in the same alley. 我们住在同一条小巷里。||||The blind alley ended in a brick wall. 这条死胡同的尽头是砖墙。

name: numb
interpret: adj.麻木的，失去感觉的；vt.使麻木
example: 单词 numb 的例句||||His fingers were numb with cold. 他的手冻得发麻。||||Numb with cold, we urged the weary horses forward. 我们冻得发僵，催着疲惫的马继续往前走。

name: refund
interpret: vt.&vi.退还，偿还；n.归还，偿还额，退款
example: 单词 refund 的例句||||They demand a refund on unsatisfactory goods. 他们对不满意的货品要求退款。||||We'll refund your money if you aren't satisfied. 你若不满意，我们愿意退款给你。

name: psychology
interpret: n.心理，心理学，心理状态
example: 单词 psychology 的例句||||She has a background in child psychology. 她受过儿童心理学的教育。||||He studied philosophy and psychology at Cambridge. 他在剑桥大学学习哲学和心理学。

name: ridge
interpret: n.山脊；鼻梁；分水岭
example: 单词 ridge 的例句||||We clambered up the hillside to the ridge above. 我们沿着山坡费力地爬上了山脊。||||The infantry were advancing to attack the ridge. 步兵部队正在向前挺进攻打山脊。

name: sniff
interpret: vi.嗅…味道；抽鼻涕；对嗤之以鼻，蔑视
example: 单词 sniff 的例句||||The police used dogs to sniff out the criminals in their hiding place. 警察使用警犬查出了罪犯的藏身地点。||||When Munchie meets a dog on the beach, they sniff each other for a while. 当麦奇在海滩上碰到另一条狗的时候，他们会彼此嗅一会儿。

name: syndrome
interpret: n.综合病症；并存特性
example: 单词 syndrome 的例句||||The Institute says that an unidentified virus is to blame for the syndrome. 该研究所表示，引起这种综合症的是一种尚未确认的病毒。||||Results indicated that 11 fetuses had Down syndrome. 结果表明有11个胎儿患有唐氏综合征。

name: abortion
interpret: n.流产，堕胎
example: 单词 abortion 的例句||||She had an abortion at the women's health clinic. 她在妇女保健医院做了流产手术。||||A number of considerations have led her to have a wilful abortion. 多种考虑使她执意堕胎。

name: accustom
interpret: vt.使适应，使习惯
example: 单词 accustom 的例句||||It took him a while to accustom himself to the idea. 他过了一段时间才习惯这个想法。||||It'shouldn't take long to accustom your students to working in groups. 你的学生应该很快就会习惯分组学习的。

name: appreciation
interpret: n.评价；欣赏；感谢；领会，理解；价格上涨
example: 单词 appreciation 的例句||||I would like to express my appreciation and thanks to you all. 我想对你们所有人表达我的感激和谢意。||||I'll be sending them a donation in appreciation of their help. 我将送给他们一笔捐款以感谢他们的帮助。

name: catastrophe
interpret: n.大灾难，大祸
example: 单词 catastrophe 的例句||||I owe it to you that I survived the catastrophe. 亏得你我才大难不死。||||This is a catastrophe beyond human control. 这是一场人类无法控制的灾难。

name: brass
interpret: n.黄铜；黄铜器，铜管乐器
example: 单词 brass 的例句||||Many of the workers play in the factory's brass band. 许多工人都在工厂铜管乐队中演奏。||||Brass is formed by the fusion of copper and zinc. 黄铜是通过铜和锌的熔合而成的。

name: dread
interpret: vt.担忧，忧虑；惧怕，不敢；n.担忧，畏惧
example: 单词 dread 的例句||||We all dread to think what will happen if the company closes. 我们都不敢去想一旦公司关门我们该怎么办。||||Her heart was relieved of its blankest dread. 她极度恐惧的心理消除了。

name: fragrant
interpret: adj.芬香的，馥郁的，愉快的
example: 单词 fragrant 的例句||||The Fragrant Hills are exceptionally beautiful in late autumn. 深秋的香山格外美丽。||||The air was fragrant with lavender. 空气中弥漫薰衣草香。

name: imperative
interpret: n.命令，需要；规则；祈使语气；adj.强制的；紧急的
example: 单词 imperative 的例句||||He always speaks in an imperative tone of voice. 他老是用命令的口吻讲话。||||The events of the past few days make it imperative for her to act. 过去这几天发生的事迫使她不得不立即行动。

name: metropolitan
interpret: adj.大城市的，大都会的
example: 单词 metropolitan 的例句||||Metropolitan buildings become taller than ever. 大城市的建筑变得比以前更高。||||Metropolitan residents are used to fast rhythm. 大都市的居民习惯于快节奏。

name: persuasion
interpret: n.劝说；说服；持有某种信仰的宗派
example: 单词 persuasion 的例句||||He decided to leave only after much persuasion. 经过多方劝说，他才决定离开。||||After a lot of persuasion, she agreed to go. 经过多次劝说后，她同意去了。

name: random
interpret: adj.随机的；任意的；n.偶然的(或随便的)行动
example: 单词 random 的例句||||The list is arranged in a random order. 名单排列不分先后。||||On random inspection the meat was found to be bad. 经抽查，发现肉变质了。

name: renaissance
interpret: n.复活，复兴，文艺复兴
example: 单词 renaissance 的例句||||The Renaissance was an epoch of unparalleled cultural achievement. 文艺复兴是一个文化上取得空前成就的时代。||||The theme of the conference is renaissance Europe. 大会的主题是文艺复兴时期的欧洲。

name: revolve
interpret: vi.(使)旋转；循环出现
example: 单词 revolve 的例句||||The planets revolve around the sun. 行星绕着太阳运转。||||The wheels began to revolve slowly. 车轮开始慢慢转动。

name: steadily
interpret: adv.稳定地；不变地；持续地
example: 单词 steadily 的例句||||The scope of man's use of natural resources will steadily grow. 人类利用自然资源的广度将日益扩大。||||Our educational reform was steadily led onto the correct path. 我们的教学改革慢慢上轨道了。

name: premier
interpret: adj.首要的；n.总理，首相
example: 单词 premier 的例句||||The Irish Premier is paying an official visit to Britain. 爱尔兰总理正在对英国进行正式访问。||||He requested that the premier grant him an internview. 他要求那位总理接见他一次。

name: promising
interpret: adj.有希望的，有前途的
example: 单词 promising 的例句||||The results of the experiments are very promising. 实验的结果充满了希望。||||We're trying to bring along one or two promising young swimmers. 我们正设法培养出一两名有前途的年轻游泳选手。

name: prosper
interpret: vi.成功，兴隆，昌盛；荣vt.使……成功；使……昌盛；使……繁荣
example: 单词 prosper 的例句||||With her at the wheel, the company began to prosper. 有了她当主管，公司开始兴旺起来。||||It is my earnest wish that this company will continue to prosper. 我真诚希望这家公司会继续兴旺发达。

name: puff
interpret: n.一口(气)；一阵(风)； 粉扑；泡芙；蓬松；vt.喷出，张开；使膨胀；夸张；使骄傲自满；vi.膨胀；张开；鼓吹；夸张
example: 单词 puff 的例句||||He took a puff at his cigarette. 他吸了一口香烟。||||They tried their best to puff the book they published. 他们尽力吹捧他们出版的书。

name: rumour
interpret: n.谣言，谣传，传闻
example: 单词 rumour 的例句||||I should like to know who put that rumour about. 我想知道是谁散布了那谣言。||||There has been a rumour mill on him for years. 几年来，一直有谣言产生，对他进行中伤。

name: troublemaker
interpret: n.惹是生非者，闹事者，捣乱者
example: 单词 troublemaker 的例句||||I would hate you to think me a troublemaker. 我不愿你认为我是个搬弄是非的人。||||Li Yang has always been a troublemaker. 李阳总是制造麻烦。

name: activist
interpret: n.活动分子，积极分子
example: 单词 activist 的例句||||He's been a trade union activist for many years. 多年来他一直是工会的积极分子。||||He is a social activist in our factory. 他是我厂的社会活动积极分子。

name: carbohydrate
interpret: n.碳水化合物；糖类；(plural)淀粉质或糖类
example: 单词 carbohydrate 的例句||||You should not have too much carbohydrate in your diet. 你日常饮食中不该有过多碳水化合物。||||Cashew nuts are rich in carbohydrate. 腰果含丰富碳水化合物。

name: delegation
interpret: n.代表团；派遣
example: 单词 delegation 的例句||||The statement of our delegation was singularly appropriate to the occasion. 我们代表团的声明非常适合时宜。||||We shall inform you of the date of the delegation's arrival. 我们将把代表团到达的日期通知你。

name: ethnic
interpret: adj.人种的，种族的，异教徒的
example: 单词 ethnic 的例句||||This music would sound more ethnic if you played it in steel drums. 如果你用钢鼓演奏，这首乐曲将更具民族特色。||||The plan is likely only to aggravate ethnic frictions. 这一方案很有可能只会加剧种族冲突。

name: prior
interpret: adj.更重要的，较早的，在先的；adv.居先；n.小修道院院长；大修道院副院长
example: 单词 prior 的例句||||The duty to protect my sister is prior to all others. 保护我的妹妹是我最重要的责任。||||I took up one-year prior course in German in this college. 我在这所大学读了一年的德语预科。

name: bulk
interpret: n.容积，体积；大块，大批；大部分，大多数；vt. 使扩大，使形成大量；使显得重要
example: 单词 bulk 的例句||||The bulk of the population concentrates in the cities. 大部分人口集中在城市里。||||Your money could bulk up to a fortune if you save everything you can. 如果你尽可能节约的话，你会积蓄一笔财富。

name: interpretation
interpret: n.解释，说明，描述；艺术处理
example: 单词 interpretation 的例句||||His statement admits of one interpretation only. 他的话只有一种解释。||||Analysis and interpretation is a very personal thing. 分析与说明是个很主观的事情。

name: marine
interpret: adj.海的；海生的；航海的；海事的；n.水兵
example: 单词 marine 的例句||||Marine creatures are those which live in the sea. 海洋生物是生存在海里的生物。||||When the war broke out, he volunteered for the Marine Corps. 战争爆发时，他自愿参加了海军陆战队。

name: salute
interpret: vi.行礼，致意，问候，放礼炮；vt.向…致意，迎接，赞扬；n.招呼，敬礼，礼炮
example: 单词 salute 的例句||||Merchant ships salute each other by dipping the flag. 商船互相点旗致敬。||||The Japanese women salute the people with formal bows in welcome. 这些日本妇女以正式的鞠躬向人们施礼以示欢迎。

name: shrug
interpret: n.耸肩；vt.耸肩，(表示怀疑、冷漠、不知等)；vi.耸肩
example: 单词 shrug 的例句||||With a shrug, he went out of the room. 他耸一下肩，走出了房间。||||I admire the way she is able to shrug off unfair criticism. 我很佩服她能对错误的批评意见不予理会。

name: unity
interpret: n.团结，联合，统一；和睦，协调
example: 单词 unity 的例句||||When we speak of unity, we do not mean unprincipled peace. 所谓团结，并非一团和气。||||We must strengthen our unity in the face of powerful enemies. 大敌当前，我们必须加强团结。

name: sketch
interpret: n.草图；梗概；素描；vt.&vi.素描；概述
example: 单词 sketch 的例句||||My sister often goes into the country to sketch. 我姐姐常到乡间去写生。||||I will send you a slight sketch of the house. 我将给你寄去房屋的草图。

name: automobile
interpret: n.汽车，机动车
example: 单词 automobile 的例句||||He is repairing the brake lever of an automobile. 他正在修理汽车的刹车杆。||||The automobile slowed down to go around the curves in the road. 汽车在路上转弯时放慢了速度。

name: landlady
interpret: n.女房东，女地主，女店主
example: 单词 landlady 的例句||||I heard my landlady creeping stealthily up to my door. 我听到我的女房东偷偷地来到我的门前。||||The landlady came over to serve me. 女店主过来接待我。

name: tanker
interpret: n.油轮
example: 单词 tanker 的例句||||The tanker took on 200, 000 barrels of crude oil. 油轮装载了二十万桶原油。||||Heavy seas had pounded the tanker into three parts. 汹涌的巨浪把油轮撞成三载。

name: microcomputer
interpret: n.微型计算机，微机
example: 单词 microcomputer 的例句||||The main frame is the heart of a microcomputer system. 主框架是一个微机系统的核心。||||A microcomputer is a fast and accurate symbol processing system. 微型计算机是一种快速、精确的符号处理系统。

name: bent
interpret: n.爱好，癖好；adj.弯的；决心的，一心的；v.（使）弯曲，屈身(bend的过去式和过去分词)
example: 单词 bent 的例句||||He was fully bent upon the project. 他一心扑在这项计划上。||||We bent over backward to help them. 我们尽了最大努力帮助他们。

name: metallic
interpret: adj.金属的；金属制的；含金属的；产金属的；像金属的
example: 单词 metallic 的例句||||A sharp metallic note coming from the outside frightened me. 外面传来尖锐铿锵的声音吓了我一跳。||||He picked up a metallic ring last night. 昨夜他捡了一个金属戒指。

name: lame
interpret: adj.跛的，(辩解、论据等)无说服力的；vi.变跛；vt.使跛；使成残废
example: 单词 lame 的例句||||The lame man needs a stick when he walks. 那跛脚男子走路时需借助拐棍。||||I don't believe his story. It'sounds a bit lame. 我不信他讲的那一套。他的话听起来有些靠不住。

name: hawk
interpret: n.鹰，骗子；鹰派成员
example: 单词 hawk 的例句||||The hawk swooped down on the rabbit and killed it. 鹰猛地朝兔子扑下来，并把它杀死。||||The hawk snatched the chicken and flew away. 老鹰叼了小鸡就飞走了。

name: skyscraper
interpret: n.摩天大楼
example: 单词 skyscraper 的例句||||The skyscraper towers into the clouds. 那幢摩天大楼高耸入云。||||The skyscraper was wrapped in fog. 摩天楼为雾所笼罩。

name: earnings
interpret: n.工资收人；利润，利益，所得
example: 单词 earnings 的例句||||That old man lives on the earnings of his daughter. 那个老人靠他女儿的收入维持生活。||||Last year there was a 20% decrease in his earnings. 去年他的收入减少了20%。

name: socialist
interpret: n.社会主义者；adj.社会主义的
example: 单词 socialist 的例句||||China is a socialist country, and a developing country as well. 中国是一个社会主义国家,也是一个发展中国家。||||His father was an ardent socialist. 他父亲是一个热情的社会主义者。

name: abrupt
interpret: adj.突然的，意外的；唐突的，鲁莽的
example: 单词 abrupt 的例句||||The river takes an abrupt bend to the west. 这河突然向西转弯。||||His abrupt reply hurt our feelings. 他粗鲁的回答伤了我们的感情。

name: illustrate
interpret: vt.举例说明，阐明；图解，加插图,vi.举例
example: 单词 illustrate 的例句||||The company's bank statements illustrate its success. 这家公司的银行报表说明了它的成功。||||This diagram will illustrate what I mean. 这个图表可说明我的意思。

name: jaw
interpret: n.颚，颌，说教，流言蜚语；v.喋喋不休，教训
example: 单词 jaw 的例句||||He delivered a right hook to his opponent's jaw. 他给了对方下巴一记右钩拳。||||A strong square jaw is a sign of firm character. 强健的方下巴是刚毅性格的标志。

name: sleigh
interpret: n.雪撬；v.用雪撬搬运，乘雪撬
example: 单词 sleigh 的例句||||The sleigh was on one runner,heeling like a yacht in a wind.这架雪橇在一根滑橇上滑行，倾斜得像大风中的一艘快艇。||||They travelled across the snow in a sleigh.他们乘着雪橇在雪地上穿行。

name: junction
interpret: n.连接，接合；交叉点，接合处，枢纽站
example: 单词 junction 的例句||||There's a bridge at the junction of the two rivers. 两河的汇合处有座桥。||||You must give way when you come to this junction. 你到了这个路口必须让路。

name: justify
interpret: vt.证明…正当(或有理)，为…辩护
example: 单词 justify 的例句||||He tried to justify his absence with lame excuses. 他想用站不住脚的借口为自己的缺席辩解。||||Can you justify your rude behavior to me? 你能向我证明你的粗野行为是有道理的吗？

name: margin
interpret: n.页边空白；差额；余地，余裕；边，边缘
example: 单词 margin 的例句||||We allowed a margin of 20 minutes in catching the train. 我们有20分钟的余地赶火车。||||The village is situated at the margin of a forest. 村子位于森林的边缘。

name: negotiation
interpret: n.谈判，协商
example: 单词 negotiation 的例句||||They closed the deal in sugar after a week of negotiation. 经过一星期的谈判，他们的食糖生意成交了。||||The negotiation dragged on until July. 谈判一直拖到7月份。

name: valid
interpret: adj.有确实根据的；有效的；正当的，合法的
example: 单词 valid 的例句||||His claim to own the house is valid. 他主张对此屋的所有权有效。||||Do you have valid reasons for your absence? 你的缺席有正当理由吗？

name: underneath
interpret: adj.在...下面，在...底下；adv.在下面
example: 单词 underneath 的例句||||Working underneath the car is always a messy job. 在汽车底下工作是件脏活。||||She wore a coat with a dress underneath. 她穿着一件大衣，里面套着一条连衣裙。

name: undo
interpret: vt.解开，松开；取消，撤销
example: 单词 undo 的例句||||His pride will undo him some day. 他的傲慢总有一天会毁了他。||||I managed secretly to undo a corner of the parcel. 我悄悄地设法解开了包裹的一角。

name: primitive
interpret: adj.原始的；简单的；n.原(始)人，原始事物
example: 单词 primitive 的例句||||It is a primitive instinct to flee a place of danger. 逃离危险的地方是一种原始本能。||||His book describes the march of the civilization of a primitive society. 他的著作描述了一个原始社会的开化过程。

name: scout
interpret: n.童子军，侦察员；vt.侦察，搜索；vi.侦察；巡视；嘲笑
example: 单词 scout 的例句||||He was mistaken for an enemy scout and badly wounded. 他被误认为是敌人的侦察兵，受了重伤。||||The scout made a stealthy approach to the enemy position. 侦察兵偷偷地靠近敌军阵地。

name: proficiency
interpret: n.精通，熟练，精练
example: 单词 proficiency 的例句||||He plied his trade and gained proficiency in it. 他勤习手艺，技术渐渐达到了十分娴熟的地步。||||How do you think of your proficiency in written and spoken English? 你认为你的书面英语和口语熟练程度如何？

name: promotion
interpret: n.提升，晋级；促销，宣传
example: 单词 promotion 的例句||||The teacher conferred with the principal about Dick's promotion. 教师与校长商谈了迪克的升级问题。||||The clerk was given a promotion and an increase in salary. 那个职员升了级，加了薪。

name: vow
interpret: n.誓(言)，誓约；vt.&vi.起誓，立誓
example: 单词 vow 的例句||||My parents are under a vow to go to church every Sunday. 我父母许愿，每星期日都去做礼拜。||||I am under a vow to drink no wine. 我已立誓戒酒。

name: transparent
interpret: adj.明显的，无疑的；透明的
example: 单词 transparent 的例句||||The water is so transparent that we can see the fishes swimming. 水清澈透明，可以看到鱼儿游来游去。||||The window glass is transparent. 窗玻璃是透明的。

name: judgment
interpret: n.审判；判断力，识别力，看法，意见
example: 单词 judgment 的例句||||The chairman flatters himself on his judgment of people. 主席自认为他审视人比别人高明。||||He's a man of excellent judgment. 他眼力过人。

name: boycott
interpret: n./vt.(联合)抵制，拒绝参与
example: 单词 boycott 的例句||||We put the production under a boycott. 我们联合抵制该商品。||||Hahn also called for a boycott of the companies involved. 哈恩还呼吁人们抵制卷入这起风波的科技企业。

name: dense
interpret: adj.密集的，稠密的，浓密的；密度大的
example: 单词 dense 的例句||||The general ambushed his troops in the dense woods. 将军把部队埋伏在浓密的树林里。||||The path was completely covered by the dense foliage. 小路被树叶厚厚地盖了一层。

name: density
interpret: n.密集，密度，浓度
example: 单词 density 的例句||||The population density of that country is 685 per square mile. 那个国家的人口密度为每平方英里685人。||||The region has a very high population density. 该地区的人口密度很高。

name: edible
interpret: n.食品，食物；adj.可食用的
example: 单词 edible 的例句||||Edible wild herbs kept us from dying of starvation. 我们靠着野菜才没被饿死。||||This kind of mushroom is edible, but that kind is not. 这种蘑菇吃得，那种吃不得。

name: copper
interpret: n.铜；铜币；铜器；adj.铜(制)的；(紫)铜色的
example: 单词 copper 的例句||||The students are asked to prove the purity of copper. 要求学生们检验铜的纯度。||||Copper is a good medium for the conduction of heat and electricity. 铜是热和电的良导体。

name: molecule
interpret: n.分子，克分子
example: 单词 molecule 的例句||||A molecule of water is made up of two atoms of hygrogen and one atom of oxygen. 一个水分子是由两个氧原子和一个氢原子组成的。||||This gives us the structural formula of the molecule. 这种方式给出了分子的结构式。

name: silicon
interpret: n.硅(旧名矽)
example: 单词 silicon 的例句||||This company pioneered the use of silicon chip. 这家公司开创了使用硅片的方法。||||A chip is a piece of silicon about the size of a postage stamp. 芯片就是一枚邮票大小的硅片。

name: worthy
interpret: adj.(of)值得的，配得上的；有价值的
example: 单词 worthy 的例句||||I did not esteem him to be worthy of trust. 我认为他不值得信赖。||||There occurred nothing that was worthy to be mentioned. 没有值得一提的事发生。

name: addict
interpret: vt.使沉溺；使上瘾；n.沉溺于不良嗜好的人
example: 单词 addict 的例句||||He became gambling addict, and lost all his possessions. 他习染上了赌博，最终输掉了全部家产。||||He assisted a drug addict to escape from drug but failed firstly. 一开始他帮助一个吸毒者戒毒但失败了。

name: heroin
interpret: n.海洛因
example: 单词 heroin 的例句||||Customs have made their biggest ever seizure of heroin. 海关查获了有史以来最大的一批海洛因。||||Heroin has been smuggled out by sea. 海洛因已从海上偷运出境。

name: kit
interpret: n.用具包，成套工具；随身携带物
example: 单词 kit 的例句||||The kit consisted of about twenty cosmetic items. 整套工具包括大约20种化妆用品。||||The captain wants to inspect your kit. 船长想检查你的行装。

name: narrative
interpret: n.叙述，故事；adj.叙事的，故事体的
example: 单词 narrative 的例句||||He was a writer of great narrative power. 他是一位颇有记述能力的作家。||||Neither author was very strong on narrative. 两个作者都不是很善于讲故事。

name: isle
interpret: n.小岛，岛
example: 单词 isle 的例句||||He is from the Isle of Man in the Irish Sea. 他来自爱尔兰海的马恩岛。||||The boat left for the paradise isle of Bali. 小船驶向天堂一般的巴厘岛。

name: herd
interpret: n.兽群，牧群；vt.使集中，把…赶在一起
example: 单词 herd 的例句||||She drove the herd of cattle through the wilderness. 她赶着牛群穿过荒野。||||He had no opinions of his own but simply follow the herd. 他从无主见，只是人云亦云。

name: lessen
interpret: vt.减少，减轻；缩小
example: 单词 lessen 的例句||||Regular exercise can help to lessen the pain. 经常运动有助于减轻痛感。||||They've made great effort to lessen the noise of planes. 他们尽力减小飞机的噪音。

name: maple
interpret: n.槭树，枫树，槭木
example: 单词 maple 的例句||||Maple sugar is made from the sap of maple trees. 枫糖是由枫树的树液制成的。||||The maple leaves are tinge with autumn red. 枫叶染上了秋天的红色。

name: physicist
interpret: n.物理学家，研究物理学的人
example: 单词 physicist 的例句||||He is a physicist of the first rank. 他是一流的物理学家。||||The successful physicist never puts on airs. 这位卓有成就的物理学家从不摆架子。

name: skull
interpret: n.头骨；颅骨
example: 单词 skull 的例句||||The skull bones fuse between the ages of fifteen and twenty-five. 头骨在15至25岁之间长合。||||He fell out of the window and cracked his skull. 他从窗子摔了出去，跌裂了颅骨。

name: analytical
interpret: adj.分析的；用分析法的
example: 单词 analytical 的例句||||I have an analytical approach to every survey. 对每项调查我都采用分析方法。||||As a result, analytical data obtained by analysts were often in disagreement. 结果各个分析家所得的分析数据常常不一致。

name: technological
interpret: adj.技术的；工艺的
example: 单词 technological 的例句||||A successful company must keep up with the pace of technological change. 一家成功的公司必须得跟上技术变革的步伐。||||Today, the pace of life is increasing with technological advancements. 当今，随着科技进步，生活节奏不断增快。

name: transistor
interpret: n.晶体管，晶体管收音机
example: 单词 transistor 的例句||||This make of transistor radio is small and beautifully designed. 这半导体收音机小巧玲珑。||||Every transistor has at least three electrodes. 每个晶体管至少有三个电极。

name: anti-
interpret: pref.[前缀]表示反抗，排斥
example: 单词 anti- 的例句||||The car has many safety features, including anti-skid braking. 这车配有许多特别安全装置，包括防滑制动器。||||The anti-aircraft units opened fire and hit two of the enemy planes. 防空部队开炮，击中了两架敌机。

name: fabric
interpret: n.织物，织品，布；构造，结构，组织
example: 单词 fabric 的例句||||The fabric will spot easily. 这种织品很容易玷污。||||I don't like the pattern on the fabric. 我不喜欢那块布料上的图案。

name: applicant
interpret: n.申请人，求职者，请求者
example: 单词 applicant 的例句||||He was the hundredth applicant for the job. 他是第100个申请这项工作的人。||||In my estimation, the applicant is well qualified for this job. 据我看，这位应征者完全具备这项工作的条件。

name: aspiration
interpret: n.志向，志趣抱负；渴望；(语)送气音；吸出
example: 单词 aspiration 的例句||||Man's aspiration should be as lofty as the stars. 人的志气应当象天上的星星那么高。||||Young Addison had a strong aspiration to be an inventor. 年幼的爱迪生渴望成为一名发明家。

name: axis
interpret: n.轴，轴线，中心线；坐标轴，基准线
example: 单词 axis 的例句||||The earth's axis is the line between the North and South Poles. 地轴是南北极之间的线。||||The axis of a circle is its diameter. 圆的轴线是其直径。

name: commonwealth
interpret: n.共和国，联邦，共同体
example: 单词 commonwealth 的例句||||He is the chairman of the commonwealth of artists. 他是艺术家协会的主席。||||Most of the members of the Commonwealth are nonwhite. 英联邦的许多成员国不是白人国家。

name: complement
interpret: n.补足物，船上的定员；补语；vt.补充，补足
example: 单词 complement 的例句||||The two suggestions complement each other. 这两条建议相互补充。||||They oppose each other also complement each other. 它们相辅相成。

name: feat
interpret: n.功绩；武艺，技艺；adj.灵巧的，漂亮的，合适的
example: 单词 feat 的例句||||Man's first landing on the moon was a feat of great daring. 人类首次登月是一个勇敢的壮举。||||He received a medal for his heroic feat. 他因其英雄业绩而获得一枚勋章。

name: forum
interpret: n.论坛，讨论会
example: 单词 forum 的例句||||They're holding a forum on new ways of teaching history. 他们正在举行历史教学讨论会。||||The organisation would provide a forum where problems could be discussed. 这个组织将提供一个可以讨论问题的平台。

name: ministry
interpret: n.(政府的)部；牧师
example: 单词 ministry 的例句||||They sent a deputation to the ministry to complain. 他们派了一个代表团到部里投诉。||||We probed the Air Ministry statements. 我们调查了空军部的报告。

name: qualitative
interpret: adj.性质上的，质的，定性的
example: 单词 qualitative 的例句||||There are qualitative differences in the way children and adults think. 孩子和成年人的思维方式有质的不同。||||Arms races have a quantitative and a qualitative aspects. 军备竞赛具有数量和质量两个方面。

name: prescription
interpret: n.处方，开药；指示，规定
example: 单词 prescription 的例句||||The physician made a prescription against sea-sickness for him. 医生给他开了个治晕船的药方。||||The drug is available on prescription only. 这种药只能凭处方购买。

name: unemployed
interpret: adj.失业的，没有工作的；未动用的，闲置的
example: 单词 unemployed 的例句||||There are now over four million unemployed workers in this country. 这个国家现有四百万失业人员。|||| The unemployed hunger for jobs. 失业者渴望得到工作。

name: vertical
interpret: adj.垂直的，顶点的，纵向的；n.垂直物，垂直的位置
example: 单词 vertical 的例句||||The northern side of the mountain is almost vertical. 这座山的北坡几乎是垂直的。||||Vertical air motions are not measured by this system. 垂直气流的运动不用这种系统来测量。

name: ward
interpret: n.守卫，监护，病房，行政区，由监护人或法院保护的人（尤指儿童）；vt.守护，躲开
example: 单词 ward 的例句||||The hospital has a medical ward and a surgical ward. 这家医院有内科病房和外科病房。||||During the evening picnic, I'll carry a torch to ward off the bugs. 傍晚野餐时，我要点根火把，抵挡蚊虫。

name: warehouse
interpret: n.仓库；vt.存入仓库
example: 单词 warehouse 的例句||||We freighted the goods to the warehouse by truck. 我们用卡车把货物运到仓库。||||The manager wants to clear off the old stocks in the warehouse. 经理想把仓库里积压的存货处理掉。

name: vice
interpret: n.坏事；恶习；[pl.]台钳，老虎钳；adj.副的
example: 单词 vice 的例句||||He guarded himself against vice. 他避免染上坏习惯。||||They are sunk in the depth of vice. 他们堕入了罪恶的深渊。

name: virtue
interpret: n.德行，美德；贞操；优点；功效，效力
example: 单词 virtue 的例句||||He was considered to be a paragon of virtue. 他被认为是品德尽善尽美的典范。||||You need to decorate your mind with virtue. 你应该用德行美化心灵。

name: allocate
interpret: vt.分配，分派；把…拨给；把…划归
example: 单词 allocate 的例句||||You must allocate the money carefully. 你们必须谨慎地分配钱。||||They will allocate fund for housing. 他们将拨出经费建房。

name: authentic
interpret: adj.真的，真正的；可靠的，可信的，有根据的
example: 单词 authentic 的例句||||This is an authentic news report. We can depend on it. 这是篇可靠的新闻报道，我们相信它。|||| Autumn is also the authentic season of renewal. 秋天才是真正的除旧布新的季节。

name: attain
interpret: vt.达到，获得，完成
example: 单词 attain 的例句||||I used the scientific method to attain this end. 我用科学的方法来达到这一目的。||||His painstaking to attain his goal in life is praiseworthy. 他为实现人生目标所下的苦功是值得称赞的。

name: implement
interpret: n.(pl.)工具，器具；vt.实行，实施，执行
example: 单词 implement 的例句||||Don't undertake a project unless you can implement it. 不要承担一项计划，除非你能完成这项计划。||||The best implement for digging a garden is a spade. 在花园里挖土的最好工具是铁锹。

name: inadequate
interpret: adj.(for,to)不充足的，不适当的
example: 单词 inadequate 的例句||||The supply is inadequate to meet the demand. 供不应求。||||She was inadequate to the demands that were made on her. 她还无力满足对她提出的各项要求。

name: machinery
interpret: n.(总称)机械，机器；机构
example: 单词 machinery 的例句||||Has the machinery been put up ready for the broadcast? 广播器材安装完毕了吗？||||Machinery ought to be well maintained all the time. 机器应该随时注意维护。

name: latitude
interpret: n.纬度，行动或言论的自由(范围)，(pl.)地区
example: 单词 latitude 的例句||||The latitude of the island is 20 degrees south. 该岛的纬度是南纬20度。||||The two cities are at approximately the same latitude. 这两个城市差不多位于同一纬度上。

name: lavatory
interpret: n.盥洗室，厕所
example: 单词 lavatory 的例句||||Is there any lavatory in this building? 这座楼里有厕所吗？|||The use of the lavatory has been suspended during take-off. 在飞机起飞期间，盥洗室暂停使用。

name: naval
interpret: adj.海军的，军舰的，船的
example: 单词 naval 的例句||||He took part in a great naval battle. 他参加了一次大海战。||||The harbour is an important naval base. 该港是一个重要的海军基地。

name: radar
interpret: n.雷达，无线电探测器
example: 单词 radar 的例句||||They are following the flight of an aircraft by radar. 他们正在用雷达追踪一架飞机的飞行。||||Enemy ships were detected on the radar. 敌舰的影像已显现在雷达上。

name: warfare
interpret: n.战争(状态)；斗争；冲突
example: 单词 warfare 的例句||||He addressed the audience on the subject of atomic warfare. 他向听众演讲有关原子战争的问题。||||Their struggle consists mainly in peasant guerrilla warfare. 他们的斗争主要是农民游击战。

name: waterproof
interpret: n.防水材料；adj.防水的；vt.使...能防水
example: 单词 waterproof 的例句||||My mother bought me a waterproof watch. 我妈妈给我买了一块防水手表。||||All the electronics are housed in a waterproof box. 所有电子设备都储放在一个防水盒中。

name: alloy
interpret: n.合金，(金属的)成色
example: 单词 alloy 的例句||||The company produces titanium alloy. 该公司生产钛合金。||||Bronze is an alloy of copper and tin. 青铜是铜和锡的合金。

name: aluminum
interpret: n.(aluminium)铝
example: 单词 aluminum 的例句||||The aluminum sheets cannot be too much thicker than 0. 04 inches. 铝板厚度不能超过0. 04英寸。|||| During the launch phase, it would ride in a protective aluminum shell. 在发射阶段，它盛在一只保护的铝壳里。

name: elastic
interpret: n.橡皮圈，松紧带；adj.有弹性的；灵活的
example: 单词 elastic 的例句||||Rubber is an elastic material. 橡胶是一种弹性材料。||||These regulations are elastic. 这些规定是有弹性的。

name: compensate
interpret: vt.补偿，赔偿；酬报 vi.弥补；补偿；抵消
example: 单词 compensate 的例句||||She used her good looks to compensate her lack of intelligence. 她利用她漂亮的外表来弥补智力的不足。||||Nothing can compensate for the loss of one's health. 一个人失去了键康是不可弥补的。

name: competence
interpret: n.能力，胜任，称职
example: 单词 competence 的例句||||This mess is a poor reflection on his competence. 这种混乱情况说明他难当此任。||||These are matters within the competence of the court. 这些是法院权限以内的事。

name: consultant
interpret: n.顾问；会诊医师，专科医生
example: 单词 consultant 的例句||||He is a consultant on law affairs to the mayor. 他是市长的一个法律顾问。||||Originally, Gar had agreed to come up as a consultant. 原来，加尔只答应来充当我们的顾问。

name: cater
interpret: vi.(for/to)满足，迎合；(for)提供饮食及服务
example: 单词 cater 的例句||||I expect he will be able to cater for your particular needs. 我预计他能满足你的特殊需要。|||| Most schools cater for children of different abilities. 大多数学校能够满足具有不同天资的儿童的需要。

name: civilian
interpret: adj.平民的，民用的，民众的
example: 单词 civilian 的例句||||There is no reliable information about civilian casualties. 关于平民的伤亡还没有确凿的信息。||||He resigned his commission to take up a civilian job. 他辞去军职而从事平民工作。

name: chaos
interpret: n.混乱，无秩序
example: 单词 chaos 的例句||||After the failure of electricity supply the city was in chaos. 停电后，城市一片混乱。||||The typhoon left chaos behind it. 台风后一片混乱。

name: collapse
interpret: vi.累倒；昏倒；倒塌；塌陷
example: 单词 collapse 的例句||||The country's economy is on the verge of collapse. 国家的经济已到了崩溃的边缘。||||The engineer made a complete diagnosis of the bridge's collapse. 工程师对桥的倒塌做了一次彻底的调查分析。

name: consensus
interpret: n.(意见等的)一致，一致同意，共识
example: 单词 consensus 的例句||||Can we reach a consensus on this issue? 我们能在这个问题上取得一致意见吗？||||What is the consensus of opinion at the afternoon meeting? 下午会议上一致的意见是什么？

name: corrupt
interpret: vi.贿赂，收买；vt.使腐烂；使堕落，使恶化；adj.腐败的，贪污的
example: 单词 corrupt 的例句||||The newspaper alleged the mayor's corrupt practices. 那家报纸断言市长有舞弊行为。||||This judge is corrupt. 这个法官贪污。

name: component
interpret: n.组成部分，成分，元件；adj.组成的，合成的
example: 单词 component 的例句||||Each component is carefully checked before assembly. 每个零件在装配前都经过仔细检查。||||Blade and handle are the component parts of a knife. 刀身和刀柄是一把刀的组成部分。

name: compulsory
interpret: n.强制的，必修的；规定的，义务的
example: 单词 compulsory 的例句||||Is English a compulsory subject? 英语是必修课吗？||||Compulsory schooling ends at sixteen. 义务教育至16岁为止。

name: quantitative
interpret: adj.数量的，定量的
example: 单词 quantitative 的例句||||He said it was only a quantitative difference. 他说这仅仅是数量上的差别。||||We need to do some quantitative analysis of the drugs. 我们对药物要进行定量分析。

name: deviate
interpret: vi.(from)背离，偏离；vt.使脱离
example: 单词 deviate 的例句||||Don't deviate from major issues. 不要偏离主要问题。||||I will never deviate from what I believe to be right. 我绝不背离我自信正确的道路。

name: disperse
interpret: vi.使分散；使消失；vt.分散；驱散
example: 单词 disperse 的例句||||The cattle were swinging their tails to disperse the flies. 那些牛甩动着尾巴驱赶苍蝇。||||The children disperse for the holidays. 孩子们放假了。

name: brittle
interpret: adj.易碎的；脆弱的；冷淡的；(声音)尖利的
example: 单词 brittle 的例句||||The pond was covered in a brittle layer of ice. 池塘覆盖了一层易碎的冰。||||She gave a brittle laugh. 她冷淡地笑了笑。

name: donor
interpret: n.捐献者；赠送人；(组织、器官等的)供体
example: 单词 donor 的例句||||In these cases, the recipient usually takes care of the donor afterwards. 在这类情况下，接受捐献者以后通常会照顾捐赠者。||||The Doctor transplanted the donor's heart to Mike's chest cavity. 医生将捐赠者的心脏移植进麦克的胸腔。

name: durable
interpret: adj.持久的，耐久的
example: 单词 durable 的例句||||This raincoat is made of very durable material. 这件雨衣是用非常耐用的料子做的。||||They frequently require more major durable purchases. 他们经常需要购买耐用消费品。

name: constituent
interpret: n.选民；成分，组分；adj.组成的，构成的
example: 单词 constituent 的例句||||Sugar is the main constituent of candy. 食糖是糖果的主要成分。||||Fibre is a natural constituent of a healthy diet. 纤维是健康饮食的天然组成部分。

name: friction
interpret: n.摩擦，摩擦力
example: 单词 friction 的例句||||When Joan returned to work, the friction between them increased. 琼回来工作后，他们之间的摩擦加剧了。||||Friction acts on moving bodies and brings them to a stop. 摩擦力作用于运动着的物体，并使其停止。

name: explicit
interpret: adj.详述的，明确的；坦率的；显然的
example: 单词 explicit 的例句||||She was quite explicit about why she left. 她对自己离去的原因直言不讳。||||He avoids the explicit answer to us. 他避免给我们明确的回答。

name: format
interpret: n.设计，版式；[计算机]格式，DOS命令:格式化(磁盘)；vt.&vi使格式化，设计，安排
example: 单词 format 的例句||||Please format this floppy disc. 请将这张软盘格式化。||||The format of the figure is very tasteful. 该图表的格式很雅致。

name: interval
interpret: n.间隔，间距；幕间休息，中场休息
example: 单词 interval 的例句||||The interval between the two trees measures 40 feet. 这两棵树的间隔是40英尺。||||There was a long interval before he anwsered the telephone. 隔了好久他才回了电话。

name: literally
interpret: adv.照字面意义，逐字地；确实
example: 单词 literally 的例句||||He translated the passage literally. 他逐字逐句地翻译这段文字。||||Sometimes she would not sit down till she was literally faint. 有时候，她不走到真正要昏厥了，决不肯坐下来。

name: misery
interpret: n.痛苦，苦恼，苦难；悲惨的境遇，贫苦
example: 单词 misery 的例句||||Business depression usually causes misery among the working class. 商业不景气常使工薪阶层受苦。||||He has rescued me from the mire of misery. 他把我从苦海里救了出来。

name: pint
interpret: n.品脱
example: 单词 pint 的例句||||I'll have a pint of beer and a packet of crisps, please. 我要一品脱啤酒和一袋炸马铃薯片。||||In the old days you could get a pint of beer for a shilling. 从前，花一先令就可以买到一品脱啤酒。

name: postpone
interpret: vi.延期，推迟；vt.使…延期；把…放在次要地位；把…放在后面
example: 单词 postpone 的例句||||I shall postpone making a decision till I learn full particulars. 在未获悉详情之前我得从缓作出决定。||||She decided to postpone the converastion for that evening. 她决定当天晚上把谈话搁一搁。

name: rigid
interpret: adj.严格的，死板的；刚硬的，僵硬的
example: 单词 rigid 的例句||||She became as rigid as adamant. 她变得如顽石般的固执。||||The examination was so rigid that nearly all aspirants were ruled out. 考试很严，几乎所有的考生都被淘汰了。

name: sector
interpret: n.部门，部分；防御地段，防区；扇形
example: 单词 sector 的例句||||The export sector will aid the economic recovery. 出口产业将促进经济复苏。||||The enemy have attacked the British sector. 敌人已进攻英国防区。

name: straightforward
interpret: adj.正直的，坦率的；易懂的，简单的
example: 单词 straightforward 的例句||||A straightforward talk is better than a flowery speech. 巧言不如直说。||||I must insist on your giving me a straightforward answer. 我一定要你给我一个直截了当的回答。

name: suite
interpret: n.一套(家具)；套房；随从人员
example: 单词 suite 的例句||||She has a suite of rooms in the hotel. 她在那家旅馆有一套房间。||||That is a nice suite of furniture. 那套家具很不错。

name: systematic
interpret: adj.有系统的，有计划的，有方法的
example: 单词 systematic 的例句||||The way he works isn't very systematic. 他的工作不是很有条理。||||The teacher made a systematic work of teaching. 这个教师进行系统的教学工作。

name: remains
interpret: n.剩余物，残留物；遗体，遗迹
example: 单词 remains 的例句||||He ate the remains of food hungrily. 他狼吞虎咽地吃剩余的食物。||||The remains of the meal were fed to the dog. 残羹剩饭喂狗了。

name: mosaic
interpret: n./adj.镶嵌细工的，镶嵌工艺品的，嵌花式的
example: 单词 mosaic 的例句||||The sky this morning is a mosaic of blue and white. 今天早上的天空是幅蓝白相间的画面。||||The image mosaic is a troublesome work. 图象镶嵌是个麻烦的工作。

name: honourable
interpret: adj.可敬的；荣誉的，光荣的
example: 单词 honourable 的例句||||I don't think I am worthy of such an honourable title. 这样的光荣称号，我可担当不起。||||I hope to find an honourable way of settling difficulties. 我希望设法找到一个体面的办法以摆脱困境。

name: sneak
interpret: vt.潜行(隐藏,填石缝)；偷偷摸摸做；n.潜行；adj.暗中进行
example: 单词 sneak 的例句||||He raised his spear and sneaked forward. 他提起长矛悄悄地前进。||||I saw him sneak away from us. 我看见他悄悄地从我们身边走开。

name: overthrow
interpret: vt.推翻，打倒，颠覆；n.推翻，瓦解，颠覆
example: 单词 overthrow 的例句||||After the overthrow of the government, the country was in chaos. 政府被推翻后，这个国家处于混乱中。||||The overthrow of his plans left him much discouraged. 他的计划的失败使得他很气馁。

name: chamber
interpret: n.房间，寝室；会议厅；议院；会所
example: 单词 chamber 的例句||||For many, the dentist's surgery remains a torture chamber. 对许多人来说，牙医的治疗室一直是间受刑室。||||The chamber was ablaze with light. 会议厅里灯火辉煌。

name: cargo
interpret: n.(一只船或一架飞机运载的)货物
example: 单词 cargo 的例句||||The ship has a cargo of about 200 ton. 这条船大约有200吨的货物。||||A lot of people discharged the cargo from a ship. 许多人从船上卸下货物。

name: hatred
interpret: n.憎恶，憎恨，仇恨
example: 单词 hatred 的例句||||He looked at me with hatred in his eyes. 他以憎恨的眼光望着我。||||The old man was seized with burning hatred for the fascists. 老人对法西斯主义者充满了仇恨。

name: generator
interpret: n.发电机，发生器
example: 单词 generator 的例句||||All the while the giant generator poured out its power. 巨大的发电机一刻不停地发出电力。||||This is an alternating current generator. 这是一台交流发电机。

name: illuminate
interpret: vt.照亮，照明；用灯光装饰；说明，阐释
example: 单词 illuminate 的例句||||Dreams kindle a flame to illuminate our dark roads. 梦想点燃火炬照亮我们黑暗的道路。||||They use games and drawings to illuminate their subject. 他们用游戏和图画来阐明他们的主题。

name: inhale
interpret: vt.吸入(气体等)，吸(烟)；vi.吸气
example: 单词 inhale 的例句||||Don't inhale dust into your lung. 别把灰尘吸进肺里。||||They are pleased to not inhale second hand smoke. 他们很高兴他们再也不会吸到二手烟了。

name: intensity
interpret: n.强烈，剧烈；强度；烈度
example: 单词 intensity 的例句||||I didn't realize the intensity of people's feelings on this issue. 我没有意识到这一问题能引起群情激奋。||||The strike is growing in intensity. 罢工日益加剧。

name: isolate
interpret: vt.使孤立，隔离
example: 单词 isolate 的例句||||Do not isolate yourself from others. 不要把自己孤立起来。||||We should never isolate ourselves from the masses. 我们永远不能脱离群众。

name: nucleus
interpret: n.核，核心，原子核
example: 单词 nucleus 的例句||||These young people formed the nucleus of the club. 这些年轻人成了俱乐部的核心。||||These councils would form the nucleus of a future regime. 这些委员会将成为一个未来政权的核心。

name: mechanism
interpret: n.机械装置；机构，结构
example: 单词 mechanism 的例句||||The bones and muscles are parts of the mechanism of the body. 骨骼和肌肉是人体的组成部件。||||The mechanism of the machine is very complicated. 这台机器的结构是非常复杂的。

name: offset
interpret: n.分支，补偿；vt.抵消，补偿；vi.装支管
example: 单词 offset 的例句||||Their wage increases would be offset by higher prices. 他们增加的工资会被物价上涨所抵消。||||He put up his prices to offset the increased cost of materials. 他提高了售价以补偿材料成本的增加。

name: opaque
interpret: adj.不透光的；不反光的，不传导的；晦涩的
example: 单词 opaque 的例句||||The windows are of opaque glass. 这些窗户装着不透明玻璃。||||Their intentions remained opaque. 他们的意图仍然令人费解。

name: orientation
interpret: n.方向，目标；熟悉，适应，情况介绍
example: 单词 orientation 的例句||||Children need some orientation when they go to school. 小孩子上学时需要适应。||||The traveller found his orientation with the aid of a good map. 旅行者借助一幅好地图得知自己的方向。

name: pendulum
interpret: n.摆，钟摆
example: 单词 pendulum 的例句||||The pendulum swung slowly to and fro. 钟摆在慢慢地来回摆动。||||He accidentally found that the desk clock did not swing its pendulum. 他无意中发现座钟不摇摆了。

name: penetrate
interpret: vt.&vi.透(渗)入；刺入，刺穿；洞察，了解
example: 单词 penetrate 的例句||||Western ideas penetrate slowly through the East. 西方观念逐渐传入东方。||||The sunshine could not penetrate where the trees were thickest. 阳光不能透入树木最浓密的地方。

name: overlap
interpret: vt.重叠，与…交叠；vi.部分重叠；部分的同时发生；n.重叠
example: 单词 overlap 的例句||||The overlap between the jacket and the trousers is not good. 夹克和裤子重叠的部分不好看。||||Tiles overlap each other. 屋瓦相互叠盖。

name: petroleum
interpret: n.原油，石油
example: 单词 petroleum 的例句||||The Government of Iran advanced the price of petroleum last week. 上星期伊朗政府提高了石油价格。||||The purpose of oil refinery is to refine crude petroleum. 炼油厂的主要工作是提炼原油。

name: mutual
interpret: adj.相互的，彼此的；共同的，共有的
example: 单词 mutual 的例句||||We must pull together for mutual interest. 我们必须为相互的利益而通力合作。||||Mutual interests tied us together. 相互的利害关系把我们联系在一起。

name: radical
interpret: n.激进份子，原子团，根号；adj.根本的，激进的，彻底的
example: 单词 radical 的例句||||The patient got a radical cure in the hospital. 病人在医院得到了根治。||||She is radical in her demands. 她的要求十分偏激。

name: semiconductor
interpret: n.半导体
example: 单词 semiconductor 的例句||||In the beginning, engineers hoped to use semiconductor lasers. 在开始时，工程师们希望能够利用半导体激光器。||||The main agent of the company brand semiconductor sales. 本公司主要代理各品牌半导体销售。

name: repel
interpret: vt.击退，抵制，拒绝，排斥
example: 单词 repel 的例句||||A country must have the will to repel any invader. 一个国家得有决心击退任何入侵者。||||Particles with similar electric charges repel each other. 电荷同性的分子互相排斥。

name: soluble
interpret: adj.可溶的；可以解决的
example: 单词 soluble 的例句||||These tablets are soluble in water. 这些药片可在水中溶解。||||Camphor is soluble in alcohol. 樟脑在酒精中可以溶化。

name: retention
interpret: n.保留，保持，保持力，记忆力
example: 单词 retention 的例句||||They advocate the retention of our nuclear power plants. 他们主张保留我们的核电厂。||||His retention of energy at this hour is really surprising. 人们惊叹他在这个时候还能保持如此旺盛的精力。

name: specify
interpret: vt.指定，详细说明
example: 单词 specify 的例句||||We should specify a time and a place for the meeting. 我们应指定会议的时间和地点。|||| Please specify what you will do. 请你详述一下你将做什么。

name: rim
interpret: n.(圆物的)边，轮缘；边界
example: 单词 rim 的例句||||The water was even with the rim of the basin. 盆里的水与盆边平齐了。||||She looked at him over the rim of her glass. 她的目光越过玻璃杯的边沿看着他。

name: specimen
interpret: n.样本，标本
example: 单词 specimen 的例句||||You'll need tweezers to hold up the specimen. 你要用镊子来夹这标本。||||This specimen is richly variegated in colour. 这件标本上有很多颜色。

name: texture
interpret: n.(织物)质地；(材料)构造；结构；肌理
example: 单词 texture 的例句||||We could feel the smooth texture of silk. 我们能感觉出丝绸的光滑质地。||||Her skin has a fine texture. 她的皮肤细腻。

name: velocity
interpret: n.速度，速率
example: 单词 velocity 的例句||||Einstein's theory links energy with mass and velocity of light. 爱因斯坦的理论把能量同质量和光速联系起来。||||The velocity of light is about 300000 kilometres per second. 光速约为每秒300000公里。

name: volt
interpret: n.伏特，伏
example: 单词 volt 的例句||||You may use 100 and 110 volt appliances in your room. 您可以在房间使用100及110伏特的电器。||||The common service voltage of electric power in our country is 220/380 volt. 我国普通供电电压为220/380伏。

name: apparently
interpret: adv.显然地；表面上，似乎
example: 单词 apparently 的例句||||An apparently blind alley leads suddenly into an open space. 山穷水尽，豁然开朗。||||He was apparently much surprised at the news. 他对那个消息显然感到十分惊异。

name: excerpt
interpret: n.摘录，选录，节录；vt.引用，摘录；vi.摘录，引用
example: 单词 excerpt 的例句||||This is an excerpt from a novel. 这是一部小说的摘录。||||Can you excerpt something from the newspaper? 你能从报纸上选录些东西吗？

name: lodge
interpret: vt.临时住宿，寄宿，寄存，容纳；vi. 寄宿；临时住宿n.传达室，小旅馆
example: 单词 lodge 的例句||||Is there anywhere that I can lodge in the village tonight? 村里有我今晚过夜的地方吗？||||I shall lodge at the inn for two nights. 我要在这家小店住两个晚上。

name: anonymous
interpret: adj.无名的；匿名的；无特色的
example: 单词 anonymous 的例句||||Sending anonymous letters is a cowardly act. 寄匿名信是懦夫的行为。|||| The author wishes to remain anonymous. 作者希望姓名不公开。

name: artery
interpret: n.干线，要道；动脉
example: 单词 artery 的例句||||We couldn't feel the changes in the blood pressure within the artery. 我们无法感觉到动脉血管内血压的变化。||||The aorta is the largest artery in the body. 主动脉是人体中的最大动脉。

name: cannon
interpret: n.大炮，火炮；飞机上的机关炮
example: 单词 cannon 的例句||||The soldiers fired the cannon. 士兵们开炮。||||The cannon thundered in the hills. 大炮在山间轰鸣。

name: climax
interpret: n.顶点；高潮；vt.&vi.(使)达到顶点
example: 单词 climax 的例句||||The fifth scene was the climax of the play. 第五场是全剧的高潮。||||His quarrel with his father brought matters to a climax. 他与他父亲的争吵使得事态发展到了顶点。

name: fatigue
interpret: n.疲劳，劳累
example: 单词 fatigue 的例句||||The old lady can't bear the fatigue of a long journey. 这位老妇人不能忍受长途旅行的疲劳。||||I have got over my weakness and fatigue. 我已从虚弱和疲劳中恢复过来了。

name: graceful
interpret: adj.优美的，优雅的；得体的
example: 单词 graceful 的例句||||His movements on the parallel bars were very graceful. 他的双杠动作可帅了！||||The ballet dancer is so graceful. 芭蕾舞演员的姿态是如此的优美。

name: foam
interpret: n.泡沫，起泡沫；vi.起泡沫；吐白沫；起着泡沫流；vt.使起泡沫；使成泡沫状物
example: 单词 foam 的例句||||The glass of beer was mostly foam. 这杯啤酒大部分是泡沫。||||The surface of the water is full of foam. 水面都是泡沫。

name: hesitation
interpret: n.犹豫，踌躇
example: 单词 hesitation 的例句||||After a long hesitation, he told the truth at last. 踌躇了半天，他终于直说了。||||There was a certain hesitation in her manner. 她的态度有些犹豫不决。

name: majesty
interpret: n.雄伟，壮丽，庄严，威严；最高权威，王权
example: 单词 majesty 的例句||||The king had unspeakable majesty. 国王有无法形容的威严。||||Your Majesty must make up your mind quickly! 尊贵的陛下，您必须赶快做出决定！

name: loom
interpret: n.织布机，织机；vi.隐现，(危险、忧虑等)迫近；vt.在织布机上织
example: 单词 loom 的例句||||The old woman was weaving on her loom. 那位老太太正在织布机上织布。||||The shuttle flies back and forth on the loom. 织布机上梭子来回飞动。

name: mighty
interpret: adj.强有力的；巨大的
example: 单词 mighty 的例句||||A mighty force was about to break loose. 一股巨大的力量即将迸发而出。||||The mighty iceberg came into view. 巨大的冰山出现在眼前。

name: overflow
interpret: vt.&vi.(使)外溢，(使)溢出；溢出，流出，漫出；n.充满，洋溢；泛滥；超值；溢值
example: 单词 overflow 的例句||||The overflow from the bath ran on to the floor. 浴缸里的水溢到了地板上。||||After a long period of rain, the river may overflow its banks. 长时间的下雨天后，河水可能溢出岸来。

name: murmur
interpret: n.低语，低声的怨言；vi.低语，低声而言；vt.低声说
example: 单词 murmur 的例句||||They paid the extra taxes without a murmur. 他们毫无怨言地交了附加税。||||There was a low murmur of conversation in the hall. 大厅里有窃窃私语声。

name: severely
interpret: adv.严格地；严厉地；非常恶劣地
example: 单词 severely 的例句||||He was severely criticized and removed from his post. 他受到了严厉的批评并且被撤了职。||||He is severely put down for his careless work. 他因工作上的粗心大意而受到了严厉的批评。

name: thigh
interpret: n.大腿；股骨
example: 单词 thigh 的例句||||He is suffering from a strained thigh muscle. 他的大腿肌肉拉伤了，疼得很。||||The thigh bone is connected to the hip bone. 股骨连着髋骨。

name: stimulate
interpret: vt.刺激，使兴奋；激励，使…振奋
example: 单词 stimulate 的例句||||Your encouragement will stimulate me to further efforts. 你的鼓励会激发我进一步努力。||||Success will stimulate the people for fresh efforts. 成功能鼓舞人们去作新的努力。

name: vein
interpret: n.血管，静脉；叶脉，纹理；情绪；vt.使成脉络
example: 单词 vein 的例句||||The girl is not in the vein for singing today. 那女孩今天没有心情唱歌。||||The doctor injects glucose into the patient's vein. 医生把葡萄糖注射入病人的静脉。

name: costly
interpret: adj.昂贵的，价值高的，豪华的
example: 单词 costly 的例句||||It must be very costly to keep up a house like this. 维修这么一幢房子一定很昂贵。||||This dictionary is very useful, only it is a bit costly. 这本词典很有用，只不过贵了些。

name: derive
interpret: vt.取得；导出；引申；来自；源自；出自；vi.起源
example: 单词 derive 的例句||||We derive our sustenance from the land. 我们从土地获取食物。||||We shall derive much benefit from reading good novels. 我们将从优秀小说中获得很大好处。

name: interfere
interpret: vi.(in)干涉，干预；(with)妨碍，打扰；vt.冲突；介入
example: 单词 interfere 的例句||||If we interfere, it may do more harm than good. 如果我们干预的话，可能弊多利少。||||When others interfere in the affair, it always makes troubles. 别人一卷入这一事件，棘手的事情就来了。

name: foul
interpret: adj.污秽的；邪恶的；vt.弄脏；妨害；犯规；vi. 犯规；腐烂；缠结；n.犯规
example: 单词 foul 的例句||||Take off those foul clothes and let me wash them. 脱下那些脏衣服让我洗一洗。||||What a foul day it is! 多么恶劣的天气！

name: peculiar
interpret: adj.古怪的，异常的；特殊的，特有的
example: 单词 peculiar 的例句||||He walks in a peculiar fashion. 他走路的样子很奇特。||||He looked at me with a very peculiar expression. 他用一种很奇怪的表情看着我。

name: controversy
interpret: n.争论，辩论，争吵
example: 单词 controversy 的例句||||That is a fact beyond controversy. 那是一个无可争论的事实。||||We ran the risk of becoming the butt of every controversy. 我们要冒使自己在所有的纷争中都成为众矢之的的风险。

name: disastrous
interpret: adj.灾难性的，造成灾害的；极坏的，很糟的
example: 单词 disastrous 的例句||||The heavy rainstorm caused a disastrous flood. 暴雨成灾。||||Her investment had disastrous consequences. She lost everything she owned. 她的投资结果很惨，血本无归。

name: input
interpret: n.输入(物)；投入；vt.把(数据等)输入计算机
example: 单词 input 的例句||||I will forever be grateful for his considerable input. 我将永远感激他的大量投入。||||All this information had to be input onto the computer. 所有这些信息都必须输入计算机。

name: poke
interpret: n.刺，戳，袋；vt.拨开，刺，戳；vi.戳，刺，捅，搜索，伸出，行动散慢
example: 单词 poke 的例句||||We never thought she would poke her nose into this. 想不到她会插上一手。||||Don't poke fun at me. 别拿我凑趣儿。

name: marvel
interpret: vi.(at)惊叹vt.感到惊异；n.令人惊异的事
example: 单词 marvel 的例句||||The robot is a marvel of modern engineering. 机器人是现代工程技术的奇迹。||||The operation was a marvel of medical skill. 这次手术是医术上的一个奇迹。

name: momentary
interpret: adj.片刻的，瞬息的；短暂的
example: 单词 momentary 的例句||||We are in momentary expectation of the arrival of you. 我们无时无刻不在盼望你的到来。||||I caught a momentary glimpse of them. 我瞥了他们一眼。

name: outlet
interpret: n.出口/路；销路；批发商店；通风口；发泄
example: 单词 outlet 的例句||||The outlet of a water pipe was blocked. 水管的出水口堵住了。||||Running is a good outlet for his energy. 跑步是他发泄过剩精力的好方法。

name: specialty
interpret: n.(speciality)特性，特质；专业，专长
example: 单词 specialty 的例句||||Shell carvings are a specialty of the town. 贝雕是该城的特产。||||His specialty is English literature. 他的专业是英国文学。

name: invaluable
interpret: adj.无价的，非常宝贵的，极为贵重的
example: 单词 invaluable 的例句||||A computer would have been invaluable for this job. 一台计算机对这个工作的作用会是无法估计的。||||This information was invaluable to him. 这个消息对他来说是非常宝贵的。

name: consolidate
interpret: vt.使加固，使加强；(把...)联为一体，合并；vi.巩固，加强
example: 单词 consolidate 的例句||||The two banks will consolidate in July next year. 这两家银行明年7月将合并。||||The government hoped to consolidate ten states to form three new ones. 政府希望把十个州合并成三个新的州。

name: dealer
interpret: n.商人，贩子
example: 单词 dealer 的例句||||The dealer spent hours bargaining for the painting. 那个商人为购买那幅画花了几个小时讨价还价。||||The dealer reduced the price for cash down. 这家商店对付现金的人减价优惠。

name: dual
interpret: adj.双的；二重的，二元的
example: 单词 dual 的例句||||The people's Republic of China does not recognize dual nationality for any Chinese national. 中华人民共和国不承认中国公民具有双重国籍。||||He has dual role as composer and conductor. 他兼作曲家及指挥的双重身分。

name: luxurious
interpret: adj.精美而昂贵的；豪华的
example: 单词 luxurious 的例句||||This is a luxurious car complete with air conditioning and telephone. 这是一辆附有空调设备和电话的豪华轿车。||||The rich man lives in luxurious surroundings. 这位富人生活在奢侈的环境中。

name: module
interpret: n.组件，模块，模件；(航天器的)舱
example: 单词 module 的例句||||The centre module displays traffic guidance information. 中央模块显示交通引导信息。||||Two large tanks in the service module held liquid oxygen. 服务舱的两个大气瓶中装有液态氧。

name: replacement
interpret: n.取代，替换，交换；替代品，代用品
example: 单词 replacement 的例句||||We are hard put to find a replacement for our assistant. 我们很难找到一个人来代替我们的助手。||||They put all the students through the replacement examination. 他们让所有的学生参加分班考试。

name: descend
interpret: vt./vi.传下来，下来，下降
example: 单词 descend 的例句||||I hope the grace of God would descend on me. 我期望上帝的恩惠。||||We're not going to descend to such methods. 我们不会沦落到使用这种手段。

name: groan
interpret: vi./n.呻吟，抱怨；(发出)呻吟般的声音
example: 单词 groan 的例句||||The wounded man uttered a groan. 那个受伤的人发出呻吟。||||The people groan under the burden of taxes. 人民在重税下痛苦呻吟。

name: loyalty
interpret: n.忠诚，忠心
example: 单词 loyalty 的例句||||She told him the truth from a sense of loyalty. 她告诉他真相是出于忠诚。||||His loyalty to his friends was never in doubt. 他对朋友的一片忠心从来没受到怀疑。

name: rehearsal
interpret: n.排练，排演；练习
