example: 单词 rehearsal 的例句||||I want to play you a recording of the rehearsal. 我想给你放一下彩排的录像。||||You can sharpen your skills with rehearsal. 排练可以让技巧更加纯熟。

name: inevitable
interpret: adj.不可避免的，必然发生的
example: 单词 inevitable 的例句||||Mary was wearing her inevitable large hat. 玛丽戴着她总是戴的那顶大帽子。||||The defeat had inevitable consequences for British policy. 战败对英国政策不可避免地产生了影响。

name: minor
interpret: adj.较小(少)的，较次要的；n.辅修学科；vi.辅修
example: 单词 minor 的例句||||The young actor was given a minor part in the new play. 年轻的男演员在这出新戏里被分派担任一个小角色。||||I gave him a minor share of my wealth. 我把小部分财产给了他。

name: plumber
interpret: n.(装修水管的)管子工
example: 单词 plumber 的例句||||Have you asked the plumber to come and look at the leaking pipe? 你叫管道工来检查漏水的管子了吗？||||The plumber screwed up the tap by means of a spanner. 管子工用板手把龙头旋紧。

name: influential
interpret: adj.有影响的，有权势的
example: 单词 influential 的例句||||He always tries to get in with the most influential people. 他总是试图巴结最有影响的人物。||||He is a very influential man in the government. 他在政府中是个很有影响的人物。

name: bacterium
interpret: n.(pl.bacteria )细菌
example: 单词 bacterium 的例句||||The bacterium possibly goes in the human body by the mouth. 细菌可能通过口进入人体。||||A bacterium is identified as the cause for his duodenal ulcer. 一种细菌被断定为造成他十二指肠溃疡的根源。

name: Christian
interpret: adj.基督教徒的；n.基督教徒
example: 单词 Christian 的例句||||They always addressed each other by their Christian name. 他们总是以教名互相称呼。||||His mother is a sincere Christian. 他母亲是个虔诚的基督教徒。

name: ripen
interpret: vt.使成熟；vi.成熟
example: 单词 ripen 的例句||||I'm waiting for the apples to ripen. 我正在等待苹果成熟。||||You can ripen the tomatoes on a sunny windowsill. 把西红柿放在有阳光的窗台上可以让它们成熟。

name: aluminium
interpret: n.铝 (=aluminum)
example: 单词 aluminium 的例句||||Aluminium looks heavy but actually it is very light. 铝看起来很重，实际上却很轻。||||If necessary, we can use aluminium instead of steel. 如果必要，我们可用铝代钢。

name: zinc
interpret: n.锌；vt.在...上镀锌
example: 单词 zinc 的例句||||Brass is formed by the fusion of copper and zinc. 黄铜是通过铜和锌的熔合而成的。||||Zinc is used to protect other metals from corrosion. 锌被用来保护其他金属不受腐蚀。

name: breakdown
interpret: n.垮，衰竭；损坏，故障，倒塌
example: 单词 breakdown 的例句||||She suffered a nervous breakdown. 她患神经衰弱。||||The plane had a breakdown in the air, but it was fortunately removed by the ace pilot. 飞机在空中发生了故障，但幸运的是被王牌驾驶员排除了。

name: tolerance
interpret: n.宽容；容忍，忍受；耐药力；公差
example: 单词 tolerance 的例句||||Tolerance is one of his strengths. 宽容是他的一个优点。||||Human beings have limited tolerance of noise. 人类对噪音的忍耐力有限。

name: auxiliary
interpret: adj.辅助的，备用的
example: 单词 auxiliary 的例句||||I work in an auxiliary unit. 我在一家附属单位工作。||||The hospital has an auxiliary power system in case of blackout. 这家医院装有备用发电系统以防灯火管制。

name: artistic
interpret: adj.艺术(家)的，美术(家)的；善于艺术创作的
example: 单词 artistic 的例句||||The picture on this screen is a good artistic work. 这屏风上的画是件很好的艺术品。||||These artistic handicrafts are very popular with foreign friends. 外国朋友很喜欢这些美术工艺品。

name: concession
interpret: n.让步，妥协；特许(权)
example: 单词 concession 的例句||||We can not make heavy concession to the matter. 我们在这个问题上不能过于让步。||||That is a great concession. 这是很大的让步。

name: dictate
interpret: vt.口授；(使)听写；指令，指示，命令；vi.口述；听写
example: 单词 dictate 的例句||||It took him a long time to dictate this letter. 口述这封信花了他很长时间。||||What right have you to dictate to others? 你有什么资格向别人发号施令？

name: embody
interpret: vt.具体表达，使具体化；包含，收录
example: 单词 embody 的例句||||The latest locomotives embody many new features. 这些最新的机车具有许多新的特色。||||Hemingway's characters plainly embody his own values and view of life. 海明威笔下的角色明确反映出他自己的价值观与人生观。

name: extravagant
interpret: adj.奢侈的；过分的；(言行等)放肆的
example: 单词 extravagant 的例句||||They tried to please him with fulsome compliments and extravagant gifts. 他们想用溢美之词和奢华的礼品来取悦他。||||He is extravagant in behaviour. 他行为放肆。

name: logic
interpret: n.逻辑(学)；逻辑性
example: 单词 logic 的例句||||What sort of logic is that? 这是什么逻辑？||||I don't follow the logic of your argument. 我不明白你的论点逻辑性何在。

name: exterior
interpret: adj.外部的，外在的；表面的
example: 单词 exterior 的例句||||The seed has a hard exterior covering. 这种子外壳很硬。||||We are painting the exterior wall of the house. 我们正在给房子的外墙涂漆。

name: enroll
interpret: vt.招收；登记；入学；参军；成为会员（英)enrol；vi.参加；登记；注册；记入名册
example: 单词 enroll 的例句||||I should like to enroll all my children in the swimming class. 我愿意让我的孩子们都参加游泳班。||||They enroll him as a member of the club. 他们吸收他为俱乐部会员。

name: glide
interpret: n.溜，滑行；(时间)消逝；vt.滑翔；滑行；悄悄地走；消逝；vi.使滑行；使滑动
example: 单词 glide 的例句||||We stood in silence watching the snake glide effortlessly. 我们噤若寒蝉地站着，眼看那条蛇逍遥自在地游来游去。||||So graceful was the ballerina that she just seemed to glide. 那芭蕾舞女演员翩跹起舞，宛如滑翔。

name: humble
interpret: adj.谦卑的，恭顺的；地位低下的；vt.降低，贬低
example: 单词 humble 的例句||||In my humble opinion, he will win the election. 依我拙见，他将在选举中获胜。||||Defeat and failure make people humble. 挫折与失败会使人谦卑。

name: motive
interpret: n.动机，目的；adv.发动的，运动的
example: 单词 motive 的例句||||The police could not find a motive for the murder. 警察不能找到谋杀的动机。||||He had some motive in telling this fable. 他讲这寓言故事是有用意的。

name: retail
interpret: n.零售；vt.零售；转述；vi.零售；adv.以零售价格
example: 单词 retail 的例句||||In this shop they retail tobacco and sweets. 这家铺子零售香烟和糖果。||||These shoes retail at 10 yuan a pair. 这些鞋子零卖10元一双。

name: radius
interpret: n.半径，半径范围；有效航程，范围，界限
example: 单词 radius 的例句||||He has visited every shop within a radius of two miles. 周围两英里以内的店铺他都去过。||||We are measuring the radius of the circle. 我们正在测量圆的半径。

name: reign
interpret: n.统治时期，统治，支配，盛行；vi.占优势
example: 单词 reign 的例句||||The reign of Queen Elizabeth lapped over into the seventeenth century. 伊丽莎白王朝延至17世纪。||||The reign of Zhu Yuanzhang lasted about 31 years. 朱元璋统治了大约三十一年。

name: prospect
interpret: n.前景，前途；景色，视野
example: 单词 prospect 的例句||||This state of things holds out a cheerful prospect. 事态呈现出可喜的前景。||||The prospect became more evident. 前景变得更加明朗了。

name: expenditure
interpret: n.(时间、劳力、金钱等)支出；使用，消耗
example: 单词 expenditure 的例句||||The entry of all expenditure is necessary. 有必要把一切开支入账。||||The monthly expenditure of our family is four hundred dollars altogether. 我们一家的开销每月共计四百元。

name: disorder
interpret: n.紊乱，混乱；骚动，骚乱；疾病，失调
example: 单词 disorder 的例句||||When returning back, he discovered the room to be in disorder. 回家后，他发现屋子里乱七八糟。||||It contained a vast number of letters in great disorder. 里面七零八落地装着许多信件。

name: tenant
interpret: n.承租人；房客；佃户；vt.租借，租用
example: 单词 tenant 的例句||||The tenant was dispossessed for not paying his rent. 那名房客因未付房租而被赶走。||||The tenant is responsible for all repairs to the building. 租户负责对房屋的所有修理。

name: miserable
interpret: adj.悲惨的，痛苦的；可怜的，糟糕的
example: 单词 miserable 的例句||||It was miserable of you to make fun of him. 你取笑他，这是可耻的。||||Her past life was miserable. 她过去的生活很苦。

name: versus
interpret: prep.以…为对手，对；与…相比之下
example: 单词 versus 的例句||||The big match tonight is England versus Spain. 今晚的大赛是英格兰对西班牙。||||The most exciting game was Harvard versus Yale. 最富紧张刺激的球赛是哈佛队对耶鲁队。

name: vocation
interpret: n.职业，行业
example: 单词 vocation 的例句||||She struggled for years to find her true vocation. 她多年来苦苦寻找真正适合自己的职业。||||She felt it was her vocation to minister to the sick. 她觉得照料病人是她的天职。

name: celebrity
interpret: n.名人，名流；著名，名声，名望
example: 单词 celebrity 的例句||||Tom found himself something of a celebrity. 汤姆意识到自己已小有名气了。||||He haunted famous men, hoping to get celebrity for himself. 他常和名人在一起，希望借此使自己获得名气。

name: genetic
interpret: adj.遗传的，遗传学的
example: 单词 genetic 的例句||||It's very difficult to treat genetic diseases. 遗传性疾病治疗起来很困难。||||Each daughter cell can receive a full complement of the genetic information. 每个子细胞可以收到遗传信息的一个完全补偿物。

name: immediate
interpret: adj.立即的；直接的，最接近的；紧靠的
example: 单词 immediate 的例句||||His immediate neighbours felt it their duty to call. 他的近邻认为他们有责任去拜访。||||We declared ourselves for the immediate convocation of the meeting. 我们主张立即召开这个会议。

name: incentive
interpret: n.刺激；动力；鼓励；诱因；动机
example: 单词 incentive 的例句||||Money is still a major incentive in most occupations. 在许多职业中，钱仍是主要的鼓励因素。|||| He hasn't much incentive to work hard. 他没有努力工作的动机。

name: instructor
interpret: n.指导者，教员，教练
example: 单词 instructor 的例句||||The college jumped him from instructor to full professor. 大学突然把他从讲师提升为正教授。||||The skiing instructor was a tall, sunburnt man. 滑雪教练是一个高高个子晒得黑黑的男子。

name: liar
interpret: n.说谎的人
example: 单词 liar 的例句||||I know you for a thief and a liar! 我算认识你了，一个又偷又骗的家伙！ ||||She was wrongly labelled a liar. 她被错误地扣上说谎者的帽子。

name: patriotic
interpret: adj.爱国的，有爱国心的
example: 单词 patriotic 的例句||||His speech was full of patriotic sentiments. 他的演说充满了爱国之情。||||The old man is a patriotic overseas Chinese. 这位老人是一位爱国华侨。

name: velvet
interpret: n.丝绒，天鹅绒；adj.丝绒制的，柔软的
example: 单词 velvet 的例句||||This material feels like velvet. 这料子摸起来像丝绒。||||The new settlers wore the finest silk and velvet clothing. 新来的移民穿着最华丽的丝绸和天鹅绒衣服。

name: vessel
interpret: n.船舶；容器，器皿；管，导管，血管
example: 单词 vessel 的例句||||The vessel is fully loaded with cargo for Shanghai. 这艘船满载货物驶往上海。||||You should put the water into a vessel. 你应该把水装入容器中。

name: remarkable
interpret: adj.显著的，异常的，非凡的，值得注意的
example: 单词 remarkable 的例句||||She has made remarkable headway in her writing skills. 她在写作技巧方面有了长足进步。||||These cars are remarkable for the quietness of their engines. 这些汽车因发动机没有噪音而不同凡响。

name: sob
interpret: n.空间轨道的轰炸机；呜咽，哭泣；vi.啜泣，呜咽；（风等）发出呜咽声；vt.哭诉，啜泣
example: 单词 sob 的例句||||The child started to sob when he couldn't find his mother. 孩子因找不到他妈妈哭了起来。||||The girl didn't answer, but continued to sob with her head on the table. 那个女孩不回答，也不抬起头来。她只顾趴在桌子上低声哭着。

name: tiresome
interpret: adj.令人疲劳的，令人厌倦的
example: 单词 tiresome 的例句||||His doubts and hesitations were tiresome. 他的疑惑和犹豫令人厌烦。||||He was tiresome in contending for the value of his own labors. 他老为他自己劳动的价值而争强斗胜，令人生厌。

name: savage
interpret: adj.野蛮的；凶恶的，残暴的；n.未开化的人
example: 单词 savage 的例句||||The poor man received a savage beating from the thugs. 那可怜的人遭到暴徒的痛打。||||He has a savage temper. 他脾气粗暴。

name: irrigate
interpret: vt.灌溉，修水利，冲洗伤口，使潮湿
example: 单词 irrigate 的例句||||The farmer dug several trenches to irrigate the rice fields. 这个农民挖了好几条沟以灌溉稻田。||||They have built canals to irrigate the desert. 他们建造成水渠以灌溉沙漠。

name: fixture
interpret: n.固定设备；预定日期；比赛时间；定期存款
example: 单词 fixture 的例句||||Lighting fixture must be installed at once. 必须立即安装照明设备。||||The cordless kettle may now be a fixture in most kitchens. 无绳电热水壶现在可能是多数厨房的固定设备。

name: liberate
interpret: vt.解放，使获自由
example: 单词 liberate 的例句||||They did their best to liberate slaves. 他们尽最大能力去解放奴隶。||||This will liberate him from economic worry. 这将消除他经济上的忧虑。

name: realization
interpret: n.实现；认识到，深刻了解
example: 单词 realization 的例句||||We shall gladly lend every effort in our power toward its realization. 我们将乐意为它的实现而竭尽全力。||||He came to the realization that he would never make a good teacher. 他逐渐认识到自己永远不会成为好老师。

name: doctrine
interpret: n.教义；主义；学说
example: 单词 doctrine 的例句||||He was impelled to proclaim his doctrine. 他不得不宣扬他的教义。||||The council met to consider changes to doctrine. 宗教议会开会考虑更改教义。

name: supreme
interpret: adj.极度的，最重要的；至高的，最高的
example: 单词 supreme 的例句||||It was the supreme moment in his life. 那是他一生中最重要的时刻。||||He handed up the indictment to the supreme court. 他把起诉书送交最高法院。

name: coordinate
interpret: adj.同等的，协调的；n.同等者；vt.协作，协调
example: 单词 coordinate 的例句||||You must coordinate what you said with what you did. 你必须使你的言行一致。||||Maybe we can coordinate the relation of them. 或许我们可以调和他们之间的关系。

name: recipient
interpret: adj.接受的,感受性强的 n.接受者,感受者,容器
example: 单词 recipient 的例句||||Please check that you have a valid email certificate for each recipient. 请检查是否对每个接收者都有有效的电子邮件证书。||||Colombia is the biggest US aid recipient in Latin America. 哥伦比亚是美国在拉丁美洲最大的援助对象。

name: disturbance
interpret: n.动乱，骚动；打扰，干扰；(身心)失调
example: 单词 disturbance 的例句||||He is suffering an emotional disturbance. 他的情绪受到了困扰。||||You can work in here without any disturbance. 在这儿你可不受任何干扰地工作。

name: formulate
interpret: vt.用公式表示；规划；设计；系统地阐述
example: 单词 formulate 的例句||||He took care to formulate his reply very clearly. 他字斟句酌，清楚地做了回答。||||I was impressed by the way he could formulate his ideas. 他陈述观点的方式让我印象深刻。

name: spectrum
interpret: n.谱，光谱，频谱；范围，幅度，系列
example: 单词 spectrum 的例句||||This is a kind of atomic spectrum. 这是一种原子光谱。||||We have known much of the constitution of the solar spectrum. 关于太阳光谱的构成，我们已了解不少。

name: gratitude
interpret: adj.感激，感谢
example: 单词 gratitude 的例句||||I have expressed the depth of my gratitude to him. 我向他表示了深切的谢意。||||She could not help her tears of gratitude rolling down her face. 她感激的泪珠禁不住沿着面颊流了下来。

name: distress
interpret: n.苦恼，痛苦，不舒适；不幸；vt.使悲痛
example: 单词 distress 的例句||||Nothing could alleviate his distress. 什么都不能减轻他的痛苦。||||Please don't distress yourself. 请你不要忧愁了。

name: scent
interpret: n.气味，香味，香水，线索，嗅觉；vt.嗅，发觉；vi.发出…的气味；有…的迹象；嗅着气味追赶
example: 单词 scent 的例句||||The air was filled with the scent of lilac. 空气中弥漫着丁香花的芬芳。||||The flowers give off a heady scent at night. 这些花晚上散发出醉人的芳香。

name: plunge
interpret: vt.跳入，(使)投入，(使)陷入；猛冲；vi.突然地下降；投入；陷入；跳进；n.投入；跳进
example: 单词 plunge 的例句||||Test pool's water temperature before you plunge in. 在你跳入之前你应该测试水温。||||That would plunge them in the broil of the two countries. 那将会使他们陷入这两国的争斗之中。

name: mere
interpret: adj.纯粹的；仅仅，只不过
example: 单词 mere 的例句||||That is a mere repetition of what you said before. 那不过是重复了你以前讲的话。||||It's a mere waste of time waiting any longer. 再等下去纯粹是浪费时间。

name: wreck
interpret: n.失事，遇难；沉船；vt.(船等)失事，遇难
example: 单词 wreck 的例句||||Weather may have been a factor in the wreck. 天气可能是造成这次失事的原因之一。||||No one can wreck the friendship between us. 没有人能够破坏我们之间的友谊。

name: auto
interpret: n.(=automobile)(口语)汽车
example: 单词 auto 的例句||||Don't park your auto here. 别把你的汽车停在这儿。||||The auto industry has brought many people to Detroit. 汽车工业把许多人吸引到了底特律。

name: tempt
interpret: vt.引诱，勾引，吸引，引起…的兴趣
example: 单词 tempt 的例句||||Nothing could tempt him to such a course of action. 什么都不能诱使他去那样做。||||The fact that she had become wealthy did not tempt her to alter her frugal way of life. 她有钱了，可这丝毫没能让她改变节俭的生活习惯。

name: conceal
interpret: vt.隐藏，隐瞒，隐蔽
example: 单词 conceal 的例句||||He had to conceal his identity to escape the police. 为了躲避警方，他只好隐瞒身份。||||He could hardly conceal his joy at his departure. 他几乎掩饰不住临行时的喜悦。

name: shaft
interpret: n.(工具的)柄，杆状物
example: 单词 shaft 的例句||||He was wounded by a shaft. 他被箭击中受伤。||||This is the shaft of a steam engine. 这是一个蒸汽机主轴。

name: synthetic
interpret: adj.合成的，人工的；综合的；n.人工制品
example: 单词 synthetic 的例句||||We felt the salesman's synthetic friendliness. 我们感觉到那位销售员的虚情假意。||||It's a synthetic diamond. 这是人造钻石。

name: resistant
interpret: adj.(to)抵抗的，有抵抗力的
example: 单词 resistant 的例句||||Many pests are resistant to the insecticide. 许多害虫对这种杀虫剂有抵抗力。||||They imposed their government by force on the resistant population. 他们以武力把自己的统治强加在持反抗态度的人民头上。

name: civilize
interpret: vt.使文明，使开化 (=civilise)
example: 单词 civilize 的例句||||We must civilize away the boy's bad habit. 我们必须教育这孩子使其改掉恶习。||||Those facilities are intended to civilize people. 那些设施的目的在于教化民众。

name: condemn
interpret: vt.谴责，指责；宣判(罪犯)，判刑
example: 单词 condemn 的例句||||Some praise him, whereas others condemn him. 有些人赞扬他，而有些人谴责他。||||We mustn't condemn him on mere suppositions. 我们不可全凭臆测来指责他。

name: persevere
interpret: vi.坚持，坚忍，不屈不挠
example: 单词 persevere 的例句||||They are determined to persevere in the fight. 他们决心坚持战斗。||||It is strength of character enabled him to persevere. 他那坚强的性格使他能够坚持不懈。

name: diligent
interpret: adj.勤勉的，勤奋的
example: 单词 diligent 的例句||||He is the more diligent of the two boys. 他是这两个男孩中较用功的一个。||||She is diligent and keeps herself busy all the time. 她真勤快，一会儿也不闲着。

name: erect
interpret: vt.树立，建立，使竖立；vi.直立；勃起；adj.直立的，垂直的
example: 单词 erect 的例句||||She held her head erect and her back straight. 她昂着头，把背挺得笔直。||||Soldiers are trained to stand erect. 士兵们训练站得笔直。

name: compute
interpret: n.计算，估计；vt.计算；估算；用计算机计算；vi.计算；估算；推断
example: 单词 compute 的例句||||I compute my losses at 500 dollars. 我估计我的损失有五百元。||||The losses caused by the floods were beyond compute. 洪水造成的损失难以估量。

name: ascertain
interpret: vt.发现，确定，查明，弄清
example: 单词 ascertain 的例句||||It's difficult to ascertain the coal deposits. 煤储量很难探明。||||We must ascertain the responsibility in light of different situtations. 我们必须根据不同情况判定责任。

name: ascend
interpret: vi.渐渐上升，升高；vt.攀登，登上
example: 单词 ascend 的例句||||We watched the airplane ascend higher and higher. 我们看着飞机逐渐升高。||||We ascend in the order of time and of development. 我们按时间和发展顺序向上溯。

name: refreshment
interpret: n.恢复，精神爽快，提神之事物；（复数）refreshments:点心，茶点
example: 单词 refreshment 的例句||||He needs to stop fairly often for refreshment. 他须时不时地停下来喘口气。||||A hot bath is a great refreshment after a day's work. 在一天工作之后洗个热水澡真是舒畅。

name: tug
interpret: vt.&vi.用力拖(或拉)；苦干；n.拖；苦干；拖船
example: 单词 tug 的例句||||We need to tug the car round to the front. 我们需要把那辆车拉到前面。||||The tug is towing three barges. 那只拖船正拖着三只驳船。

name: slit
interpret: n.狭长的切口；裂缝；vt.切开，撕裂
example: 单词 slit 的例句||||The coat has been slit in two places. 这件外衣有两处裂开了。||||He began to slit open each envelope. 他开始裁开每个信封。

name: inquiry
interpret: n.打听，询问，调查，查问
example: 单词 inquiry 的例句||||Many parents have been pressing for an inquiry into the problem. 许多家长迫切要求调查这个问题。||||The field of inquiry has narrowed down to five persons. 调查的范围已经缩小到只剩5个人了。

name: defense
interpret: n.防御，保卫；[pl.]防务工事；辩护，答辩
example: 单词 defense 的例句||||The accused has the right to defense. 被告人有权获得辩护。||||The war has impacted the area with military and defense workers. 战争使那个地区挤满了军队和防御工程人员。

name: initiate
interpret: vt.开始，创始，发动；启蒙，使入门；引入
example: 单词 initiate 的例句||||A language teacher should initiate pupils into the elements of grammar. 语言老师应该把基本语法教给学生。||||They wanted to initiate a discussion on economics. 他们想启动一次经济学讨论。

name: smuggle
interpret: vt.私运；vi.走私
example: 单词 smuggle 的例句||||Friends managed to smuggle him secretly out of the country. 朋友们想方设法将他秘密送出国了。||||She has managed to smuggle out the antiques without getting caught. 她成功将古董走私出境，没有被逮捕。

name: prey
interpret: n.被掠食者，牺牲者，掠食；vi.捕食，掠夺，折磨
example: 单词 prey 的例句||||Stronger animals prey on weaker ones. 弱肉强食。||||The lion was hunting for its prey. 狮子在寻找猎物。

name: corporate
interpret: adj.共同的，全体的；公司的，企业的
example: 单词 corporate 的例句||||This is our corporate responsibility. 这是我们共同的责任。||||His corporate's life will be as short as a rabbit's tail. 他的公司的寿命是兔子尾巴长不了。

name: frankly
interpret: adv.坦白地，直率地；坦率地说
example: 单词 frankly 的例句||||To speak frankly, I don't like the idea at all. 老实说，我一点也不赞成这个主意。||||Frankly speaking, I'm not opposed to reform. 坦率地说，我不反对改革。

name: freshman
interpret: n.大学一年级学生(可兼指男女)，新手
example: 单词 freshman 的例句||||Jack decided to live in during his freshman year at college. 杰克决定大一时住校。||||He is a freshman in the show business. 他在演艺界是一名新手。

name: lasting
interpret: adj.永久的，永恒的；vbl.持续，维持
example: 单词 lasting 的例句||||The lasting war debased the value of the dollar. 持久的战争使美元贬值。||||We hope for a lasting settlement of all these troubles. 我们希望这些纠纷能获得永久的解决。

name: sophomore
interpret: n.大学二年级生；adj.第二年的
example: 单词 sophomore 的例句||||He is in his sophomore year. 他在读二年级。|||| I'm a college sophomore majoring in English. 我是一名英语专业的大二学生。

name: prop
interpret: vt.支撑；n.支柱，支撑物；支持者，靠山
example: 单词 prop 的例句||||A worker put a prop against the wall of the tunnel to keep it from falling. 一名工人用东西支撑住隧道壁好使它不会倒塌。||||The government does not intend to prop up declining industries. 政府无意扶持不景气的企业。

name: retirement
interpret: n.退休，退职
example: 单词 retirement 的例句||||She wanted to enjoy her retirement without being beset by financial worries. 她想享受退休生活而不必为金钱担忧。||||I have to put everything away for my retirement. 我必须把一切都积蓄起来以便退休后用。

name: toll
interpret: n.过路(桥)费；损失，伤亡人数；v.敲(钟)
example: 单词 toll 的例句||||The hailstone took a heavy toll of the crops in our village last night. 昨晚那场冰雹严重损坏了我们村的庄稼。||||The war took a heavy toll of human life. 这次战争夺去了许多人的生命。

name: arena
interpret: n.竞技场，运动场所；竞争场所，舞台
example: 单词 arena 的例句||||She entered the political arena at the age of 25. 她25岁进入政界。||||He had not an adequate arena for the exercise of his talents. 他没有充分发挥其才能的场所。

name: grove
interpret: n.林子，小树林，园林
example: 单词 grove 的例句||||On top of the hill was a grove of tall trees. 山顶上一片高大的树林。||||The scent of lemons filled the grove. 柠檬香味充满了小树林。

name: repertoire
interpret: n.(准备好演出的)节目，保留剧目；(计算机的)指令表，指令系统， (某个人的)全部技能；清单，指令表
example: 单词 repertoire 的例句||||There is an extensive repertoire of music written for the flute. 有很多供长笛演奏的曲目。||||He has added considerably to his piano repertoire. 他的钢琴演奏曲目大大增加了。

name: attic
interpret: n.顶楼，屋顶室
example: 单词 attic 的例句||||Leakiness in the roof caused a damp attic. 屋漏使顶楼潮湿。||||What's to be done with all this stuff in the attic? 顶楼上的材料怎么处理？

name: twilight
interpret: n.暮光，黄昏；暮年，晚期，衰落时期
example: 单词 twilight 的例句||||Twilight merged into darkness. 夕阳的光辉融于黑暗中。||||Twilight was sweet with the smell of lilac and freshly turned earth. 薄暮充满紫丁香和新翻耕的泥土的香味。

name: warrior
interpret: n.勇士，武士，斗士
example: 单词 warrior 的例句||||The young man is a bold warrior. 这个年轻人是个很英勇的武士。||||A true warrior values glory and honor above life. 一个真正的勇士珍视荣誉胜过生命。

name: soften
interpret: vt.(使)变柔软；(使)变柔和；vi.减轻；变柔和；变柔软
example: 单词 soften 的例句||||Plastics will soften when exposed to heat. 塑料适当加热就可以软化。||||This special cream will help to soften up our skin. 这种特殊的护肤霜有助于使皮肤变得柔软。

name: retailer
interpret: n.零售商(人)
example: 单词 retailer 的例句||||What are the retailer requirements? 零售商会有哪些要求呢？||||The retailer has assembled a team in Shanghai to examine the question. 这家零售商在上海组建了一支团队研究这个问题。

name: prestigious
interpret: adj.有威望的，有声望的，受尊敬的
example: 单词 prestigious 的例句||||The young man graduated from a prestigious university. 这个年轻人毕业于一所名牌大学。||||You may even join a prestigious magazine as a contributing editor. 你甚至可能会加入一个知名杂志做特约编辑。

name: inclination
interpret: n.倾斜；点头；弯腰；斜坡；倾度；倾向；爱好
example: 单词 inclination 的例句||||She greeted us with a slight inclination of the head. 她微微点头向我们致意。||||I did not feel the slightest inclination to hurry. 我没有丝毫着急的意思。

name: Mediterranean
interpret: adj.地中海的；地中海沿岸的
example: 单词 Mediterranean 的例句||||The houses are Mediterranean in character. 这些房子都属地中海风格。||||Gibraltar is the key to the Mediterranean. 直布罗陀是地中海的要冲。

name: calculus
interpret: n.微积分；结石
example: 单词 calculus 的例句||||This is a problem where calculus won't help at all. 对于这一题，微积分一点也用不上。||||After studying differential calculus you will be able to solve these mathematical problems. 学了微积分之后，你们就能够解这些数学题了。

name: deform
interpret: vt.损坏…的形状；使变形，使变丑；vi.变形
example: 单词 deform 的例句||||Shoes that are too tight deform the feet. (穿)太紧的鞋子会使脚变形。||||Ice crystals begin to deform measurably. 冰晶就产生某种程度的变形了。

name: nurture
interpret: n.养育，照顾，教育；滋养，营养品；vt.养育，给与营养物，教养，扶持
example: 单词 nurture 的例句||||The tree grows well in his nurture. 在他的培育下这棵树长得很好。||||The two sisters had received very different nurture. 这俩个姊妹接受过极不同的教育。

name: tighten
interpret: vt.&vi.(使)变紧；(使)绷紧
example: 单词 tighten 的例句||||Turn the screw to the right to tighten it. 向右转动螺钉把它拧紧。||||Some countries tighten monetary policy to avoid inflation. 一些国家实行紧缩银根的货币政策，以避免通货膨胀。

name: chatter
interpret: vi.／n.喋喋不休；短促尖叫；(牙齿)打战
example: 单词 chatter 的例句||||Her continuous chatter vexes me. 她的喋喋不休使我烦透了。||||I've had enough of their continual chatter. 我已厌烦了他们喋喋不休的闲谈。

name: literate
interpret: n.学者；adj.精通文学的，受过教育的
example: 单词 literate 的例句||||Only a few of the nation's peasants are literate. 这个国家的农民中只有少数人能识字。||||A literate person can get knowledge through reading many books. 一个受过教育的人可以通过读书而获得知识。

name: clatter
interpret: n.(使)发出连续而清脆的撞击声；vi.发出哗啦声；喧闹的谈笑；vt.使卡搭卡搭的响
example: 单词 clatter 的例句||||The dishes and bowls slid together with a clatter. 碟子碗碰得丁丁当当的。||||Don't clatter your knives and forks. 别把刀叉碰得咔哒响。

name: evaluation
interpret: n.估价，评价；赋值
example: 单词 evaluation 的例句||||I attempted an honest evaluation of my own life. 我试图如实地评价我自己的一生。||||The new scheme is still under evaluation. 新方案还在评估阶段。

name: inevitably
interpret: adv.不可避免地；必然发生地
example: 单词 inevitably 的例句||||In the way you go on, you are inevitably coming apart. 照你们这样下去，毫无疑问是会散伙的。||||Technological changes will inevitably lead to unemployment. 技术变革必然会导致失业。

name: grunt
interpret: vt.嘟哝；作呼噜声；vi.作呼噜声；发哼声；n.呼噜声，嘟哝
example: 单词 grunt 的例句||||He lifted the heavy suitcase with a grunt. 他咕噜着把沉重的提箱拎了起来。||||I asked him what he thought, but he just grunted. 我问他在想什么，他只哼了一声。

name: gravel
interpret: n.砂跞；砂砾层；结石
example: 单词 gravel 的例句||||We bought six bags of gravel for the garden path. 我们购买了六袋碎石用来铺花园的小路。||||More gravel is needed to fill the hollow in the drive. 需要更多的砾石来填平车道上的坑洼。

name: rejection
interpret: n.拒绝，被拒，抛弃，被弃
example: 单词 rejection 的例句||||He decided not to approach her for fear of rejection. 他因怕遭拒绝决定不再去找她。||||The rejection plunged her into the dark depths of despair. 遭到拒绝使她陷入了绝望的深渊。

name: emission
interpret: n.发出物，散发物；发出，散发
example: 单词 emission 的例句||||Rigorous measures will be taken to reduce the total pollutant emission. 采取严格有力措施，降低污染物排放总量。||||Finally, the way to effectively control particulate emission is pointed out. 最后，有效降低颗粒排放的方法被提了出来。

name: aptitude
interpret: n.(学习方面的)才能，资质，天资
example: 单词 aptitude 的例句||||That student has an aptitude for mathematics. 那个学生有数学方面的天赋。||||As a child, he showed an aptitude for the piano. 在孩提时代，他显露出对于钢琴的天赋。

name: outrage
interpret: n.暴行，侮辱，愤怒；vt.凌辱，激怒
example: 单词 outrage 的例句||||When he heard the news he reacted with a sense of outrage. 他得悉此事时义愤填膺。||||We should never forget the outrage committed by the Japanese invaders. 我们永远都不应该忘记日本侵略者犯下的暴行。

name: constraint
interpret: n.(on)约束，限制；限制(或约束)性的事物
example: 单词 constraint 的例句||||The boy felt constraint in her presence. 那男孩在她面前感到局促不安。||||The lack of capital is a major constraint on activities in the informal sector. 资本短缺也是影响非正规部门生产经营的一个重要制约因素。

name: flip
interpret: vt.快速翻动；轻抛；轻拍；n.轻抛；adj.轻浮的
example: 单词 flip 的例句||||I had a quick flip through the book and it looked very interesting. 我很快翻阅了一下那本书，看来似乎很有趣。||||Let's flip a coin to see who pays the bill. 咱们来抛硬币决定谁付钱。

name: filth
interpret: n.肮脏，污物，污秽；淫猥
example: 单词 filth 的例句||||I don't know how you can read such filth. 我不明白你怎么会去读这种淫秽下流的东西。||||The dialogue was all filth and innuendo. 这段对话全是下流的言辞和影射。

name: woe
interpret: n.悲哀，苦痛，不幸，困难；int.用来表达悲伤或惊慌
example: 单词 woe 的例句||||Our two peoples are brothers sharing weal and woe. 我们两国人民是患难与共的兄弟。||||A man is well or woe as he thinks himself so. 自认祸是祸，自认福是福。

name: wither
interpret: vt.使凋谢，使衰退，(用眼神气势等)使畏缩；vi.枯萎，衰退，消亡
example: 单词 wither 的例句||||She grows as a flower does-she will wither without sun. 她象鲜花一样成长--没有太阳就会凋谢。||||In autumn the leaves wither and fall off the trees. 秋天，树叶枯萎并从树上落下来。

name: wholesome
interpret: adj.适合；卫生的；有益健康的；显示身心健康的
example: 单词 wholesome 的例句||||In actual fact the things I like doing are mostly wholesome. 实际上我喜欢做的事大都是有助于增进身体健康的。||||It is not wholesome to eat without washing your hands. 不洗手吃饭是不卫生的。

name: antenna
interpret: n.触角，触须；天线
example: 单词 antenna 的例句||||The workman fixed the antenna to the roof of the house. 工人把天线固定在房顶上。||||In our village, there is an antenna on every roof for receiving TV signals. 在我们村里，每家房顶上都有天线接收电视信号。

name: virgin
interpret: n.处女，未婚女子；adj.未经使用的；未经开发的
example: 单词 virgin 的例句||||Have you ever been to a virgin forest? 你去过原始森林吗？||||There are vast expanses of virgin land in the remote regions. 在边远地区有大片大片未开垦的土地。

name: violation
interpret: n.违反(行为)，违背(行为)，侵犯
example: 单词 violation 的例句||||He roared that it was a violation of the rules. 他大声说，那是违反规则的。||||He was fined 200 dollars for violation of traffic regulation. 他因违反交通规则被罚款200美元。

name: watt
interpret: n.瓦，瓦特
example: 单词 watt 的例句||||The invention of the engine is creditable to Watt. 发动机的发明归功于瓦特。||||The unit of power is watt. 功率的单位是瓦特。

name: tilt
interpret: vt.(使)倾侧；(使)倾斜；vi.倾斜；翘起；以言词或文字抨击；n.倾侧；倾斜
example: 单词 tilt 的例句||||She wore her hat at a tilt over her left eye. 她歪戴着帽子遮住左眼。||||The table is at a slight tilt. 这张桌子没放平，有点儿歪.

name: thermal
interpret: adj.热的，由热造成的；保暖的
example: 单词 thermal 的例句||||They will build another thermal power station. 他们要另外建一座热能发电站。||||Volcanic activity has created thermal springs and boiling mud pools. 火山活动产生了温泉和沸腾的泥浆池。

name: scripture
interpret: n.经文，圣书，手稿；Scripture:(常用复数)《圣经》，《圣经》中的一段
example: 单词 scripture 的例句||||The scripture states that God did not want us to be alone. 圣经指出上帝并不是想让我们独身一人生活。||||They invoked Hindu scripture to justify their position. 他们援引印度教的经文为他们的立场辩护。

name: scrap
interpret: n.碎片；废料；vt.废弃，报废；vi.吵架；adj.废弃的；零碎的
example: 单词 scrap 的例句||||A man comes round regularly collecting scrap. 有个男人定时来收废品。||||Sell that car for scrap. 把那辆汽车当残品卖了吧。

name: scoff
interpret: n.嘲笑，笑柄，愚弄；vt.&vi.嘲笑，嘲弄，愚弄，狼吞虎咽
example: 单词 scoff 的例句||||You are not supposed to scoff at religion. 你不该嘲弄宗教。||||He was the scoff of the town. 他成为全城的笑柄。

name: tar
interpret: n.柏油，焦油；vt.涂或浇柏油/焦油于
example: 单词 tar 的例句||||The roof was covered with tar. 屋顶涂抹了一层沥青。||||We use tar to make roads. 我们用沥青铺路。

name: tangle
interpret: n.纠缠；缠结；混乱；vt.&vi.(使)缠绕；变乱
example: 单词 tangle 的例句||||I shouldn't tangle with Peter. He is bigger than me. 我不应该与彼特吵架。他的块头比我大。||||If I were you, I wouldn't tangle with them. 我要是你，我就不跟他们争吵。

name: rectify
interpret: vt.订正，矫正，改正
example: 单词 rectify 的例句||||The matter will rectify itself in a few days. 那件事过几天就会变好。||||You can rectify this fault if you insert a slash. 插入一条斜线便可以纠正此错误。

name: perch
interpret: n.栖木，高位，杆；vt.&vi.栖息，就位，位于
example: 单词 perch 的例句||||The bird took its perch. 鸟停歇在栖木上。||||Little birds perch themselves on the branches. 小鸟儿栖歇在树枝上。

name: rattle
interpret: vt.&vi.飞奔，碰响；激怒；n.碰撞声；拨浪鼓
example: 单词 rattle 的例句||||The baby only shook the rattle and laughed and crowed. 孩子只是摇着拨浪鼓，笑着叫着。||||She could hear the rattle of the teacups. 她听见茶具叮当响。

name: outlaw
interpret: n.歹徒，亡命之徒；vt.宣布…为不合法
example: 单词 outlaw 的例句||||The outlaw hid out in the hills for several months. 逃犯在山里隐藏了几个月。||||The outlaw has been caught. 歹徒已被抓住了。

name: versatile
interpret: adj.通用的，万用的；多才多艺的，多方面的
example: 单词 versatile 的例句||||A versatile person is often good at a number of different things. 多才多艺的人通常擅长许多种不同的事情。||||He had been one of the game's most versatile athletes. 他是这项运动中技术最全面的运动员之一。

name: verge
interpret: n.边，边缘；vi.接近，濒临
example: 单词 verge 的例句||||The country's economy is on the verge of collapse. 国家的经济已到了崩溃的边缘。||||She was on the verge of bursting into tears. 她快要哭出来了。

name: vengeance
interpret: n.报复，报仇，复仇
example: 单词 vengeance 的例句||||He swore vengeance against the men who murdered his father. 他发誓要向那些杀害他父亲的人报仇。||||For years he brooded vengeance. 多年来他一直在盘算报仇。

name: waggon
interpret: n.运货马车，运货车；敞篷车箱
example: 单词 waggon 的例句||||The enemy attacked our waggon train. 敌人袭击了我们的运货马车队。||||Someone jumped out from the foremost waggon and cried aloud. 有人从最前面的一辆大车里跳下来，大声叫嚷。

name: patriot
interpret: n.爱国者，爱国主义者
example: 单词 patriot 的例句||||He avowed himself a patriot. 他自称自己是爱国者。||||He is a patriot who has won the admiration of the French already. 他是一个已经赢得法国人敬仰的爱国者。

name: parameter
interpret: n.参数，参量
example: 单词 parameter 的例句||||It is the parameter of distribution. 这就是分布参数。||||One parameter which always comes into play is the national economy. 国民经济是一个经常起作用的参量。

name: quench
interpret: vt.熄灭，扑灭；压制
example: 单词 quench 的例句||||The firemen were unable to quench the fire. 消防人员无法扑灭这场大火。||||Having a bottle of soft drink is not enough to quench my thirst. 喝一瓶汽水不够解渴。

name: quartz
interpret: n.石英
example: 单词 quartz 的例句||||There is a great deal of quartz in those mountains. 那些山里蕴藏着大量石英。||||The quartz watch keeps good time. 石英表走时准。

name: massacre
interpret: n.残杀，大屠杀；vt.残杀，集体屠杀
example: 单词 massacre 的例句||||There was a terrible massacre of villagers here during the war. 在战争中，这里的村民惨遭屠杀。||||If we forget the massacre, the massacre will happen again! 忘记了大屠杀，大屠杀就有可能再次发生！

name: induction
interpret: n.感应，感应现象；入门培训，入职仪式
example: 单词 induction 的例句||||His induction as a teacher was a turning point in his life. 他就任教师工作是他一生的转折点。||||The magnetic signals are sensed by induction coils. 磁信号由感应线圈所检测。

name: dome
interpret: n.圆屋顶，拱顶
example: 单词 dome 的例句||||The dome was supported by white marble columns. 圆顶由白色大理石柱支撑着。||||They formed the dome with the tree's branches. 他们用树枝搭成圆屋顶。

name: gasp
interpret: n.喘息，气喘；vt.喘息；气吁吁他说；vi.喘气；喘息；渴望
example: 单词 gasp 的例句||||She gave a gasp of surprise. 她吃惊得大口喘气。||||The enemy are at their last gasp. 敌人在做垂死的挣扎。

name: analyze
interpret: vt.分析，解析 (=analyse)
example: 单词 analyze 的例句||||We should analyze the cause and effect of this event. 我们应该分析这场事变的因果。||||The teacher tried to analyze the cause of our failure. 老师设法分析我们失败的原因。

name: simplicity
interpret: n.简单，简易；朴素；直率，单纯
example: 单词 simplicity 的例句||||She dressed with elegant simplicity. 她穿着朴素高雅。||||The beauty of this plan is its simplicity. 简明扼要是这个计划的一大特点。

name: withhold
interpret: vt.拒绝，不给；使停止，阻挡；vi.忍住；克制
example: 单词 withhold 的例句||||It was unscrupulous of their lawyer to withhold evidence. 他们的律师隐瞒证据是不道德的。||||I couldn't withhold giving some loose to my indignation. 我忍不住要发泄一点我的愤怒。

name: scatter
interpret: vt.撒，驱散，散开；散布/播；vi.分散，消散
example: 单词 scatter 的例句||||You pile everything up and scatter things around. 你把东西乱堆乱放。||||Small villages scatter at the foot of the mountain. 小村庄零零落落地散布在山脚下。

name: plentiful
interpret: adj.富裕的，丰富的
example: 单词 plentiful 的例句||||Their family has a plentiful harvest this year. 他们家今年丰收了。||||Rainfall is plentiful in the area. 这个地区雨量充足。

name: faculty
interpret: n.才能；学院，系；(学院或系的)全体教学人员
example: 单词 faculty 的例句||||He has a great faculty for learning foreign languages. 他有学习外语的天赋。||||He has the faculty of saying the right thing at the right time. 他有在恰当的时候说恰当的话的才智。

name: bind
interpret: vt.捆，包扎；装订；约束；使凝固；vi.变硬
example: 单词 bind 的例句||||I will let the waiter bind up the parcel for you. 我让服务生帮你把包裹包起来。||||He wants a shirt that does not bind him. 他要一件不使他觉得过紧的衬衫。

name: dominant
interpret: adj.支配的，统治的；占优势的；显性的；n.主因，要素，主要的人(或物)；显性基因
example: 单词 dominant 的例句||||The British were formerly dominant in India. 英国人从前统治印度。||||She was a dominant figure in the French film industry. 她在法国电影界是个举足轻重的人物。

name: strap
interpret: n.皮带，带子；vt.用带扣住，束牢；用绷带包扎；vi.精力旺盛地工作；受束缚
example: 单词 strap 的例句||||She held onto a strap to steady herself. 她抓住拉手吊带以便站稳。||||The nurse will strap up your wound. 护士会绑扎你的伤口。

name: wrench
interpret: vt.猛拧；挣脱；使扭伤；vi. 扭伤；猛扭；猛绞；n.扳手；痛苦，难受，扭伤
example: 单词 wrench 的例句||||He gave a wrench to his ankle when he jumped down. 他跳下去的时候扭伤了足踝。||||It was a wrench to leave the old home. 离开这个老家非常痛苦。

name: gulf
interpret: n.海湾；深渊，鸿沟；分歧，隔阂
example: 单词 gulf 的例句||||The gulf between the two leaders cannot be bridged. 两位领导人之间的鸿沟难以跨越。||||There is a gulf between the two cities. 这两座城市间有个海湾。

name: linen
interpret: n.亚麻布，亚麻线，亚麻制品；adj.亚麻布制的，亚麻的
example: 单词 linen 的例句||||The worker is starching the linen. 这名工人正在给亚麻布上浆。||||Fine linen and cotton fabrics were known as well as wool. 精细的亚麻织品和棉织品像羊毛一样闻名遐迩。

name: forth
interpret: adv.向前；向外，往外
example: 单词 forth 的例句||||The wind moved the trees gently back and forth. 风吹得树轻轻地来回摇晃。||||He gave forth a series of works in rapid succession. 他很快连续发表了一系列的作品。

name: browse
interpret: vt.&vi.随意翻阅，浏览；(牛、羊等)吃草；n.浏览；吃草
example: 单词 browse 的例句||||I had a browse through the books on her shelf. 我浏览了一下她书架上的书。||||It is a good idea to browse through it first. 最好先通篇浏览一遍。

name: flare
interpret: vi.闪耀，闪烁；vt. 使闪耀；使张开；用发光信号发出；使外倾n.潮红；突发；闪光
example: 单词 flare 的例句||||The match gave a flare. 火柴发出闪光。||||You need not flare up merely because I mentioned your work. 你大可不必因为我提到你的工作就动怒。

name: royalty
interpret: n.皇家，皇族
example: 单词 royalty 的例句||||She claims to be descended from royalty. 她声称她是皇室后裔。||||I waited on tables, and even catered to royalty at the Royal Albert Hall. 我做过服务生，甚至在皇家阿伯特大厅侍奉过皇室的人。

name: steer
interpret: vt.驾驶，为…操舵；引导；vi.驾驶
example: 单词 steer 的例句||||If you push the car, I'll steer it. 如果你来推车，我就来驾车。||||It's no use trying to steer the boy into a course of action that suits you. 想说服这孩子按你的方式行事是徒劳的。

name: plantation
interpret: n.种植园，大农场
example: 单词 plantation 的例句||||His father-in-law is a plantation manager. 他岳父是个种植园经营者。||||The plantation owner has possessed himself of a vast piece of land. 这个种植园主把大片土地占为己有。

name: oxide
interpret: n.氧化物
example: 单词 oxide 的例句||||Oxide is usually seen in our daily life. 在我们的日常生活中氧化物很常见。||||How can you get rid of this oxide coating? 你们该怎样除去这些氧化皮？

name: rust
interpret: n.锈；vi.生锈；(脑子)衰退；vt.使生锈；腐蚀
example: 单词 rust 的例句||||She scraped the rust off the kitchen knife. 她擦掉了菜刀上的锈。||||The rain will rust the iron roof. 雨水会使铁皮屋顶生锈。

name: bribe
interpret: n.贿赂；vt.向…行贿，买通；vi.行贿
example: 单词 bribe 的例句||||He tried to bribe the policeman not to arrest him. 他企图贿赂警察不逮捕他。||||He resolutely refused their bribe. 他坚决不接受他们的贿赂。

name: bloody
interpret: adj.非常的的；流血的；残忍的；adv.很；vt.血染
example: 单词 bloody 的例句||||He got a bloody nose in the fight. 他在打斗中被打得鼻子流血。||||He is a bloody fool. 他是一个十足的笨蛋。

name: stereotype
interpret: n.固定的形象，陈规，老套，旧框框
example: 单词 stereotype 的例句||||He's my stereotype of a schoolteacher. 他是我心目中的典型教师。||||There's always been a stereotype about successful businessmen. 人们对于成功商人一直都有一种固定印象。

name: rib
interpret: n.肋骨，肋状物
example: 单词 rib 的例句||||He broke a rib when he fell off his horse. 他从马上摔下来折断了一根肋骨。||||He has broken a rib and the doctor has strapped it up. 他断了一根肋骨，医生已包扎好了。

name: undoubtedly
interpret: adv.确实地，无疑地
example: 单词 undoubtedly 的例句||||It is undoubtedly she who has said that. 这话明明是她说的。||||He is undoubtedly the pride of China. 毫无疑问他是中国的骄傲。

name: cylinder
interpret: n.圆筒，柱(面)，汽缸
example: 单词 cylinder 的例句||||What's the volume of this cylinder? 这个圆筒的体积有多少？||||The cylinder is getting too much gas and not enough air. 汽缸里汽油太多而空气不足。

name: brace
interpret: n. 支柱,曲柄,大括号; vt.绷紧,顶住,(为困难或坏事)做准备；vi.支持；打起精神
example: 单词 brace 的例句||||My daughter has to wear a brace on her teeth. 我的女儿得戴牙套以矫正牙齿。|||| You had better brace yourself for some bad news. 有些坏消息，你最好做好准备。

name: dwarf
interpret: n.矮子，侏儒，矮小的动植物；vt.使…矮小
example: 单词 dwarf 的例句||||The dwarf's long arms were not proportional to his height. 那侏儒的长臂与他的身高不成比例。||||The dwarf shrugged his shoulders and shook his head. 矮子耸耸肩膀，摇摇头。

name: doom
interpret: n.厄运，劫数；vt.注定，命定
example: 单词 doom 的例句||||The report on our economic situation is full of doom and gloom. 这份关于我们经济状况的报告充满了令人绝望和沮丧的调子。||||The dictator met his doom after ten years of rule. 独裁者统治了十年终于完蛋了。

name: habitual
interpret: adj.习惯性的；通常的，惯常的
example: 单词 habitual 的例句||||He is a habitual criminal. 他是一个惯犯。||||They are habitual visitors to our house. 他们是我家的常客。

name: ornament
interpret: vt.装饰，美化；n.装饰，装饰物
example: 单词 ornament 的例句||||The flowers were put on the table for ornament. 花放在桌子上做装饰用。||||She wears a crystal ornament on her chest. 她的前胸戴了一个水晶饰品。

name: missionary
interpret: adj.教会的，传教(士)的；n.传教士
example: 单词 missionary 的例句||||She taught in a missionary school for a couple of years. 她在一所教会学校教了两年书。||||I hope every member understands the value of missionary work. 我希望教友都了解传教工作的价值。

name: quotation
interpret: n.引文，引语，语录；报价，牌价，行情
example: 单词 quotation 的例句||||He finished his speech with a quotation from Shakespeare. 他讲话结束时引用了莎士比亚的语录。||||The quotation is omitted here. 此处引文从略。

name: publicity
interpret: n.众所周知，闻名；宣传，广告
example: 单词 publicity 的例句||||The singer star's marriage got a lot of publicity. 这位歌星的婚事引起了公众的关注。||||He dismissed the event as just a publicity gimmick. 他不理会这件事，只当它是一种宣传手法。

name: reclaim
interpret: vt.要求归还，收回；开垦；vi.抗议，喊叫
example: 单词 reclaim 的例句||||I have tried to reclaim my money without success. 我没能把钱取回来。||||You must present this ticket when you reclaim your luggage. 当你要取回行李时，必须出示这张票子。

name: spacious
interpret: adj.广阔的，宽敞的
example: 单词 spacious 的例句||||Our yard is spacious enough for a swimming pool. 我们的院子很宽敞，足够建一座游泳池。||||The room is bright and spacious. 这房间宽敞明亮。

name: trademark
interpret: n.商标；特征；vt.注册的…商标
example: 单词 trademark 的例句||||The trademark is registered on the book of the Patent Office. 该商标已在专利局登记注册。||||The trademark of the pen was changed. 这钢笔的商标改了。

name: tragic
interpret: adj.悲剧的，悲剧性的，悲惨的
example: 单词 tragic 的例句||||The effect of the pollution on the beaches is absolutely tragic. 污染海滩后果可悲。||||Charles was a man doomed to tragic issues. 查理是个注定不得善终的人。

name: regularity
interpret: n.规律性，规则性；匀称，整齐
example: 单词 regularity 的例句||||The idea is to maintain the regularity of the heartbeat. 问题就是要维持心跳的规律性。||||He exercised with a regularity that amazed us. 他锻炼的规律程度令我们非常惊讶。

name: projector
interpret: n.投影机，放映机，幻灯机
example: 单词 projector 的例句||||There is a new projector in my office. 我的办公室里有一架新的幻灯机。||||How long will it take to set up the projector? 把这个放映机安放好需要多长时间？

name: interface
interpret: n.接合部位，分界面；接口；vi.(使)互相联系
example: 单词 interface 的例句||||My computer has a network interface, which allows me to get to other computers. 我的计算机有网络接口可以与其它计算机连在一起。||||This program has perspicuous interface and extensive application. 该程序界面明了，适用范围广。

name: industrious
interpret: adj.勤劳的，刻苦的，奋发的
example: 单词 industrious 的例句||||If the tiller is industrious, the farmland is productive. 人勤地不懒。||||She was an industrious and willing worker. 她是个勤劳肯干的员工。

name: wade
interpret: vt.跋涉，涉水；vi.跋涉；n.跋涉
example: 单词 wade 的例句||||We had to wade through the river to the opposite bank. 我们只好涉水过河到对岸。||||We cannot but wade across the river. 我们只好趟水过去。

name: boiler
interpret: n.锅炉；煮器(壶，锅等)
example: 单词 boiler 的例句||||That boiler will not hold up under pressure. 那种锅炉受不住压力。||||This new boiler generates more heat than the old one. 这个新锅炉产生的热量比旧锅炉多。

name: collaborate
interpret: vi.协作，合作；协调
example: 单词 collaborate 的例句||||The work gets done more quickly when we collaborate. 我们一旦合作，工作做起来就更快了。||||I would ask you to collaborate with us in this work. 我们愿意请你们在这项工作中和我们合作。

name: commonsense
interpret: adj.有常识的；明白事理的；注重实际的
example: 单词 commonsense 的例句||||It is commonsense to carry an umbrella in this weather. 这种天气带把伞是很自然的。||||These results are no more than a vindication of commonsense analysis. 这些结果只不过是按常理分析得出的事实。

name: complexity
interpret: n.复杂(性)，复杂的事物
example: 单词 complexity 的例句||||Only now did he understand the full complexity of the problem. 直到现在他才明白这一问题的全部复杂性。||||The complexity of the road map puzzled me. 错综复杂的公路图把我搞糊涂了。

name: detector
interpret: n.发觉者，探测器
example: 单词 detector 的例句||||The detector is housed in a streamlined cylindrical container. 探测器安装在流线型圆柱形容器内。||||Please walk through the metal detector. 请走过金属检测器。

name: cosmos
interpret: n.宇宙；秩序，和谐
example: 单词 cosmos 的例句||||Our world is but a small part of the cosmos. 我们的世界仅仅是宇宙的一小部分而已。||||Is there any other intelligent life elsewhere in the cosmos? 在宇宙的其他星球上还存在别的有智慧的生物吗？

name: devour
interpret: vt.吞没；贪婪地注视或谛听，贪读；使着迷
example: 单词 devour 的例句||||Larger fish devour the smaller ones. 大鱼吃小鱼。||||Beauty is but a flower which wrinkle will devour. 美只不过是一朵花，终会被皱纹所吞噬。

name: diesel
interpret: n.柴油发动机，内燃机
example: 单词 diesel 的例句||||We experimented with diesel engines to drive the pumps. 我们试着用柴油机来带动水泵。||||My tractor operates on diesel oil. 我的那台拖拉机用柴油开动。

name: conqueror
interpret: n.征服者，胜利者
example: 单词 conqueror 的例句||||We shall never yield to a conqueror. 我们永远不会向征服者低头。||||They abandoned the city to the conqueror. 他们把那个城市丢弃给征服者。

name: crooked
interpret: adj.弯曲的；不诚实的，狡猾的，不正当的；v.弯成钩形(crook的过去式和过去分词)
example: 单词 crooked 的例句||||He crooked a finger to tell us to go over to him. 他弯了弯手指，示意我们到他那儿去。||||You have to drive slowly on these crooked country roads. 在这些弯弯曲曲的乡间小路上你得慢慢开车。

name: discourse
interpret: n.论文，演说；谈话；话语；vi.讲述，著述
example: 单词 discourse 的例句||||We'll discourse on the subject tonight. 我们今晚要谈论这个问题。||||He fell into discourse with the customers who were drinking at the counter. 他和站在柜台旁的酒客谈了起来。

name: disillusion
interpret: vt.使不再抱幻想，使理想破灭
example: 单词 disillusion 的例句||||Do not say anything to disillusion them. 别说什么叫他们泄气的话。||||I'd hate to be the one to disillusion him. 我不愿意成为那个让他幻想破灭的人。

name: epoch
interpret: n.(新)时代；历元
example: 单词 epoch 的例句||||The epoch of revolution creates great figures. 革命时代造就伟大的人物。||||We're at the end of the historical epoch, and at the dawn of another. 我们正处在一个历史时代的末期，另一个历史时代的开端。

name: everlasting
interpret: adj.永恒的，持久的，无止境的
example: 单词 everlasting 的例句||||These tyres are advertised as being everlasting. 广告上说轮胎持久耐用。||||He believes in everlasting life after death. 他相信死后有不朽的生命。

name: follower
interpret: n.跟随者；随员；门徒；信徒
example: 单词 follower 的例句||||He is a faithful follower of his home football team. 他是他家乡足球队的忠实拥护者。||||Alexander is a pious follower of the faith. 亚历山大是个虔诚的信徒。

name: preservation
interpret: n.保护，维护，保存，保留，保持
example: 单词 preservation 的例句||||The police are responsible for the preservation of law and order. 警察负责维持法律与秩序。||||The picture is in an excellent state of preservation. 这幅画保存得极为完好。

name: obsession
interpret: n.困扰，无法摆脱的思想(或情感)
example: 单词 obsession 的例句||||I was suffering from obsession that my career would be ended. 那时的我陷入了我的事业有可能就此终止的困扰当中。||||She would try to forget her obsession with Christopher. 她会努力忘记对克里斯托弗的迷恋。

name: epidemic
interpret: n.流行病；盛行；adj.流行性的，流传极广的
example: 单词 epidemic 的例句||||That kind of epidemic disease has long been stamped out. 那种传染病早已绝迹。||||The authorities tried to localise the epidemic. 当局试图把流行病限制在局部范围。

name: transformation
interpret: n.变化；改造；转变
example: 单词 transformation 的例句||||Going to college brought about a dramatic transformation in her outlook. 上大学使她的观念发生了巨大的变化。||||He was struggling to make the transformation from single man to responsible husband. 他正在努力使自己由单身汉变为可靠的丈夫。

name: hostility
interpret: n.敌对，敌意；抵制［pl.］交战，战争
example: 单词 hostility 的例句||||There is open hostility between the two leaders. 两位领导人表现出公开的敌意。||||His hostility to your plan is well known. 他对你的计划所持的敌意是众所周知的。

name: attachment
interpret: n.附属物，附件；依恋；依附
example: 单词 attachment 的例句||||She has a great attachment to her sister. 她十分依恋她的姐姐。||||She's on attachment to the Ministry of Defense. 她现在隶属于国防部。

name: capability
interpret: n.能力；才能；(pl)可发展的能力或特性等
example: 单词 capability 的例句||||She has the capability to become a very fine actress. 她有潜力成为杰出演员。||||Organizing a whole department is beyond his capability. 组织整个部门是他能力以外的事。

name: paradox
interpret: n.似乎矛盾却正确的说法；自相矛盾的人(物)
example: 单词 paradox 的例句||||The story contains many levels of paradox. 这个故事存在多重悖论。||||The paradox is that Japan does need serious education reform. 矛盾的地方是日本确实需要教育改革。

name: lieutenant
interpret: n.陆军中尉，海军上尉；代理官员，副职官员
example: 单词 lieutenant 的例句||||He was promoted to be a lieutenant in the army. 他被提升为陆军中尉。||||He prevailed on the lieutenant to send in a short note. 他说动那个副官，递上了一张简短的便条进去。

name: guilt
interpret: n.犯罪；内疚；过失，罪责
example: 单词 guilt 的例句||||She tried to cover up her guilt by lying. 她企图用谎言掩饰自己的罪行。||||Don't lay a guilt trip on your child about schoolwork. 别因为功课责备孩子而使他觉得很内疚。

name: sociologist
interpret: n.研究社会学的人，社会学家
example: 单词 sociologist 的例句||||His mother was a sociologist, researching socialism. 他的母亲是个社会学家，研究社会主义。||||Max Weber is a great and outstanding sociologist. 马克斯·韦伯是一位伟大的、杰出的社会学家。

name: adoption
interpret: n.采用，采纳，通过；收养
example: 单词 adoption 的例句||||An adoption agency had sent the boys to two different families. 一个收养机构把他们送给两个不同的家庭。||||The adoption of this policy would relieve them of a tremendous burden. 采取这一政策会给他们解除一个巨大的负担。

name: inventory
interpret: n.详细目录，存货清单；vt.编制…的目录；开列…的清单；盘存；总结
example: 单词 inventory 的例句||||Some stores inventory their stock once a week. 有些商店每周清点存货一次。||||We will need to call on our supplier to get more inventory. 我们必须请供应商送来更多存货。

name: salmon
interpret: n.鲑，大马哈鱼，橙红色的
example: 单词 salmon 的例句||||We saw a salmon jumping in the waterfall there. 我们看见一条大马哈鱼在那边瀑布中跳跃。||||Do you have any fresh salmon in at the moment? 现在有新鲜大马哈鱼卖吗？

name: ashore
interpret: adv.在(向)岸上，上岸
example: 单词 ashore 的例句||||The children got ashore before the tide came in. 涨潮前，孩子们就上岸了。||||He laid hold of the rope and pulled the boat ashore. 他抓住绳子拉船靠岸。

name: courteous
interpret: adj.彬彬有礼的，客气的
example: 单词 courteous 的例句||||Although she often disagreed with me, she was always courteous. 尽管她常常和我意见不一，但她总是很谦恭有礼。||||He was a kind and courteous man. 他为人友善，而且彬彬有礼。

name: tact
interpret: n.机敏，圆滑，得体
example: 单词 tact 的例句||||She showed great tact in dealing with a tricky situation. 她处理棘手的局面表现得十分老练。||||Tact is a valuable commodity. 圆滑老练是很有用处的。

name: ethics
interpret: n.伦理学；伦理观，道德标准
example: 单词 ethics 的例句||||The ethics of his profession don't permit him to do that. 他的职业道德不允许他那样做。||||Personal ethics and professional ethics sometimes conflict. 个人道德和职业道德有时会相互抵触。

name: enquire
interpret: vi.打听，询问；调查，查问；vt.询问；打听
example: 单词 enquire 的例句||||She wrote to enquire the cause of the delay. 她只得写信去询问拖延的理由。||||We will enquire into the matter. 我们将调查这事。

name: morale
interpret: n.道德准则，士气，斗志
example: 单词 morale 的例句||||The morale of the enemy troops is sinking lower every day. 敌军的士气日益低落。||||He tried to bolster up their morale. 他尽力鼓舞他们的士气。

name: prick
interpret: vt.刺伤，刺痛，刺孔；vi. 刺；竖起；n.刺伤，刺痛
example: 单词 prick 的例句||||He felt a sharp prick when he stepped on an upturned nail. 当他踩在一个尖朝上的钉子上时，他感到剧烈的疼痛。||||He burst the balloon with a prick of the pin. 他用针一戳，气球就爆了。

name: proceeding
interpret: n.行动，进行，(pl.)会议录，学报
example: 单词 proceeding 的例句||||This train is now proceeding from Paris to London. 这次列车从巴黎开往伦敦。||||The work is proceeding briskly. 工作很有生气地进展着。

name: prudent
interpret: adj.谨慎的，有远见的，精打细算的
example: 单词 prudent 的例句||||A prudent traveller never disparages his own country. 聪明的旅行者从不贬低自己的国家。||||You must school yourself to be modest and prudent. 你要学会谦虚谨慎。

name: ripple
interpret: n.涟波，涟漪，波纹，粗钢梳；vt.使...起涟漪，使起波纹； vi.呈波浪状，起伏前进
example: 单词 ripple 的例句||||The pebble made a ripple on the surface of the lake. 石子在湖面上激起一个涟漪。||||The small ripple split upon the beach. 小小的涟漪卷来，碎在沙滩上。

name: repeal
interpret: n.废止，撤消；vt.废止，撤消
example: 单词 repeal 的例句||||He plans to repeal a number of current policies. 他计划废除一些当前的政策。||||He has made out a strong case for the repeal of the law. 他提出强有力的理由，赞成废除该法令。

name: sham
interpret: n./adj.假冒(的)，虚伪(的)
example: 单词 sham 的例句||||They cunningly played the game of sham peace. 他们狡滑地玩弄假和平的把戏。||||His love was a mere sham. 他的爱情是虚假的。

name: ruby
interpret: n.红宝石，红宝石色
example: 单词 ruby 的例句||||She is wearing a small ruby earring. 她戴着一枚红宝石小耳环。||||On the handle of his sword sat the biggest ruby in the world. 他的剑柄上镶有一颗世上最大的红宝石。

name: shipwreck
interpret: n.船舶失事，海难
example: 单词 shipwreck 的例句||||He walked away from the shipwreck. 他船难中平安地脱险了。||||The shipwreck was a harrowing experience. 那次船难是一个惨痛的经历。

name: resolute
interpret: adj.坚决的，果敢的
example: 单词 resolute 的例句||||He was resolute in carrying out his plan. 他坚决地实行他的计划。||||The Egyptians offered resolute resistance to the aggressors. 埃及人对侵略者作出坚决的反抗。

name: shrine
interpret: n.圣地，神龛，庙；vt.将...置于神龛内，把...奉为神圣
example: 单词 shrine 的例句||||The shrine was an object of pilgrimage. 这处圣地是人们朝圣的目的地。||||They bowed down before the shrine. 他们在神龛前鞠躬示敬。

name: shutter
interpret: n.百叶窗；(照相机)快门；关闭装置
example: 单词 shutter 的例句||||The camera has a shutter speed of one-sixtieth of a second. 这架照像机的快门速度达六十分之一秒。||||The shutter rattled in the wind. 百叶窗在风中发出嘎嘎声。

name: sneer
interpret: vt.&vi.轻蔑；嘲笑；n.嘲笑，讥讽的言语
example: 单词 sneer 的例句||||He said with a sneer. 他的话中带有嘲笑之意。||||You may sneer, but a lot of people like this kind of music. 你可以嗤之以鼻，但很多人喜欢这种音乐。

name: sincerity
interpret: n.真诚，诚意；真实
example: 单词 sincerity 的例句||||His sincerity added much more authority to the story. 他的真诚更增加了故事的说服力。||||He tried hard to satisfy me of his sincerity. 他竭力让我了解他的诚意。

name: solidarity
interpret: n.团结；休戚相关
example: 单词 solidarity 的例句||||They must preserve their solidarity. 他们必须维护他们的团结。||||The solidarity among China's various nationalities is as firm as a rock. 中国各族人民之间的团结坚如磐石。

name: solidify
interpret: vt&.vi.(使)凝固，(使)固化，(使)团结
example: 单词 solidify 的例句||||Opinion on this question began to solidify. 对这个问题的意见开始具体化了。||||Water will solidify into ice if you freeze it. 水冷冻会结冰。

name: spatial
interpret: adj.空间的，占据空间的
example: 单词 spatial 的例句||||This part of brain judges the spatial relationship between objects. 大脑的这部分判断物体间的空间关系。||||They said that time is the feeling of spatial displacement. 他们说时间是空间位移的感觉。

name: specification
interpret: n.详述；[常pl.]规格，说明书，规范
example: 单词 specification 的例句||||I want to know his specification of details. 我想知道他对细节的详述。||||Examination confirmed that the quality of the products was up to specification. 经检查，产品质量合格。

name: subdue
interpret: vt.制服，使顺从，征服；抑制，克制
example: 单词 subdue 的例句||||She tried to subdue her anger. 她尽力压制自己的怒火。||||He forced himself to subdue and overcome his fears. 他强迫自己克制并战胜恐惧心理。

name: torment
interpret: n.折磨；令人痛苦的东西(人)；vt.折磨；纠缠
example: 单词 torment 的例句||||He has never suffered the torment of rejection. 他从未经受过遭人拒绝的痛苦。||||Now nothing aggravates me more than when people torment each other. 没有什么东西比人们的互相折磨更使我愤怒。

name: superstition
interpret: n.迷信，迷信行为
example: 单词 superstition 的例句||||It's a common superstition that black cats are unlucky. 认为黑猫不吉祥是一种很普遍的迷信。||||Superstition results from ignorance. 迷信产生于无知。

name: streamline
interpret: vt.使成流线型；使简化；使现代化；n.流线，流线型
example: 单词 streamline 的例句||||We must streamline our methods. 我们必须简化方法。||||Any liquid or gas passing it will have streamline flow. 任何通过它的液体或气体将呈流线型的流动。

name: strife
interpret: n.争吵，冲突，倾轧，竞争
example: 单词 strife 的例句||||We do not intend to be drawn into the internal strife. 我们不想卷入内乱之中。||||Money is a major cause of strife in many marriages. 金钱是造成很多婚姻不和的一个主要原因。

name: trample
interpret: vt.踩，践踏；无视，伤害，侵犯
example: 单词 trample 的例句||||Don't trample on the grass. 勿踏草地。||||Don't trample on the flowers when you play in the garden. 在花园里玩耍时，不要踩坏花。

name: tranquil
interpret: adj. 安静的, 宁静的, 稳定的, 不变的
example: 单词 tranquil 的例句||||The boy disturbed the tranquil surface of the pond with a stick. 那男孩用棍子打破了平静的池面。||||The tranquil beauty of the village scenery is unique. 这乡村景色的宁静是绝无仅有的。

name: wrath
interpret: n.愤怒，愤慨，暴怒
example: 单词 wrath 的例句||||His silence marked his wrath. 他的沉默表明了他的愤怒。|||| The wrath of the people is now aroused. 人们被激怒了。

name: symposium
interpret: n.讨论会，专题报告会；专题论文集
example: 单词 symposium 的例句||||What have you learned from the symposium? 你参加了这次科学讨论会有什么体会？||||The specialists and scholars present at the symposium come from all corners of the country. 出席研讨会的专家学者们来自全国各地。

name: trench
interpret: n.(挖)沟，(挖)战壕；vi.挖战壕；侵害；vt.掘沟
example: 单词 trench 的例句||||The soldiers recaptured their trench. 兵士夺回了战壕。||||The troops received orders to trench the outpost. 部队接到命令在前哨周围筑壕加强防卫。

name: wrestle
interpret: vi.摔跤，角力；搏斗；全力对付
example: 单词 wrestle 的例句||||He taught his little brother how to wrestle. 他教他小弟弟如何摔跤。||||We have to wrestle with difficulties. 我们必须同困难作斗争。

name: wring
interpret: n.扭绞；vt.拧，绞出，扭；vi.蠕动；扭动；感到痛苦；感到苦恼
example: 单词 wring 的例句||||My socks were so wet that I had to wring them. 我的袜子很湿，我不得不拧干它们。||||I'll wring your neck if you don't behave! 你要是不规矩，我就拧断你的脖子。

name: avert
interpret: vt.防止，避免；转移(目光、注意力等)
example: 单词 avert 的例句||||He managed to avert suspicion. 他设法避嫌。||||I would do what I could to avert it. 我会尽力去避免发生这种情况。

name: authoritative
interpret: adj.有权威的，可相信的；命令式的；官方的
example: 单词 authoritative 的例句||||David speaks in an authoritative tone. 大卫以命令的口吻说话。||||Her smile was warm but authoritative. 她的笑容很和蔼，同时又透着威严。

name: augment
interpret: vt.(使)增大，增加，增长，扩张
example: 单词 augment 的例句||||They hit upon another idea to augment their income. 他们又想出一个增加收入的办法。||||The government's first concern was to augment the army and auxiliary forces. 政府首先关心的是增强军队和辅助的力量。

name: apprehension
interpret: n.理解，领悟；逮捕，拘捕；忧虑
example: 单词 apprehension 的例句||||There were still areas of doubt and her apprehension grew. 有些地方仍然存疑，于是她越来越担心。||||She is a girl of weak apprehension. 她是一个理解力很差的女孩。

name: appraisal
interpret: n.对…作出的评价；评价，鉴定，评估
example: 单词 appraisal 的例句||||What's your appraisal of the situation? 你对局势是如何评估的？||||We need to make a proper appraisal of his work. 对于他的工作我们需要做出适当的评价。

name: analytic
interpret: adj.分析的，用分析方法的
example: 单词 analytic 的例句||||The boy has an analytic mind. 这男孩有分析的头脑。||||Latin is a synthetic language, while English is analytic. 拉丁文是一种综合性语言，而英语是一种分析性语言。

name: transit
interpret: n.经过，运输；vt.穿越，旋转；vi.越过
example: 单词 transit 的例句||||His luggage was lost in transit. 他的行李在运送中丢失。||||The canal can transit a total of 50 ships daily. 这条运河每天能通过50条船。

name: transcend
interpret: vt.超出，超越(理性等)的范围
example: 单词 transcend 的例句||||We can't transcend the limitations of the ego. 我们无法超越自我的局限性。||||Everyone knows that the speed of airplanes transcend that of ships. 人人都知道飞机的速度快于轮船的速度。

name: tract
interpret: n.传单，小册子，大片(土地或森林)
example: 单词 tract 的例句||||He owns a large tract of forest. 他拥有一大片森林。||||He wrote a tract on this subject. 他曾对此写了一篇短文。

name: vocal
interpret: adj.直言不讳的；嗓音的；n.[pl.]声乐节目
example: 单词 vocal 的例句||||The tongue is a vocal organ. 舌头是一个发音器官。||||Public opinion at last became vocal. 终于舆论哗然。

name: visualize
interpret: vt.使看得见，使具体化，想象，设想
example: 单词 visualize 的例句||||I remember meeting the man before but I can't visualize him. 我记得以前见过那个人，但他的样子我想不起来了。||||She couldn't visualize flying through space. 她无法想像在太空中飞行的景象。

name: entity
interpret: n.实体，独立存在体，实际存在物
example: 单词 entity 的例句||||The country is no longer one political entity. 这个国家不再是一个统一的政治实体了。||||As a separate legal entity, the corporation must pay taxes. 作为一个独立的法律实体，公司必须纳税。

name: dilute
interpret: vt.稀释，冲淡；adj.稀释的，冲淡的
example: 单词 dilute 的例句||||The water will dilute the wine. 水能使酒变淡。||||Zinc displaces the hydrogen of dilute acids. 锌置换了稀酸中的氢。

name: entail
interpret: vt.使承担，使成为必要，需要
example: 单词 entail 的例句||||Such a decision would entail a huge political risk. 这样的决定势必带来巨大的政治风险。||||This job would entail your learning how to use a computer. 这工作将需要你学会怎样用计算机。

name: diffuse
interpret: vt.&vi.扩散；传播；adj.冗长的；四散的，弥漫的
example: 单词 diffuse 的例句||||Direct light is better for reading than diffuse light. 直射光比漫射光更有利于阅读。||||His talk was so diffuse that I missed his point. 他的谈话漫无边际，我抓不住他的要点。

name: differentiate
interpret: vi.(between)区分；vt.区别；使不同
example: 单词 differentiate 的例句||||You can differentiate between the houses by the shape of their chimneys. 你可以凭借烟囱形状的不同来区分这两幢房子。||||He never learned to differentiate between good and evil. 他从未学会分辨善恶。

name: clearance
interpret: n.净空；许可(证)；清算；清除，清理
example: 单词 clearance 的例句||||There was a clearance of only ten centimetres between the two walls. 两堵墙之间只有十厘米的空隙。||||The ship sailed as soon as it got clearance. 那艘船一办好离港手续立刻启航了。

name: deteriorate
interpret: vi.变坏；恶化；退化；vt.恶化
example: 单词 deteriorate 的例句||||Do you think relations between China and Japan will continue to deteriorate? 你认为中日关系会继续恶化吗？||||He held that this would only cause the situation to deteriorate further. 他认为，这只会使局势更加恶化。

name: destined
interpret: adj.命中注定的；(for)以…为目的地的
example: 单词 destined 的例句||||It was destined that they would marry. 他们结婚是缘分。||||The shipment is destined for America. 这批货物将运往美国。

name: embed
interpret: vt.把…嵌(埋、插)入，扎牢；使深留脑中
example: 单词 embed 的例句||||The harpoon struck but did not embed. 鱼叉击中了但并没有插入。||||This photo showed us how did the root of plant embed the soil deeply. 这张照片显示植物的根是如何深入到土壤里去的。

name: chronic
interpret: adj.(疾病)长期未愈的，慢性的；极坏的
example: 单词 chronic 的例句||||Famine differs from chronic malnutrition. 饥荒不同于慢性营养不良。||||Chronic poisoning may lead to death from inanition. 慢性中毒也可能由虚弱导致死亡。

name: despatch
interpret: vt.(dispatch)派遣；发送；vi. 匆匆离开；n.急件；新闻报道
example: 单词 despatch 的例句||||The despatch of the task force is purely a contingency measure. 派出特遣部队纯粹是应急之举。||||He rushed the despatch through to headquarters. 他把急件赶送到总部。

name: embark
interpret: vi.乘船，着手，从事，上飞机；使从事，使上传
example: 单词 embark 的例句||||He is about to embark on a new business venture. 他就要开始新的商业冒险活动。||||Many people embark for Europe at New York harbor. 许多人在纽约港乘船去欧洲。

name: eloquent
interpret: adj.雄辩的，口才流利的；明白显示出的
example: 单词 eloquent 的例句||||He was so eloquent that he cut down the finest orator. 他能言善辩，胜过最好的演说家。||||These ruins are an eloquent reminder of the horrors of war. 这些废墟形象地提醒人们不要忘记战争的恐怖。

name: elite
interpret: n.精英阶层；实力集团；adj.杰出的，卓越的
example: 单词 elite 的例句||||The power elite inside the government is controlling foreign policy. 政府内部的一群握有实权的精英控制着对外政策。||||We have a political elite in this country. 我们国家有一群政治精英。

name: eligible
interpret: adj.有条件被选中的；(尤指婚姻等)合适(意)的
example: 单词 eligible 的例句||||He is an eligible young man. 他是一个合格的年轻人。||||Helen married an eligible bachelor. 海伦嫁给了一个中意的单身汉。

name: elicit
interpret: vt.引出,抽出,引起
example: 单词 elicit 的例句||||It was designed to elicit the best thinking within the government. 机构的设置是为了在政府内部集思广益。||||Don't try to elicit business secrets from me. I won't tell you anything. 你休想从我这里套问出我们的商业机密，我什么都不会告诉你的。

name: depict
interpret: vt.描画，描绘；描写，描述
example: 单词 depict 的例句||||I don't care to see plays or films that depict murders or violence. 我不喜欢看描写谋杀或暴力的戏剧或电影。||||Children's books often depict farmyard animals as gentle, lovable creatures. 儿童图书常常把农场的动物描写得温和而可爱。

name: certify
interpret: vt.证明，证实；发证书(或执照)给
example: 单词 certify 的例句||||I can certify to his good character. 我可以证明他品德好。||||This swimming certificate is to certify that I can swim one hundred meters. 这张游泳证是用以证明我可以游100米远。

name: degenerate
interpret: vi.退步，堕落；vt.使退化；恶化；adj.退步的，堕落的；n.堕落者
example: 单词 degenerate 的例句||||He didn't let riches and luxury make him degenerate. 他不因财富和奢华而自甘堕落。||||Will too much freedom make them degenerate? 太多的自由会令他们堕落吗？

name: ego
interpret: n.自我，自己，自尊
example: 单词 ego 的例句||||He is absolute ego in all thing. 在所有的事情上他都绝对自我。||||She has been on an ego trip since she sang on television. 她上电视台唱过歌之后就一直自吹自擂。

name: notation
interpret: n.记号法，表示法，注释；[计算机]记法
example: 单词 notation 的例句||||Music has a special system of notation. 音乐有一套特殊的标记法。||||We shall find it convenient to adopt the following notation. 采用下面的记号是方便的。

name: nominal
interpret: adj.名义上的；(金额、租金)微不足道的
example: 单词 nominal 的例句||||The king was only the nominal head of the state. 国王只是这个国家名义上的元首。||||The charge of the box lunch was nominal. 午餐盒饭收费很少。

name: minimal
interpret: adj.尽可能少的，最小的
example: 单词 minimal 的例句||||They referred to this kind of art as minimal art. 他们把这种艺术叫微型艺术。||||I stayed with friends, so my expenses were minimal. 我住在朋友家，所以我的花费很小。

name: militant
interpret: adj.激进的，好斗的；n.激进分子，斗士
example: 单词 militant 的例句||||Some militant leaders want to merge with white radicals. 一些好斗的领导人要和白人中的激进派联合。||||He is a militant in the movement. 他在那次运动中是个激进人物。

name: necessitate
interpret: vt.使成为必要，需要
example: 单词 necessitate 的例句||||Your proposal would necessitate changing our plans. 你的提议可能使我们的计划必须变更。||||The conversion will necessitate the complete rebuilding of the interior. 转变就必需完善内部重建。

name: naive
interpret: adj.幼稚的，轻信的；天真的
example: 单词 naive 的例句||||It's naive of you to believe he'll do what he says. 相信他会言行一致，你未免太单纯了。||||Don't be naive. The matter is not so simple. 你别傻乎乎的。事情没有那么简单。

name: merge
interpret: vt.&vi.(使)结合，(使)合并，(使)合为一体
example: 单词 merge 的例句||||I can merge my two small businesses into a large one. 我可以将我的两家小商店合并为一家大商行。||||The directors have decided to merge the two small firms together. 董事们已决定把这两家小商号归并起来。

name: inhibit
interpret: vt.阻止，妨碍，抑制
example: 单词 inhibit 的例句||||Don't let ego and greed inhibit clear thinking and hard work. 不要让自我和贪婪妨碍清晰的思维和刻苦的工作。||||They passed a law to inhibit people from parking in the street. 他们通过一项法令以阻止人们在街上停车。

name: inflict
interpret: vt.(on)把…强加给，使遭受，使承担
example: 单词 inflict 的例句||||Don't inflict your ideas on me. 不要把你的想法强加于我。||||Don't inflict damage on any person. 不要伤害任何人。

name: incur
interpret: vt.招致，蒙受，遭遇
example: 单词 incur 的例句||||Any costs that you incur will be reimbursed in full. 你的所有花费都将全额付还。||||An enterprise has to incur certain costs and expenses in order to stay in business. 一个企业为了维持营业，就不得不承担一定的费用和开支。

name: layman
interpret: n.俗人，门外汉，凡人
example: 单词 layman 的例句||||These technical terms are difficult for the layman to understand. 这些专门术语是外行人难以理解的。||||He is a layman in politics. 他对政治是个门外汉。

name: implicit
interpret: adj.暗示的，含蓄的，不明晰的，绝对的
example: 单词 implicit 的例句||||A soldier must give implicit obedience to his officers. 士兵必须绝对服从他的长官。||||Her silence gave implicit consent. 她的沉默表示默许。

name: impetus
interpret: n.推动，促进，刺激；推动力
example: 单词 impetus 的例句||||This is the primary impetus behind the economic recovery. 这是促使经济复苏的主要动力。||||Her speech gave an impetus to my ideas. 她的讲话激发了我的思绪。

name: justification
interpret: n.正当的理由；辩解的理由
example: 单词 justification 的例句||||There's no justification for dividing the company into smaller units. 没有理由把公司划分成小单位。|||| In the young there is a justification for this feeling. 在年轻人中有这种感觉是有理由的。

name: jeopardize
interpret: vt.危及，损害
example: 单词 jeopardize 的例句||||Overworking can jeopardize your health. 工作过量可能会危及你的健康。||||If you are rude to the boss it may jeopardize your chances of success. 如果你对上司无礼，那就可能断送你成功的机会。

name: guardian
interpret: n.监护人；守卫者，保护者
example: 单词 guardian 的例句||||The form must be signed by the child's parents or guardian. 这张表格须由孩子的家长或监护人签字。||||The press is a guardian of the public weal. 报刊是公共福利的卫护者。

name: hierarchy
interpret: n.等级制度；统治集团，领导层
example: 单词 hierarchy 的例句||||There is a rigid hierarchy of power in that country. 那个国家有一套严密的权力等级制度。||||She's high up in the management hierarchy. 她在管理阶层中地位很高。

name: gaol
interpret: n.(jail)监狱；(不加冠词)监禁；vt.使…坐牢
example: 单词 gaol 的例句||||He was released from the gaol. 他被释放出狱。||||The man spent several years in gaol for robbery. 这男人因犯抢劫罪而坐了几年牢。

name: facet
interpret: n.(问题等的)一个方面；(多面体的)面
example: 单词 facet 的例句||||He has perfected himself in every facet of his job. 他已使自己对工作的各个方面都得心应手。||||Every facet of college life is fascinating. 大学生活的每个方面都令人兴奋。

name: envisage
interpret: vt.想象，设想，展望，正视
example: 单词 envisage 的例句||||Nobody can envisage the consequences of total nuclear war. 没有人能够想像全面核战争的后果。||||When do you envisage being able to pay me back? 你看你什么时候能还我钱？

name: lengthen
interpret: vt.使伸长，延长
example: 单词 lengthen 的例句||||He asked the tailor to lengthen his coat. 他请裁缝把他的外衣放长些。||||The teacher told her to lengthen her paper out. 老师让她把论文加长。

name: maiden
interpret: n.少女，处女；adj.未婚的，纯洁的，无经验的
example: 单词 maiden 的例句||||The prince fell in love with a fair young maiden. 王子爱上了一位年轻美丽的少女。||||The aircraft makes its maiden flight tomorrow. 这架飞机明天首航。

name: incompatible
interpret: adj.不相容的，不协调的，不相配的
example: 单词 incompatible 的例句||||His plan is incompatible with my intent. 他的计划与我的意图不相符。||||Speed and safety are not necessarily incompatible. 速度和安全未必不相容。

name: magnetism
interpret: n.磁性，吸引力，磁学，吸引力
example: 单词 magnetism 的例句||||We know about magnetism by the way magnets act. 我们通过磁铁的作用知道磁性是怎么一回事。||||His success showed his magnetism of courage and devotion. 他的成功表现了他的胆量和热诚的魅力。

name: hoist
interpret: n.升高，起重机，推动；v.升起，升高，举起
example: 单词 hoist 的例句||||By using a hoist the movers were able to sling the piano to the third floor. 搬运工人用吊车才把钢琴吊到3楼。||||Hoist the Chinese flag on the flagpole, please! 请在旗杆上升起中国国旗！

name: impartial
interpret: adj.(in,to)公正的，无偏见的
example: 单词 impartial 的例句||||He gave an impartial view of the state of affairs in Ireland. 他对爱尔兰的事态发表了公正的看法。||||Careers officers offer impartial advice to all pupils. 就业指导员向所有学生提供公正无私的建议。

name: immortal
interpret: adj.不朽的；永生的，不死的；神的
example: 单词 immortal 的例句||||The wild cocoa tree is effectively immortal. 野生可可树实际上是不会死的。||||The heroes of the people are immortal! 人民英雄永垂不朽！

name: illiterate
interpret: adj.文盲的；无知的；n.文盲
example: 单词 illiterate 的例句||||There are still many illiterate people in our country. 在我国还有许多文盲。||||I was an illiterate in the old society, but now I can read. 我这个旧社会的文盲，今天也认字了。

name: hearty
interpret: adj.热情友好的；衷心的；尽情的，纵情的
example: 单词 hearty 的例句||||After work they made a hearty meal in the worker's canteen. 工作完了，他们在工人食堂饱餐了一顿。||||We accorded him a hearty welcome. 我们给他热忱的欢迎。

name: hamper
interpret: vt.妨碍，束缚，限制；n.(有盖的)大篮子
example: 单词 hamper 的例句||||There are some apples in a picnic hamper. 在野餐用的大篮子里有许多苹果。||||The emergence of such problems seriously hamper the development of enterprises. 这些问题的出现严重阻碍了企业的发展。

name: elevation
interpret: n.高度；海拔；高地；上升；提高
example: 单词 elevation 的例句||||The house is at an elevation of 2, 000 metres. 那幢房子位于海拔两千米的高处。||||His elevation to the position of General Manager was announced yesterday. 昨天宣布他晋升总经理职位。

name: desolate
interpret: adj.荒凉的，荒芜的；孤独的，凄凉的；vt.使荒芜，使孤寂
example: 单词 desolate 的例句||||The city was burned into a desolate waste. 那座城市被烧成一片废墟。||||We all felt absolutely desolate when she left. 她走后，我们都觉得万分孤寂。

name: deafen
interpret: vt.震耳欲聋；使听不清楚
example: 单词 deafen 的例句||||This noise will deafen us all! 这种喧闹声将使我们什么也听不见！||||The way you complain all day long would deafen the living buddha! 就凭你成天抱怨，活佛耳朵都要聋了！

name: datum
interpret: n.资料；数据；已知数
example: 单词 datum 的例句||||The author has taught foreigners Chinese for many years and gathered rich language datum. 作者长期从事对外汉语教学，积累了丰富的语言资料。||||Every theory, datum, or fact is generated by purpose. 任何理论，资料、事实都来自于一定的目的。

name: barley
interpret: n.大麦，大麦粒
example: 单词 barley 的例句||||They looked out across the fields of waving barley. 他们朝田里望去，只见大麦随风摇摆。||||He cropped several acres with barley. 他种了几英亩大麦。

name: barge
interpret: n.平底载货船，驳船
example: 单词 barge 的例句||||The barge was loaded up with coal. 那艘驳船装上了煤。||||Carrying goods by train costs nearly three times more than carrying them by barge. 通过铁路运货的成本比驳船运货成本高出近3倍。

name: analogue
interpret: n.类似物；同源语
example: 单词 analogue 的例句||||The gill of a fish is the analogue of the lung of a cat. 鱼的鳃和猫的肺是类似物。||||But aside from that analogue standby, the phone, video conferencing is their favorite means of communication. 除了备用的相似物，电话，可视对话是他们最喜欢的沟通手段。

name: allied
interpret: adj.协约国的；同盟国的
example: 单词 allied 的例句||||Britain was allied with the United States many times in history. 历史上英国曾多次与美国结盟。||||Allied forces sustained heavy losses in the first few weeks. 同盟国在最初几周内遭受了巨大的损失。

name: advantageous
interpret: adj.有利的；有帮助的
example: 单词 advantageous 的例句||||Injections of vitamin C are obviously advantageous. 注射维生素C显然是有利的。||||You're in a very advantageous position. 你处于非常有利的地位。

name: abide
interpret: vi.遵守；坚持；vt.忍受
example: 单词 abide 的例句||||You must abide by the results of your mistakes. 你必须承担你的错误所造成的后果。||||If you join the club, you have to abide by its rules. 如果你参加俱乐部，你就得遵守它的规章。

name: vent
interpret: n.通风口，排放口；开衩；vt.表达，发泄
example: 单词 vent 的例句||||He gave vent to his anger by swearing loudly. 他高声咒骂以发泄他的愤怒。||||When the vent became plugged, the engine would stop. 当通风口被堵塞时，发动机就会停转。

name: testimony
interpret: n.证词；见证，证明
example: 单词 testimony 的例句||||The testimony given by him is dubious. 他所作的证据是可疑的。||||He was called in to bear testimony to what the police officer said. 他被传入为警官所说的话作证。

name: unify
interpret: vt.使联合，统一；使相同，使一致
example: 单词 unify 的例句||||How can we unify such scattered islands into a nation? 我们怎么才能把如此分散的岛屿统一成一个国家呢？||||It is difficult to imagine how the North and South could ever agree on a formula to unify the divided peninsula. 很难想象南北双方在统一半岛的方案上究竟怎样才能达成一致。

name: underlying
interpret: adj.在下面的，含蓄的，潜在的
example: 单词 underlying 的例句||||The underlying theme of the novel is very serious. 小说隐含的主题是十分严肃的。||||This word has its underlying meaning. 这个单词有它潜在的含义。

name: tempo
interpret: n.(音乐的)速度；节奏，行进速度
example: 单词 tempo 的例句||||The boss is unsatisfied with the tardy tempo. 老板不满于这种缓慢的进度。||||They waltz to the tempo of the music. 他们跟着音乐的节奏跳华尔兹舞。

name: temperament
interpret: n.气质，性格，性情
example: 单词 temperament 的例句||||The analysis of what kind of temperament you possess is vital. 分析一下你有什么样的气质是十分重要的。||||Success often depends on temperament. 成功常常取决于一个人的性格。

name: tariff
interpret: n.关税，税率；(旅馆、饭店等)价目表，收费表
example: 单词 tariff 的例句||||There is a very high tariff on jewelry. 宝石类的关税率很高。||||The government is going to lower the tariff on importing cars. 政府打算降低进口汽车的关税。

name: skeptical
interpret: adj.怀疑的，多疑的
example: 单词 skeptical 的例句||||Others here are more skeptical about the chances for justice being done. 这里的其他人更为怀疑正义能否得到伸张。||||Her look was skeptical and resigned. 她的表情是将信将疑而又无可奈何。

name: plausible
interpret: adj.似真实的，似乎有理的，似乎可信的
example: 单词 plausible 的例句||||His story sounded plausible. 他说的那番话似乎是真实的。||||Her story sounded perfectly plausible. 她的说辞听起来言之有理。

name: redundant
interpret: adj.多余的，过剩的；(食物)丰富的；被解雇的
example: 单词 redundant 的例句||||There are too many redundant words in this book. 这本书里多余的词太多。||||Nearly all the redundant workers have been absorbed into other departments. 几乎所有冗员，都已调往其他部门任职。

name: physiological
interpret: adj.生理学的，生理学上的
example: 单词 physiological 的例句||||He bought a physiological book. 他买了一本生理学方面的书。||||Every individual has a physiological requirement for each nutrient. 每个人对每种营养成分都有一种生理上的需要。

name: recur
interpret: vi.复发，重现，再发生
example: 单词 recur 的例句||||Economic crises recur periodically. 经济危机周期性地发生。||||Of course, many problems recur at various periods. 当然，有许多问题会在不同的时期反复发生。

name: segregate
interpret: adj.分离的，被隔离的；vt.使分离，使隔离
example: 单词 segregate 的例句||||We have to segregate for a few day. 我们得分离一段日子。||||Some societies still segregate men and women. 有的社会仍然将男女隔离。

name: persistent
interpret: adj.坚持不懈的，执意的；持续的
example: 单词 persistent 的例句||||Albert had a persistent headache that lasted for three days. 艾伯特连续头痛了三天。||||She felt embarrassed by his persistent attentions. 他不时地向她大献殷勤，使她很难为情。

name: permissible
interpret: adj.可允许的，许可的
example: 单词 permissible 的例句||||Is smoking permissible in the theatre? 在剧院里允许吸烟吗？||||Delay is not permissible, even for a single day. 不得延误，即使一日亦不可。

name: scrutiny
interpret: n.详细检查，仔细观察
example: 单词 scrutiny 的例句||||His work looks all right, but it will not bear scrutiny. 他的工作似乎很好，但是经不起仔细检查。||||Few wives in their forties can weather such a scrutiny. 很少年过四十的妻子经得起这么仔细的观察。

name: permeate
interpret: vt.&vi.弥漫，遍布，散布；渗入，渗透
example: 单词 permeate 的例句||||Water will easily permeate a cotton dress. 水很容易渗透棉布衣服。||||After a while it begins to permeate through your skin. 过了一会，它会开始渗入你的皮肤。

name: saturate
interpret: vt.使湿透，浸透；使充满，使饱和；adj.浸透的，饱和的；深颜色的
example: 单词 saturate 的例句||||We'll saturate California with the rise in its crime rate. 我们将使加利福尼亚州的犯罪案件增长率达到饱和点。||||Saturate the meat in the mixture of oil and herbs. 把肉浸泡在油和作料的卤汁里。

name: overt
interpret: adj.公开的，明显的，公然的
example: 单词 overt 的例句||||His opponent's intention is quite overt. 他的对手的意图很明显。||||We should learn to fight with enemy in an overt and covert way. 我们应学会同敌人做公开和隐蔽的斗争。

name: momentum
interpret: n.动力，冲力，势头；动量
example: 单词 momentum 的例句||||We exploit the energy and momentum conservation laws in this way. 我们就是这样利用能量和动量守恒定律的。||||The law of momentum conservation could supplant Newton's third law. 动量守恒定律可以取代牛顿第三定律。

name: census
interpret: n.(官方的)人口调查，人口普查
example: 单词 census 的例句||||A census of population is taken every ten years. 人口普查每10年进行一次。||||The census is taken one time every four years in our country. 我国每四年一次人口普查。

name: deficit
interpret: n.亏空，亏损；赤字，逆差
example: 单词 deficit 的例句||||The directors have reported a deficit of 2. 5 million dollars. 董事们报告赤字为250万美元。||||We have a great deficit this year. 我们今年有很大亏损。

name: buffer
interpret: n.起缓冲作用的人(或物)，缓冲器；vt.缓冲
example: 单词 buffer 的例句||||A little money can be a useful buffer in time of need. 在急需时，很少一点钱就能解燃眉之急。||||Romantic love will buffer you against life's hardships. 浪漫的爱会减轻生活的艰辛。

name: brutal
interpret: adj.残忍的，野蛮的，不讲理的
example: 单词 brutal 的例句||||She has to face the brutal reality. 她不得不去面对冷酷的现实。||||They're brutal people behind their civilised veneer. 他们表面上温文有礼，骨子里却是野蛮残忍。

name: bleak
interpret: adj.(天气)阴冷的；凄凉的；暗淡的
example: 单词 bleak 的例句||||They showed me into a bleak waiting room. 他们引我来到一间阴冷的会客室。||||The company's prospects look pretty bleak. 这家公司的前景异常暗淡。

name: bibliography
interpret: n.参考书目；(有关某一专题的)书目
example: 单词 bibliography 的例句||||There is a useful bibliography at the end of each chapter. 在每一章后附有一份有用的参考书目。||||The production of this bibliography is totally automated. 这个目录的编制过程全是自动化的。

name: bias
interpret: n.偏见，偏心，偏袒；vt.使有偏见
example: 单词 bias 的例句||||They are accusing the teacher of political bias in his marking. 他们在指控那名教师打分数有政治偏见。||||He had a bias toward the plan. 他对这项计划有偏见。

name: batch
interpret: n.一批(组，群)；一批生产量
example: 单词 batch 的例句||||The first batch of cakes was burnt. 第一炉蛋糕烤焦了。||||I have a batch of letters to answer. 我有一批信要回复。

name: amend
interpret: vt.修改，修订，改进；n.[pl.]赔罪，赔偿
example: 单词 amend 的例句||||The teacher advised him to amend his way of living. 老师劝他改变生活方式。||||You must amend your pronunciation. 你必须改正你的发音。

name: alleviate
interpret: vt.减轻，缓和，缓解(痛苦等)
example: 单词 alleviate 的例句||||The doctor gave her an injection to alleviate the pain. 医生给她注射以减轻疼痛。||||Nothing could alleviate his distress. 什么都不能减轻他的痛苦。

name: allege
interpret: vt.宣称，申述，主张，断言
example: 单词 allege 的例句||||The newspaper reporters allege that the man was murdered but they have given no proof. 新闻记者们宣称这个男人是被谋杀的，但他们没提出证据。||||Students occasionally allege illness as the reason for absence. 学生时不时会称病缺课。

name: aggravate
interpret: vt.加重(剧)，使恶化；激怒，使恼火
example: 单词 aggravate 的例句||||Threats will only aggravate her. 恐吓只能激怒她。||||He would only aggravate the injury by rubbing it. 他揉擦伤口只会使伤势加重。

name: afflict
interpret: vt.使身体或精神受痛苦，折磨
example: 单词 afflict 的例句||||I wish you wouldn't afflict me with your constant complains. 我希望你不要总是抱怨而使我苦恼。||||There are many illnesses, which afflict old people. 有许多疾病困扰着老年人。

name: affiliate
interpret: vt.使隶(附)属于；n.附属机构，分公司
example: 单词 affiliate 的例句||||Our New York company has an affiliate in Los Angeles. 我们的纽约公司在洛杉矶有一个下属企业。||||What is the difference between affiliate and regular membership? 固定会员和附属会员之间的区别是什么？

name: aesthetic
interpret: adj.美学的，审美的，有美感
example: 单词 aesthetic 的例句||||My aesthetic standards are quite different from his. 我的审美标准与他的大不相同。||||The professor advanced a new aesthetic theory. 那位教授提出了新的美学理论。

name: adverse
interpret: adj.不利的；有害的；敌对的，不友好的
example: 单词 adverse 的例句||||He is adverse to going abroad. 他反对出国。||||The improper use of medicine could lead to severe adverse reactions. 用药不当会产生严重的不良反应。

name: advent
interpret: n.(重要事件等的)到来，来临
example: 单词 advent 的例句||||Swallows come by groups at the advent of spring. 春天来临时燕子成群飞来。||||The advent of the Euro will redefine Europe. 欧元的出现将重新定义欧洲。

name: activate
interpret: vt.使活动起来，使开始起作用
example: 单词 activate 的例句||||We must activate the youth to study. 我们要激励青年去学习。||||These push buttons can activate the elevator. 这些按钮能启动电梯。

name: conspicuous
interpret: adj.明眼的，惹人注目的；炫耀的，摆阔气的
example: 单词 conspicuous 的例句||||It is conspicuous that smoking is harmful to health. 很明显，抽烟对健康有害。||||Its colouring makes it highly conspicuous. 它的色彩使它非常惹人注目。

name: amplify
interpret: vt.放大，增强；详述，详加解说
example: 单词 amplify 的例句||||The new manager wants to amplify the company. 新经理想要扩大公司。||||Please amplify your remarks by giving us some examples. 请举例详述你的话。

name: fore
interpret: adv.在前面；adj.先前的；在前部的；n.前部
example: 单词 fore 的例句||||Your seat is in the fore part of the aircraft. 你的座位在飞机的前部。||||I have the gift of fore knowledge. 我能够未卜先知。

name: forsake
interpret: vt.遗弃，抛弃；舍弃，放弃
example: 单词 forsake 的例句||||She pleaded with her husband not to forsake her. 她恳求丈夫不要抛弃她。||||You must forsake your bad habits. 你必须革除你的坏习惯。

name: fortress
interpret: n.堡垒，防御工事
example: 单词 fortress 的例句||||They made an attempt on a fortress. 他们试图夺取这一要塞。||||The soldier scaled the wall of the fortress by turret. 士兵通过塔车攀登上了要塞的城墙。

name: frail
interpret: adj.身体虚弱的；易损坏的
example: 单词 frail 的例句||||Mrs. Warner is already 96 and too frail to live by herself. 华纳太太已经九十六岁了，身体虚弱，不便独居。||||She lay in bed looking particularly frail. 她躺在床上，看上去特别虚弱。

name: infinitely
interpret: adv.无限地，无穷地
example: 单词 infinitely 的例句||||There is an infinitely bright future ahead of us. 我们有无限光明的前途。||||The universe is infinitely large. 宇宙是无限大的。

name: ingenuity
interpret: n.别出心裁；善于发明创造
example: 单词 ingenuity 的例句||||The boy showed ingenuity in making toys. 那个小男孩做玩具很有创造力。||||I admire your ingenuity and perseverance. 我钦佩你的别出心裁和毅力。

name: hydraulic
interpret: adj.水力的；水压的，液压的；水力学的
example: 单词 hydraulic 的例句||||The boat has no fewer than five hydraulic pumps. 这艘船配有不少于5个液压泵。||||A group of apprentices were operating the hydraulic press. 一群学徒正在开动水压机。

name: invalid
interpret: n.病人，伤残人；adj.有病的，伤残的；无效的
example: 单词 invalid 的例句||||He will visit an invalid. 他将要去看望一个病人。||||A passport that is out of date is invalid. 护照过期是无效的。

name: insistent
interpret: adj.迫切的，坚持的
example: 单词 insistent 的例句||||There was an insistent knock on my door. 我听到一阵急促的敲门声。||||He is most insistent on this point. 他在这点上很坚持。

name: installment
interpret: n.(instalment)分期付款；(连载的)一期
example: 单词 installment 的例句||||I shall soon pay the last installment of my debt. 不久我将偿付我的最后一期债款。||||He likes to buy things on the installment plan. 他喜欢用分期付款法购买货物。

name: milky
interpret: adj.牛奶的，多奶的；乳白色的
example: 单词 milky 的例句||||Alexander always has milky coffee at lunchtime. 亚历山大总是在午餐时喝掺奶的咖啡。||||I like a hot milky drink at bedtime. 我喜欢睡前喝杯热奶饮料。

name: intake
interpret: n.吸入，纳入；进气口，入口
example: 单词 intake 的例句||||Reduce your salt intake. 减少盐的摄入量。||||There was a horrified intake of breath from every child. 所有的孩子都害怕地倒抽了一口凉气。

name: mingle
interpret: vt.使混合，使相混；vi.混合起来；相交往
example: 单词 mingle 的例句||||If we mingle with the crowd, we should not be noticed. 如果我们混在人群中，就不会被注意到。||||Oil will not mingle with water. 油和水不相融。

name: intercourse
interpret: n.性交；交流，交往，交际
example: 单词 intercourse 的例句||||The magazine becomes a cultural medium of intercourse between the two peoples. 该杂志成为两民族间文化交流的媒介。||||There was close intercourse between them. 他们过往很密。

name: persecute
interpret: vt.迫害，虐待；纠缠，骚扰
example: 单词 persecute 的例句||||They persecute those who do not conform to their ideas. 他们迫害那些不信奉他们思想的人。||||Hitler's undisguised effort to persecute the Jews met with worldwide condemnation. 希特勒对犹太人的露骨迫害行为遭到世界人民的谴责。
